reviewText: Carhartt and Riggs are the best t-shirts I've owned. Thick fabric, long wear, A POCKET -- HOW UNUSUAL, runs a little large, needs more colors. Most are heather and somewhat dark. Need more bright colors like the orange. Yellow would be nice. .

I am not a slipper person but since I am going in for surgery and a hospital stay, I was advised to bring slippers. These clog slippers are comfortable and easy to get into and out of. I am pleased with my purchase.
It is too cute, not too big and makes just the right statement. I get quite a few compliments on this necklace each time I wear it. The most surprising comes from men.

I've been looking for a great tank top, and thankfully, I found it in this item. This top is so light that I can wear it under myJess & Jane Tops for Women-3/4 Sleeve Poly/Span Ruffle Sublimation Tops"Paloma"(Style#74-281)and not feel a thing. This is a terrific tank top to have and highly recommend it if you are looking for a good tank top.

I thought this blue with go with much of what I had, as I wear a lot of blue.  It looks like it should.  But it goes with nothing I have.  It might be the right shade of blue for others, but for me the shade was a bomb. There is not much variation in the shades of blue in this scarf.  I learned that I'm better off with scarves with a lot of different colors in them, like prints and plaids, as they go with more things.

summary: Great Fitness Bra For Any Occasion
reviewText: There are a lot of great bras out there such as the Coobie Strappy V-Neck Lace Trim Bras, but some can't handle any fitness. That is why it is great this bra from Champion Women. The bra's durability can match any sport and it just has a style to it. You will indeed want this bra for any physical activities.

summary: Allegra K Long Bat Wing Sleeve Pullover Loose Scoop Neck Shirt for Women
reviewText: Great shirt looks like the picture even better in person, true to size this is a loose shirt very soft and comfortable does fall past my waist and sleeves like the picture just  below the elbow.Stitching was perfect didn't see any imperfections with this shirt.Seller is great arrived very fast and packaged perfect !

I love this watch! The face is easy to read, the stones sparkle nicely, and it fits comfortably on my wrist. The price is right, and I am very pleased with this order. It was a gift to me from me and I absolutely love it. I would highly recommend this cute watch to anybody who wants one! You will not be disappointed.
This bra fit a little too tight and was not very comfortable.  I love Playtex bras, but I won't be buying any more of this brand.
They fit like a dream, and I found them to be great running shoes.  I love the funky design and colors.  I recommend them.  They are priced just right too.
These are super comfortable to wear.  They never get hot and they stay on really well because of the extra straps.  I get lots of compliments on them too.

These are a thick "tights" like legging that you have to wear a skirt or dress over (or at least a really long shirt) but was exactly what I was looking for to go under my tank dress. I love the material seems very breathable. I am not disappointed.
Comfortable.  Not too thick or too thin.  Many socks are too tight on my large calves, so I buy roll down ones and roll them up.

summary: no support whatsoever for larger breasts
reviewText: I am a 36E and while the XL size does cover my breasts, there is absolutely ZERO SUPPORT which means I cannot wear them.  I would say if you are larger than a B cup, AVOID THIS BRA.  I foolishly bought three of them because it was such a great price.
These are my second pair of yoga mat flip flops and I will be back for more.  They're so comfy!  I find myself wearing these everywhere.
Just what I needed for winter only thing I suggest is order a size up I did after reading the reviews these are very basic and soft and the price was right waiting for one more to be delivered.

Bought these for my daughter in a size small and they are perfect. Girls love these sweat capris. They are nice quality and fairly heavy sweat material too! Sizing seems to be true.. not too big or too small. My daughter loves them and I loved the price!Updated review to add that I came back to purchase another pair of these for myself and my other daughter. Very pleased with all 3 pairs. They are so comfy and soft. I can wear them to houseclean or lounge around and they are very comfortable. They get even softer and more cozy after washed and dried a few times. The material holds up really well. It doesn't thin out and won't get lint balls all over it. I wish they had some other colors available because I'd buy a bunch more.

i'm not normally an animal print kind of girl, and i though that the pattern stopping near the elbow might be weird, but it's actually a great shirt.first, i love the length. it's long without looking like a dress. second, i love the dolman sleeves (loose until around the elbows). third, i buy a lot of allegra k products, and they seem to be hit or miss. this one is a hit based on the fabric alone. it's soft and hasn't pilled after many washes.

I was leery to buy another front hook bra because of past bad experiences with the fit. I'm so glad I took a chance on these bras, they fit wonderfully and they look great. They are very soft and comfortable. Don't hesitate to buy these if you're really wanting a sexy front hook bra.
My wife likes them very much. I have washed them at least once. They are the original Playtex for plus sizes. From a 1 to a 10 = 10

These are top AAAAA grade CZs. CZ has a grading system, just as diamond has theirs. Most CZ jewelry is set with AAA or lesser. These are top line. In appearance, they rival beautiful quality diamonds. Only you will know they aren't diamond. The cut on these stones is ideal. Just beautiful. These earrings have it all; brilliance, fire, sparkle, shine, clear, clean in clarity, and an awesome cut.The setting is solid. Set just like diamond...solid with great looking prongs tips holding the stones in place. The prongs give a slightly squared off look to the "diamond". The basket is not bulky. The platinum overly is very well done, most likely won't cause any  allergic reactions. The metal is not the light silvery color photographed.  These are better than any department store CZ studs set in 14k that I've seen. Overwhelmingly, those have lesser stone quality and flimsy settings. This is solid."The Platinum Overlay Collection" by Amazon has beautiful, excellent quality, jewelry. While I recently purchased these, I bought a few pieces from their collection a few of years ago. All of my pieces still look just as beautiful as when I received them. Even with constant wearing, the platinum has never faded. Stones are still beauties.(Now, I don't shower or wash my hair with earrings on, but I did and often ).  The collection is dwindling. Not many pieces are still available. You may want to pick these up. You don't often see CZ this gorgeous.  Your, predisposed to jealousy, co-workers will be so envious...get ready for the "evil eye".5mm is about 3/4ct in each ear. I love this size...not too big and not too small. Just perfect, thanks Amazon.UPDATE:  I just ordered a pair for my fav cousin. She's a bit of a diamond snob. Amazon shipped directly to her(I'm excited..couldn't wait for her to get them), but I should've put them in a fancy box, and wrapped up for Christmas.  I could have heard her, "Oh Trinny, you shouldn't have". I'd had to tell her, "Oh Pat, but I didn't".  Seriously, these earrings have eliminated my desire for  beautiful natural diamonds of this carat weight. I'd have needed to save to purchase them, and still would have had a hard time justifying spending several thousand for a pair of earrings. My money is more wisely saved for more important purchases. I love these earrings! I hope you do, too. 5+++ stars.

I am a size 6 1/2, ordered a size 6, a little snug but tolerable. Size 7 flips off my feet. When are crocs going to come in half sizes?!?!?! I want to know what people mean when they say" oh, crocs are soooo comfy!"

I am editing this review why? Well because the clip brpke faster than I could type this review do not buy saddly to say but as soon as I went to pick it up and put it in my hair the flowers fell off! Yes fell off I was completely in shock now I have had things break that I have purchase but never this fast this was a all time record! infact it broke faster that nail polish drying (NO LIE)save your money!

summary: Nice shirt - pay attention to the size
reviewText: I ordered this shirt for my son for Homecoming.  I thought it would look great on his athletic build, which it does, but it is a little tight in the arms, even down to the wrists.  He is approximately 5'10, 175 lbs, and I ordered an XL for him, and it is very fitted.

Seems cute and comfortable but not really.Sole is comfy but it is way too thick for walking and also btwn the toes it feels uncomfortable as well as on top of near the toes. Also embroidered company logo was irritating. couldnt they put it outside part of the sandal?? Returning.

I was on the prowl for a bag like this one ever since my last across the body bag wore out from years of use. This one is even better than my old one! It has so many pockets for organization which seems rare for across the body bags. Usually, they are just one big pouch with maybe 1 or 2 pockets so it gets full and heavy and takes a month to find anything.I received a beautiful Chanel purse from my future MIL and I've never owned a nice purse like it - I'm not really a name brand obsessed person but it was a gift and I love it! I started to use it for everyday use and I was always freaking out about putting it on the ground and it getting scuffed/dirty/etc. I wanted to use it only for special occasions so in comes the Piazza Day Bag to save the day.Not only are all of my items organized in an OCD fashion without the disorder, but the bag itself is trendy, stylish, and versitile. I purchsed the Sandstone color to go with black or brown and all colors inbetween. It is exactly the color I wanted - the picture makes it seem like a light khaki but in person, it's a little darker which I am more than fine with. Also, the strap can be adjusted to make it an off the shoulder or across the body.I'm in love with beverages so I always have one with me and there is a pouch on the side just for that! I love being hands free and this bag definitely makes that possible.I do have one minor complaint and it is quite superficial. The zipper pulls aren't like the ones in the picture that match the bag. Instead, they are a hanious multi-color of red, grayish blue, and yellow. I don't know if Sandstone is the only one that comes with these, but I know I can always remove them or replace them.Now that I know how awesome these bags are, I could very well be the proud owner of the red Piazza Day Bag one day.

I absolutely love these shoes,  They were comfortable right out of the box, they look nice, and are easy to wear, just slip them on.  I wear size 8 and they fit perfectly.  I use them in the winter as my "in the house shoes" and they are much more supportive than slippers and look great.  I would recommend these for anyone with foot problems, or who needs extra support.  I use inserts in my shoes and you can't even see them and they are so comfortable.
Just skip it.  No support for 34b and I don't need much support.  Thanks for reading my review everyone. Bye.

Usually wear a 7 1/2 but the 7 was perfect, even with a little room to spare. Am a fan of neon colors, so when I saw this, I fell in love as I have a gym outfit that is black and neon yellow and I love to match!

This shirt was nice and soft but it had 2 major issues.  First, the dot on the shirt front was off center by about .75", enough to be noticeable.  Second, you could see my sides from the side of the shirt if I moved my arms a bit.  It's open from about the waist up; from where the sleeves start.  Good for air circulation, bad for just about everything else.  I wouldn't want that much exposure at work or just on the go in town.  The shirt does not taper up a little or have some sort of extra fabric under the arms.
So much better than UGGS because the quality is great, and the price is right... I love bearpaw and i love these boots!
not recieved yet love the look hope that i have found a pair of sandles i can wear for my feet i have Atheritis in both feet

This is the softest, flowy, lightweight shirt and just what I was looking for! I have a long torso and it was long enough to allow for the ripping effect over my belly so it flatters and doesn't fit flat and tight. The weight of the material is perfect for warm weather and is cool and breezy. The sleeves fit better than the pic looks and cover that back of the arm flab. Very flattering and so comfortable I wish it would come in more colors!

After reading many reviews, I decided to go ahead and order the x-large for my husband.  He has a size 10 to 10.5 foot and weighs about 190.  My point is, he's not big at all and the x-large fits him perfect.  If I hadn't read the reviews I would never have thought he would need a larger size.  But they fit him and kept his feet warm hunting this morning.

Steve's shoes last him about two months.  No more than that.  He is very large, and walks a lot on asphalt for our job. So finding a size 14 shoe is great, paying less than $50 is better.  These fill both slots, all shipped through prime.

I ORDERED 8 M (B) AND GOT A 8 W WHICH IS REALLY LOOSE ON MY FEET FOR FLATSI DON'T WANT TO GO THRU THE TROUBLE OF A RETURN TO GET THE SAME THING EVERYTIME I ORDER CROCS I GET A WRONG WIDTH THAT IS WHY I STOPPED PURCHASING THEM WITH AMAZON THE LAST ONES I GOT A 8 W I SENT THEM TO MY DAUGHTER AS A GIFT SHE WEARS SIZE 9 SHOES ALWAYS THE PINK ONES DUH!!
This is a nice leather belt. I wear it with my slacks to the office. The color will chip slightly, but you still cannot beat the price.

I wouldn't say these are entirely one size larger than normal, I would say its about a 1/2 size larger than normal. It doesn't matter to me because I don't like things hugging me to death especially when I am trying to work! I would recommend them!

I purchased (3) pairs of these shoes without ever trying them on or seeing them in person.I wear the FitFlop Thongs all the time since they were recommended by a Podiatrist.My feet used to hurt so badly, I had given up doing anything that had to do with much walking.  Even at work, it was torture.  Spent a fortune on every type of shoe.The new FitFlop Grough for winter which is a clog is sooooo comfortable and just fits perfectly (just like they're thongs for warmer weather.  These shoes are a miracle andI might even insure them (ha,ha!)  Amazon is the cheapest by far, and I checked everywhere.Delivered fast and shoes, tags, protecters and boxes brand new.Love, love, love the shoes and Amazon for their wonderful service and amazing products and prices.My feet and back are sending a huge "Thank You !!!

I know it got alot of negativity on the reviews but I tried it and I actually like it. The padding is perfect for a old maid like me who doesn't want their "headlights" to show. I managed to get it to fit-the mechanism can be tricky-and afterward I was pleased. I tried it on with some shirts of different types and it was perfect! The only minor thing which gave it a 4 star is once I was wearing it, the clasp went horizontal on me. I just adjusted and went on. This fit was so good for me I'm going to buy white. It's so hard to find racerback bras out there for any size that aren't a arm and a leg. This fits the bill nicely. I recommend it.

I'm 5'3", 117 lbs give or take, I wear XS in VS, size small in general. But these days it all depends on the style I want.Size 5 fit just right. I ordered short so it wont cover my ankles. I'm very slim here (US standard lol), flat tummy, skinny thighs, etc, etc. if u don't have flat tummy I suggest u go up in size. Size 3 was too tight on me. I bought the dark black one, I wash it in cold and dry on high and it's holding up very nicely. 4 1/2 star tho, wish they put waist measurement / size suggestion...

I was a little worried from some of the other reviews claiming that the Amazon version of Levi's 527s were subpar, but I was pleasantly surprised to find that they are one in the same. The fit is spot on as is the wash and the length. My boyfriend was very happy w/ these!!

This sweater was more like a small.  I liked the style but not the fit.  It didn't come in a larger size so I was disappointed.  Had to return it.  I was also not happy that it was an overseas buyer and it was costly to return it.

summary: Be Comfortable For 18 Hours And More!!!
reviewText: By getting this bra, you are going to have a very seamless bra. The fabrics in this product match those of Coobie Strappy V-Neck Lace Trim Bras. With this bra, you will be to wear it with a majority of your outfits and will be comfortable for at least 18 hours.
I got these for my fiancee and he loves them; they are one of his favorites out of all the pair that I ordered. Fit and color both good; recommend.
This piece was very cute! I liked it! It's not high quality, but for the price, I was very pleased! Great fashion necklace!

summary: Run wide, toe box very short. Not for thin feet.
reviewText: Shoe buying online is always a gamble, but flats are so hard to find! I usually wear an 8B to 8.5B. I may have ordered these too big (9), because the toe box looked short - which it is. But, much smaller and my toes would surely have been unhappily scrunched. Even with thick socks (not the best look!) these shoes were way too wide and gapped all around, especially when walking. I ordered three pairs to start, intending to buy more. The very pretty brown suede pair had a big glue spot right on the toe, the zebra print sported a red ink spot, the black pleathers were scuffed up. You get what you pay for, if that. Happy Amazon offers free return for all three pairs.

summary: go by measurement and you will love it too
reviewText: I love it. It took 3 inches away from my waist as soon as I could get it closed accurately. I have it on right now and I feel comfortable in it. Yesterday I forgot I had it on. It does make you sweat but not so much that the sweat comes out onto the clothing. The first day I wore it with a slim tank but I noticed it kept riding up the back so for 2 days I have been wearing it without a tank undernesth and it feels fine. If you have a big bottom make sure you place it correctly on the back or the bottom will ride up and that isn't fun. The fabric goes in the inside and the rubber part on the outside. I have to say I'm completely satisfied with the product and will continue buying smaller sizes as needed. Yes if you wear a thin tank or shirt the row of clasps shows through, so if you are planning on using it under tight clothes everyone will notice you have a girdle on. I think with a button up shirt it would be ok. I have to say I was surprised that I measured immediately after I took it off after 8 hrs of wear and noticed a 1.5 inch loss. I know it was all the water but I am happy.

I'm a dependable 7 1/2 M in women's shoes and the Malindi in a size 7 is perfect for me.These shoes are wonderful.  I have very high arches and have a hard time finding flats that give enough support.  While these do not offer much support, the way the shoe conforms to the foot makes them very comfortable.  Usually, I can't wear the same pair of shoes two days in a row, but I wear these constantly.  They're great for walking and for standing, and I can't recommend them highly enough.  LOVE.

summary: An attractive piece of inexpensive costume jewelry
reviewText: My wife and I have been buying some pieces of very inexpensive costume jewelry as gifts for some nieces in our families. At the time I ordered the butterfly pendant necklace chain, it cost less than a dollar and shipping was free. I noticed that the price has since increased to about $3, but even for that price, the butterfly is worth it. For inexpensive costume jewelry, it's a nice piece. And it's big, too - the butterfly is about 2"x1" and weighs 0.6 ounces. The bronzed finish is fairly shiny, although it's a bit darker than the picture shows.The butterfly was shipped from Guangdong, China, and arrived in the mail 25 days after I ordered it.

Merrell's WERE great, perhaps when they were made in Canada. These are identical in stated sizing to a wonderful pair of Merrell Jungle Moc's I wore comfortably in and out of the house for years, but my heel slipped a lot in these, there was way too much toe room, and they seemed 1/2 to 1 size too large. I wear a 9.5 US Merrell but these felt like 10-10.5's. I had to return them for properly fitting and comfortable Teva's. I do not recommend these, I would not buy again, and I hope this helps someone.
Tried my usual size, 7.5M, then 7M. Now I'm ordering in 7C. I think they run long & narrow. Nice shoes. The mid-brown is very pretty shade. Update: 7C/D is my correct size in this brand.

I love cowl neck sweaters and this is one of my new favorites. Please pay attention to the size chart when ordering. The length of the sweater hits me just under my bum, so I plan to wear with jeans and leggings. This is my 2nd Patti sweater and I believe I will order more in the future.

I found these shoes to be comfortable enough to wear outside of my Yoga class. The material is just like wearing your yoga mat and I almost forgot I was wearing them (well, not really). The price was right and the quality was better than I expected. The orange color (which I purchased) is a bit bright, so I will keep to wearing these in the summer and spring only.

I am from Baltimore, MD. I ordered this watch on October 3, 2013, and received it on October 9, 2013. I received the watch super duper fast. It's a beautiful rose gold color, and it looks super expensive. I placed clear nail polish around the gems on the watch, so they won't fall out. The watch was set to the correct time, when I received it in the mail. Great buy!
The gem part is very pretty, but the tines are really thick and I can't get it into my hair easily.

I HAVE HAD FOOT SURGERY 5 TIMES AND THESE WERE THE SHOE I WORE BEFORE AND AFTER.  I HAVE TRIED MANY OTHER SHOES BUT I ALWAYS COME BACK TO THESE.  I SPENT 40+ YEARS IN HIGH HEELS, MY HOUSE SLIPPERS EVEN HAD A WEDGE.  NOW I AM PAYIING FOR IT.  THESE GIVE ME SO MUCH RELIEF.

summary: Wow...I am surprised - First purchse from Allegra and will buy more!
reviewText: I didn't have much expectations from this top for the price. I dress up trendy yet would like to be on the conservative side. Bought this top to wear it on the weekends with a denim leggings or on Friday (our dress down day at work like the most people). I hit the gym every morning and take shower and get ready there and take off to my work. I wore this top and it made me late that day as every person passing buy had something to say about it and asked me where I bought and how simple and beautiful it was. It fit me just right. I am 5' 5" and 125 lbs and the small size looked tailor made just for me. The color was beautiful, but note that the Navy blue is not really blue but more of a Teal, and the material was soft. I am still unable to believe that I paid under $10 for something this cute. Do not hesitate, just go ahead and buy it. You will love it.
They nice & warm cant wear n summer time dat is wut i wnted 2 do az well but other than that they r ok

This bra is the right size around the rib cage but if you're a little more well endowed then you might want to go up a size.  I just had a baby so I wasn't aware that I was shopping for bigger boobs but here we are hahaha

summary: Don't bother -- it's not even worth a nickel
reviewText: This is the ugliest piece of junk I have seen in quite some time. I bought it as a gift for a friend of mine who was going on a hot air balloon ride. It was laughable. I couldn't give it to her. I would never be caught dead in it. The balloon/basket part is really unrecognizable as to what it is supposed to be. Complete garbage on a super cheap chain. I should have known.

I loved this shirt in the picture but no..The buttons are really strange looking and the sleeves do not fit right. They are short ending Halfway up my forearms, the material is like a light weight sweater . I got a large even though I usually get a M, cause I wanted it to be a little bigger but the seams don't lay right on.. The sweater is large but the sleeves are short and one is longer than the other.. I don't like it.
I wear these everyday and love them. Im very small and legging capri's look good with any type of shirt or blouse.  Highly recommend seller - price was excellent.

These are ridiculously oversized.  I purchased his usual size, but they were much too big.  He's 5'10" They were way too long....about 7" too long.The "jersey" fabric is the weight of a tee shirt. The man I bought them for doesn't like them.  I was expecting a heavier weight jersey fabric.  These were a bad purchase for me, but for a tall person looking for lightweight, summer "knock around" or exercise pants, these may fill the bill.  They do have side pockets and a draw string waist. Sizing down is probably best.

I ordered a small and before I put it on, holding it up it looked huge lol!  But thing is it fits, it's roomy and maybe I can even wear it off the shoulder  but that's just the style.  I like how it is snug but not tight at the waist and you can bunch it up some.  Definitely different, now I need some black or gray yoga pants to go with it although I think it looks great with my black skinny jeans and ballet flats for going out to the sushi bar tonight! :) I too like the little rhinestone thingy it's cute!  Btw I ordered the plum/wine color it's true to color and perfect for fall!  If possible I might order another color as well!

I love the feel, fabric and styling of these pants (love the hidden elastic on the waist, too) and they don't require ironing.  They feel silky soft and breathe well, and look great.  My only complaint would be the length - they seem to be about an inch longer than other pants with the same specs.

summary: Saved Me Money But Not Great Quality
reviewText: This "16 PCS Watch Tool Kit" contains a lot of tools, ranging in quality from good (the hammer), to fair (the pliers and Pin Remover), to poor (the Watch Case Opener). That being said, I was able to use this set to resize three watch bands and saved over 35 dollars by doing it myself. Many local jewelers will resize watches purchased from them for free, but since most of mine came from Amazon or elsewhere they charge anywhere between 12 to 18 dollars to change one band.These also did not come with any instructions but did have URL posted on the packaging that sends you to a site that contains fairly decent instructions.This isn't great quality set but it isn't priced like one either.CFH
Put them on an it is a fabulous shoe.  Have not worn them, but they look good.  Tried them on and the fit is a little big, i will put in pads and try to wear them to a special event.

summary: Bling Jewelry Geneva Rose Gold Plated Classic Round cz Ladies Boyfriend
reviewText: Very stylish watch who would have thought for the price looks great on so far it isn't broken the battery is running fine and looks great on for the price I couldn't go wrong looks just like the picture even nicer when you have it.
smartens up a plain black shirt giving it an elegant look.  light, well constructed, with enough body to stand up, not so much as to itchy.  I wear might also with plain scarfs for a different look.

I ordered an XL and it was very big, so I returned that and ordered a M. That was right except that sleeves were too snug (on my normal-sized arms). So I ended up with a L, and that's what I'd normally wear--lol!! (I'm used to clothing sizes being difficult to guess, so I started out ordering wrong sizes.) Sleeves are long and can be pushed up. Really soft and drapes very elegantly! Not too warm.NOTE: It says "free returns" and Prime, but returns were not free! I had to pay postage. So try to order the right size! Also, if you order a different color, it might take several days to reach you. The blacks came quickly. (Prime is supposed to take 2 days.)

It's ok.  Quite see-through but that was expected.  A little tighter than described and a little shorter than expected...and I am petite.  Overall it is pretty, but more casual and cheap looking than the picture shows.

These shoes have amazing vibrant colors- very fun & avoids clashing with running duds.  (usually I just buy white, grey or black cause they go with anything- but this time, I just FELT like more fun colors!)  But more importantly, very comfortable with good stability.  Very well constructed.  I'd suggest possibly 1/2 size down from normal size as they are cut on the large size.  Slightly narrow but with very roomy toebox, as others here have noted too!  Also, very deep heel pocket, I'll be adding my heel cushions to these (or else I'll get a back-of-heel blister)- this is common for me with very stable shoes.  If you're like me, may want to do the same.
i never want to take off these sweats. so fuzzy on the inside and so warm. extreme comfort. great price.

summary: women dots print elastic waist mini dress black beige L w/ brown belt
reviewText: it's such a cute dress and fit's me! I normally wear a size L. The material reminded me of somewhat improved costume material, but for the price I don't really care. When I buy cute clothes for $10, I'm not expecting Express store quality. I hope to wear this more when the weather is not so horrible around here or maybe in the summer time! Took a month to get to me, but I did not mind because it was coming from China. great purchase

This is an attractive bra. 3 hook back closure with a comfort back that is truly comfortable. Tagless style. No scratching and no poking. Comfortably padded undwires. Attractive look with a very smooth fabric. It does a good job minimizing, but doesn't give that "rounded" and smashed look, typical of many minimizers.  I did find the cups to run a litle small. Note the photo. You can use this as a cleavage bra. I bought the bra to wear with polo shirts and it affords more cleavage than I was looking for, but the support is comfortably good. I would buy again. I wouldn't recommend going up a cup size. Instead, let this be your cleavage bra for lower cut tops. It definitely minimizes, but also allows for good cleavage. It's not a typical minimizing bra.

I purchased this to go under my Halloween costume to give it some volume and flare. This petticoat is full, light weight and bouncy. Of course it is a bit short... I'm 5'9" and it doesn't quiet go half way down on my thighs... but the picture representing it is very true to the product you get. (it's short in the picture also). Over all I'm very pleased with the quality and got exactly what I imagined and hoped for.Also this company ships super FAST. I ordered this and had it in my hands in 1 week exactly (and that was shipping to an APO address, not a stateside address)

summary: looks as cheap as it is

These earrings have an amazing sparkle and I cannot understand how they are being sold so cheaply.If they were better presented they would look like a high value item.I will replace them to a nice presentation box.Stan ChunWellingtonNew Zealand.

These shoes are a little more cherry red than I was hoping, but still cute. The problem is that they're just not comfy after about two hours. I had to put little heel inserts cuz they were a little lose, which was fine, but they honestly aren't that comfy. I miss my other Madden Girl red shoes (they broke) and was hoping these would be a good replacement. Ah well.

They're longer than pictured, came half-way down my calves on me (I'm 5'6"). The material is a little thinner than I hoped, but they serve their purpose. They're comfortable. I don't think I'll buy them again, but I will keep and wear the ones I got.

summary: I ordered the Pineneedle Green Color after Christmas 2012
reviewText: Did not get these from Amazon but found out that Amazon has the most colors of Ugg boots and slippers than any other company.  I always search different outlets for sales on the Uggs that I want to purchase.  I already found slippers and boots for all my children and grandchildren for next Christmas.  Am so delighted with Ugg and the Pineneedle is an amazing color of forest green. I already have a great collection of colors and styles of Ugg.  I only order the Classic Short or Bailey Button in the boots but have about 5 styles of slippers in Ugg.  The Classic Short is my favorite.  Also, the older boots ran about a size larger but now run true to size.  Walmart has three types of silicon spray for abut $8 and before I wear them; I spray with the strongest spray to waterproof and also preserve the color.  Thanks for looking at my review! I'm an Ugg Aholic!  Amd I'm going broke buying them!  Thanks for looking! p.s. the silicon spray never changes the color!

I ordered this just two weeks ago and got it here in the Midwest.  I wear a size 8 women's, 9-11 junior in tops-depending on style and carry a bit of mama weight in my middle.  I am 5'2", 138lbs-145lbs....fluctuates due to medications....and I ordered this in black, in an XL having never purchased anything Allegra K before this I didn't want to risk a top that was ridiculously tight-I could have gotten a L in this though and it would've been fine too I am sure.  Having said all this...this top is awesome!  It is a nice weight jersey top that could work in all seasons where I live.  It's long enough to wear with leggings, loose enough in the middle to not show jigglage or muffin-lol, but tight enough to not be frumpy and look like you care about how you look if that makes sense.  I love clothes and saw this item from another seller on here that is identical in looks but three times as much. I want it in every color possible-love this!  It looks great with skinny jeans, leggings and will look great with boots and a skirt if I wanted.  Simply put-EXCELLENT purchase!  I am hooked!

summary: Has Everything You Could Ask For In A Bra
reviewText: Aside from the Coobie Strappy V-Neck Lace Trim Bras, you may never another bra again if you get this revolution wire free bra. This bra has everything a woman could ask for and fits for any size. If you do get this bra, then know that you will have a bra that is durable and stylish.

I bought a set of these quite some time ago, followed by a purchase of an additional set also a while back.  They have held up quite well with frequent use.  I wear black pants on a pretty regular basis, and these have always worked well.

summary: I like them very much and wear them occasionly.
reviewText: I bought these for appointments and some shopping around town. I've worn them a couple times and they are in the closet. I will most likely wear them once more before washing. They are the same Lees as always. From a 1 to a 10= 10

summary: Really comfy and really don't ride up
reviewText: In my search for some comfortable panties that stay in place, I came across the positive reviews for these undies and decided to give them a try.  They fit true to size (according to the measurements given in the Product Information section), are super soft, and really don't ride up.  As other reviewers mentioned, they also look sleek and modern -- and look nothing like the granny panty look.I'm definitely going to be buying more and replacing all my old undies with these!

I like this top - the style is nice and casual, the fit is just a tiny bit small but not too bad. It's a little sheer in certain colors but the thin fabric makes it nice for summer or layering. It does already have a small hole in it - not sure if it came that way or got a hole in the wash already. Either way, not a huge deal because I planned to wear this on lazy days / with casual outfits anyway but that was a bit disappointing.
My hubbys shirts have been getting a little worn out, and so I ordered a couple of these.  They are pretty nice, he just wishes they had a pocket. But for this price, who cares.
This top is SO SOFT! I love it, and wear it a lot. It washes up very well, and is now one of my favorite items of clothing

It's thick enough to give warmth, thin enough to keep cool.  Lightweight, a bit see through.  I would add some length to the sleeves, at least two inches.  I bought a size up and it fit right.  I'll likely buy in another color, but this time i think I'll go two sizes up.  It's comfy, looks great!

summary: Meant to be a bit on the big side... Great water shoes!
reviewText: If you work around water, these are great.  They keep your from slipping in wet areas and allow your foot to breathe.  They do run very wide, but they are meant to be loose fitting.  The heel strap help keep them on your feet.  When I was a dive instructor, I lived in these things and really liked them -- there just aren't a lot of better options out there and they held up a bit better in the wet conditions than my dock shoes or penny loafers... they are not really pretty though.  :)

These shoes were ok. My toe hit the end of the shoe, even thou they were the right size. My foot would slid in them easily. I got these shoes for my job in the emergency room. I wore them one day and returned them, as they were not comfortable to me. The toe box is narrow too, so my pinkie toe hit the sides.

This bra is very unfortunate because the under wires continue up through either sider of the front closure, and they stick out. I've tried bending them back, smoothing them down, nothing works. I wore it once and I had 2 obvious wires sticking out in front of my sweater. Very embarrassing. This is unwearable, and too bad because otherwise the fit was good.
She loves it and it's a perfect fit. I have washed it and it is stable and continues to fit and look good.
Nice light weight nighty...Vanity Fair Women's Colortura Short Gown #30107 for 15 dollars I bought three...just a sheer not too sheer black night gown that's will wash and wear easily...

These are truly waterproof! I hiked through mud, snow, and water and my feet stayed completely dry! When I first put them on, I thought they were comfortable but needed breaking in. But I went on a five mile hike and I had no blisters so they weren't too stiff! They offer great traction, even on muddy, wet, and leaf-covered hills!my feet stayed warm in mid-30s day but never got hot. I believe I will be able to wear these on the summer too-I don't think they will be too hot. I have a weak ankle and these offer terrific support through all kinds of terrain. They are extremely well made and I believe that I will be hiking for years and miles to come!!

Good quality stay cool bra. While not lacy, it gives sexy looking fit with it's deep V, separation and rounded natural shaping.  Breast stay securely put in crossover design. Love not having my breast smashed together. They don't even touch. Each breast stays put in it's own cup.  The fabric is soft. The fit is comforatable.  Top portion of cups have stretch, bottom portion does not. I like as an everyday bra, not as a sports bra.  I don't think this  will give long lasting support if breast are really heavy. Too much of the cup area has stretch. I have a few Glamorise bras, but will purchase several of this style for everyday wear. I like the comfortable fit,  and they way I look in it, both before and after dressing.Many Glamorise bra styles runs small, but it may be best to stick with your regular size, if ordering this style. The back doesn't ride up, even if breast are heavy.  The label isn't rough and scratchy either. The mulitiple D cups have 4 hooks in the back.Last note, I needed to snip a little piece of lining,  from underneath front of strap. The strap was slightly curling. That fixed the problem.
COMFORTABLE, TRUE TO SIZE AND ADOREABLE ALSO, I AM SO HAPPY WITH THEM, THEY ARE THE BEST I HAVE EVER GOTTEN AND ILL GET OTHERS,

I bought a bunch of necklaces for cheap off of here with free shipping; this one impressed me the most. It is very beautiful and large. The material is thick and pretty and absolutely worth the price. It impressed me one hundred percent and I would definitely buy this again. It is absolutely awesome and pretty and worth it. The chain is also long! :)
Love this necklace. Very much worth the weight. The one thing to note is that it is on a chain that has no clasp.That would be the only thing I would change. LOVE IT
Interesting style, but the fabric was scratchy and it wasn't as long as it appeared in the product image.  Sleeves were nice and long.  Draping around the neck was a bit off.  I returned this.
This bracelet is cuter than what I expected from the photo. I have worn it several times and so far haven't had any issues. It fits very nicely.
HE LIVES IN HOUSE SLIPPERS NOW THAT HE IS RETIRED AND THESE WERE PERFECT.  HE SAYS THEY ARE WARM AND COMFORTABLE, JUST WHAT HE WANTS.

reviewText: As with all Pro Jewelry beads and charms these I would recommend too, they are gorgeous. Used all that I got and planning to get some more.

I have quite a few of these panties and every one of them have been ripped at the waits band. They are comfy but I don't like how shabby they are at the waist. They need a better waistband. The Hanes NO RIDE UP are better.

provides little support, it gives anyone with a larger chest uni-boobs, the bottom band rides up and irritates so it is not even very comfortable, the straps are the only thing that is comfortable when worn for several hours.

I own 5 of these bras -----3 in cafe and two in white. I normally wear a 36DD bra and that is the size that I wear in this bra. I initially bought two of these bras to wear when I work out, but have found them so supportive and comfortable that I wear them regardless of whether I plan to work out or not. I like the mesh insert on this style because I often wear v-neck t-shirts and the insert offers some extra coverage.I used to toss these in the washing machine on a normal cycle, buy noticed the white bras started looking a little dingey despite washing them with other like colored garments. Now I wash them with Woolite and still allow them to line dry. They seem to retain their color and original condition by hand washing.There is no padding in the cups which isn't surprising given that they are designed for full busted women. While the straps are adjustable, this style is easy on the shoulders and offer firm support and stability while in motion. They are well made and durable. I've been wearing this style for 3 years and have yet to find a sport bra that matches it in terms of comfort and support.
Nice shirt, flowy and comfortable. It is sheer so you have to wear a shirt underneath, but I don't have a problem doing that. It's a good buy.

summary: niceE shop (TM) Fashion Vintage Eifffel Tower Pendant With Chain- Bronze
reviewText: Gave this a 5 stars  real cute not  heavy and I like the leather  chain says aris but that's ok for the price I couldn't go wrong

I hate to admit that I love this bra.  The short of it is, I think it is as supportive as the best underwire, and is comfortable and shapes really nicely.I'm in my mid 30s, with a large chest, especially post baby.  38 DDD.  I am an underwire advocate - "It's the only thing that lends support" - I've argued this with my mom, who refuses to go underwire.Well, Hurricane Sandy hit, and even though I wasn't originally in an evacuation zone, I had to get out of my building fast.  I grabbed stuff for the baby and ran, but took nothing for me.  So days later, as I lived on a couch with a relative, we made the trip to a big retailer, and I tried to buy some basics.  I didn't want to spend the $50+ I usually spend on bras, so I picked this up for 1/3 of the price, along with a pack of granny panties and all sorts of "discount" options - just to get by until I can eventually get back to my apartment.All I can say is it's 3 days later since I got this bra, and I love the shape and love the support, and I think this is my bra going forward, which is absurd for someone like me whose entire bra collection is in the $50-$100 range.

I am 5'9" and have a hard time finding leggings that fit to the ankle. These looked way to small but when I stretched them like pantyhose and got them on they fit great! I ordered the white and they are a bit sheer but planned on wearing them under a long top that covered my rear anyways. I will buy more in other colors. I like that they are not thick material and are cool. Great buy!

summary: I can't believe it... (and I shouldn't have)
reviewText: ... but it works! I am over an inch smaller around while wearing this bra. It does make my chest look wider from the front, just a little bit, but it's not really noticeable to anyone but myself and my boyfriend. The effect is exaggerated by the fact that I wear a lot of high-waist dresses. So, it makes them look bigger in the front, but smaller from the side and allows me to wear button-front things much easier. It's also (and most importantly) incredibly supportive. I can jump around and my chest doesn't move! I've NEVER found a bra that could do that. I'm ordering another one right now - I highly recommend it!Update - Jan 28th, 2014: I purchased two of these bras and have worn them both about five times each. They are totally stretched out and now too big and completely lacking in support. The back of the bra slides up continuously. I'm glad I didn't pay much for them, but I'm aggravated that I have try and find a new bra yet again.

I got so many compliments when I wore this for the first time.  It is very flattering since it's forgiving at the chest and arms and comes in tighter at the waist.  I didn't realize that it had a small crystal around the neckline, but it is easily removed without damage to the shirt.  The color is very pretty, and the top can be worn casually or with more business attire.  Will buy from this company again.
This was my 3rd pair of Skechers Go Walk and I it's great.  I'm planning on buying more in different colors and possibly different styles.

I arrived home after a long 14-hour day to find these waiting for me. I put them on immediately. I ordered the cream satin and they are elegant without looking too shiny. They are just the right size for me and the padded soles are nice to walk on. I would recommend these for tired feet.
just as described , very comfy , it says JUNIORS but fit's a woman . I am a 32 year old mom who weighs 205 and they fit great !

summary: Slouchy? No. Misleading photo and description.
reviewText: I was looking for a loose off-shoulder shirt or sweater. My amazon search for "off shoulder shirt" pulled this one up. While it isn't "off-shoulder" in the photo, it does look like a loose sweatshirt. I decided to order it in 2 sizes too large to get the loose feel i was looking for. I am 5'2 115 lbs. I generally wear a small or a medium when i like things a little looser. I ordered this in a large, so i was absolutely shocked when i put this shirt on. For one, the sleeves BARELY hit my wrists. I have very average proportions and have bought from alternative plenty of times and have had no issues with their items fitting before. There was no slouchy-ness to this in any way. Even at 2 sizes too large. Also, this is very short. The bottom edge of the shirt hits the top of my belt loops and because of the way it is hemmed it tends to slide up often. Also, from the picture, it looks like it is a sweatshirt. While i didn't care either way, It is thinner than a t-shirt. I did opt to keep this instead of sending it back, but it definitely wasn't what i was hoping it to be. I have to wear a tank top underneath to keep from showing my belly/back. The color is consistent with the photo, however. I got the red and it looks true to the one shown.

For those of us not predisposed to wander in malls, amidst waves of noxious perfumes and potential (if not full-out) zombies, I appreciate the comfortable and reliable fit of these well-tailored Dockers. Since the tummy involved does not boast as full a rotundity as in previous years, it been wonderfully easy to order down size by size, as the Dockers fit is incredibly consistent. They maintain a dignified appearance large/mid/small; you can't go wrong!

When these socks arrived I thought there had been a mistake as there is a picture of a young girl on the label, but they are woman-sized.  I am 5'8" and they reach to my knees.  I'm quite please with the price and the product.

When these jeans say relaxed, they mean it.  These jeans are so comfortable and they fit just right. The fitting rivals even the likes of the Miss Me JEANS - PARADISE BORDER BOOT, LADIES WOVEN PANTS. I think these are great jeans to wear around the house, but these jeans can work just about any occasion.

summary: Indigo BEARPAW Women's Emma Boot. size 6
reviewText: My daughter ordered a size 7 boot and she normally takes a 7 1/2 shoes,.  but the size 7 boot fits her perfectly. I wanted to boots also, and I wear a size 6 1/2 shoe, and she told me to order the size 6 because it will fit perfectly.  So I did, and it does fit perfectly, and we both love the boot because it keeps us so warm!!!  They feel comfortable, and keep your legs and feet warm!!! They are wonderful!!!!

summary: Glad I sized up a half size, from 7.5 to 8. Bluestone/Neutral Grey color goes great with jeans
reviewText: I debated forever on whether to size up in these or not. Some reviews said they were fine, others said they sized up. I even asked a friend of mine who has these in the men's version, and he went against what everyone else said, insisting I should size down. I sit somewhere between 7.5 and 8 and after reading a ton of reviews, I noticed that on the Keen website, they suggest sizing up one half size, so I did. Turns out to have been a good decision. The size 8 was a perfect fit, and I'm pretty sure the size 7.5 would have been too snug.I bought these to wear on vacation, and had never worn them before going, other than to see if I ordered the right size. So the first time I put them on, I wore them all day walking around Busch Gardens in Tampa Bay, Florida. No breaking in time. Just put them on and wore them walking all day long. I was quite pleased to find that my feel took to them well and other than the heels feeling a little tender, after 8 hours of walking and standing lines, my feet didn't hurt the next day.I also wore these out into the ocean several days while on vacation. We stayed at a hotel right on the gulf, and walked along the beach every morning. I wore these when we were out for our morning walks, and then wore them several times when I was swimming and walking out chest deep in the ocean, looking for seashells. After being completely submerged in water, I found they took about a day to fully dry out again. These are great multi-purpose shoes. Water or walking, they work great for both. I bought them in the Bluestone/Neutral Grey color and they are perfect when you wear jeans all the time, like myself. They have a denim look and color to them, so they match perfectly for anything you wear with jeans. I like these so much, I'm hoping to pick up another pair in one of the other fun bright colors as well.

It was my first time ordering FOTL underwear. He says they're comfortable and he's happy.He's a very honest man so he would tell me if he doesn't like it.Previously purchased Hanes. He likes them too but this had better price.Pleased with this purchase. Would recommend to others.
what can you say true to size color white and clean so enjoy them while you can great price 7 days worth

reviewerName: Aliza M. Beer "Books & Belongings By Beverly ...
reviewText: I really like the bra itself. I would wear it every day but not for nursing (great!) or maternity (I don't see it "growing" with me).The material is not as comfortable as the Bravado ones I own but it's really supportive. I'm a 44DD and I got the largest size (XXL after getting an XL in the Bravado, which was a little loose). But XXL in these bras is mighty fitted. My husband loved it, of course. It looks like a push-up bra.I don't like the criss-cross shape below my breasts. I feel like they should have added more material below the breasts or made the elastic more flexible. Also, the straps cut into my shoulders a bit. However, the bra definitely extends in the front to accommodate growing breasts and nursing pads.

When these arrived, I immediately put them on and they looked great with shorts, dresses and skirts. They were slightly big but I'm a solid size 10 and hesitate to go down in size. I wore them around the house, as I tend to do with all new sandals, to see if they would rub the back of my heel. Sure enough, a blister started to form after a short time of wear around the house. Maybe I just have sensitive skin on the back of my heel. I didn't see any other reviewers mention this problem so maybe I'm just unlucky. Anyway, the style is very cute. I really liked the front and side views but not the back view of the shoe. I wish they had worked for me. I ordered the black and espresso and I wish I could keep them but blisters are a deal breaker for me. I was surprised because Crocs are known for being super comfortable. I hope other people have better luck with them than I did.

I wanted some larger studs, but not BLINGY, real looking. These are set so nicely and really are just the right size. Very pretty stones....price is fantastic for these...I can highly recommend these earrings!
Look great, wash wonderfully, fit well, are well-made, and like most "Lee" pants, run true to size... what's not to love? This is a classic, honestly, and you can't go wrong.

These run true to normal size.  Made heavy duty.  Husband is very happy.First pair of Crocs and wears them on walks all the time.So nice not to worry about dirt or mud...just wash!Keeps them new looking.Great price at Amazon and fast shipping!
This was my 4th pair of Uggs and I'm still in love.  They're durable, cute, and extremely warm.  The shipping was very quick and I had no problems with the product.

summary: Nice fit but not amazing quality
reviewText: I saw a lot of reviewers say these are too long which is actually why I got them.. I'm 5'10" and about 170 lbs. I got the large and they're actually long enough for my crazy long legs! It's a miracle! I just hope they don't shrink - I'm going to try to remember not to throw them in the dryer. Waist fits well. It looked too small at first but they stretch more than they seem like they would. They're really comfy and decent quality.. I tore a hole in it ripping the tag off but that's my fault. Overall, they're what I expected and I'm pleased with them. I will say that after only a few wears, the fabric is pilling between my thighs. I don't have huge thighs, they do rub together, and this usually happens to pants eventually but it's pretty quick. I still think they were worth the price and it doesn't bother me that much but it is a bit disappointing.Update: about six months later, these got a small hole in the seam. It's easy to fix but if you're not one to mend your clothing, you may just want to invest in a nicer pair.

summary: I Buy A New Pair Every Year
reviewText: These are the best water shoes. I live on the sun coast and the beaches are loaded with shells and sharp pieces of shells. They are murder on my feet whether in or out of the water. Once zipped these water shoes fit  snugly and keep all the sharp stuff out of my shoes and away from my feet. They are comfortable and dry quickly. I usually hose these off, but on occasion I have tossed them in the washer on a cold gentle cycle minus the removable insole and then air dry them on the patio. My only advice is size up at least a half size to allow for wiggle room. Speedo is normally sized a little short.
So I bought this knowing that it would probably fit me too large. When I got it, it ended up being extremely large on me, but that was okay. I wear this as a dress now, and my bf loves it!

It is a nice light layer, great over a cami on a warmer day with a slight breeze, or over a heavier top or sweater for much cooler days. If you want to trudge through rain, sleet or snow, or you can see your breath outside, don't rely on it to be the sole jacket of the day/evening. summary: Nice jacket for fall or spring, warm and lightweight.
reviewText: I was out shopping recently and I didn't realize how cold it was going to be that day. I had not brought anything with me to layer with and I stopped into the outerwear section of a sporting goods store looking for something affordable I could pick up to keep warm for the rest of the day. I found myself deciding between this Columbia Benton Springs Zip Fleece and aNorthFace Osito Jacket for Women. Both were just as warm and nice looking in appearance, but the Columbia was 1/3 the price. So the Columbia is was.Color:I picked it up in a color called "Corange". I'm thinking it stands for a cross between coral and orange, since this is how I would describe the color. The "corange" color can easily transition from summer to fall.Material:The material is a nice medium weight polar fleece. The zipper is the same color as the jacket so it blends right in. Nice sized pockets which do have zippers of their own as well. It is unlined and it is hood-less in case you are looking for either of these in a jacket. The sleeves do have an elastic inside them, so you can push them up and they will stay put. The bottom has an elastic drawstring cord on the inside in case you want to cinch it to keep cold wind out.Size:It's definitely full in size. I typically wear a size 12 and the large is plenty big. I tried the XL and was swimming in it. Large would probably fit up to a size 14. If your near a size 10, you may want to go with a Medium. Go with your normal size and you can even wear this over a sweatshirt.A very nice jacket that's versatile. Works for cool summer nights or mild fall weather. Once the snow falls you may want something a little warmer.

This is a nice waist cincher. It can also be worn when doing workouts. It gives support an the rubbery material on the one side keeps heat in which can help you loose that middle bulge.It will help maintain that hourglass figure we all want.
I love how it feels and look.  It looks like it look on the display.  I cannot wait to wear it since I just received it a few days ago.  I love the loose fitting and the color.

I typically like a thicker hoop, but these were for my 11 year old daughter and she prefers the thinner hoops. Since these were on sale and I paid less than $15 for them, is was a good purchase and I recommend them at that price point. I didn't notice any flaws on them, they close securely and are polished nicely.
I was very disappointed. It looks super cheap and cheesy. I gave it to my child to play with because I would never wear it.

summary: They look nice and are very comfortable
reviewText: The great thing about these boots is that they're very soft, and with the natural crepe soles, they feel like covered flip flops. They're also easy to put on, and take off, with only 2 eyelets. The only bad thing about them is the price, which is too expensive and why I only buy them at deep discounts. Oh, and that hipsters now approve of them, which means they're popular, again, and that I may have to quit wearing them until that fad passes.I agree with all the reviewers who say that you should size down one-half size, but I find that all Clarks shoes run a half size too big, so I don't find it unusual.

Cheaper than the Acorns but they felt like it and I would not choose to wear these. They look nice and look well made but are not for me and I don't recommend them.

WOW!  These are grrrrrrrreat!  I wore them yesterday mowing the grass and doing yard work and got them dirty all the way to the top and then just hosed them off when I was finished.  I ordered my regular size 8 women's shoe and it fits perfectly.  I thought I liked the shoes, and I do, but these boots really serve the purpose for outdoor work.  I also buy and wear those two for a dollar yellow plastic gloves that come to mid-forearm (look like the Playtex ones) as they are really good for yard work and now with the boots, I'm the neighborhood yard woman all the other women love to hate because I do my own yard.Update 9-12-12:  I did yard work yesterday and again wore my Sloggers Tallboots with my pants tucked into them to keep out ants, spiders, and grass clippings.  Because feet sweat inside these rubber boots I would purchase them in a one-half size larger, up to an 8 1/2, to facilitate removing boots from a wet foot which may or may not help.  I do it the old fashioned way now, I put the heel of my booted foot on the top stair of the deck and work the boots off.  Just hose the boots off and you're done.

summary: Not for old guys with thick feet from shoe strings to soles. Good for others.
reviewText: This is a great looking, simple looking sneaker or deck shoe in a variety of colors. I wear an 11 1/2 EW (EEE). These shoes were only offered in D widths, so I bought 12D. It fits my foot length and width, but it's a little tight from the top of my foot to the sole of my foot. I wear a 1/2" lift in my left shoe, but it won't fit in this shoe. I wear this sneaker without my lift if I'm driving with only short walks outside the car. The soles don't afford much protection if I step on a walnut in my back yard - so I try not to do that. I bought these shoes in green and red. The first time I wore them, a young man passed me and said, "Great Chucks."
I was actually surprised by the quality for the price. I bought two (one for a friend, one for myself) and they both look fantastic and are wonderful for casual wear. I love it! :) Would buy again.

summary: Not for the full figured gentleman, but soft and comfy!
reviewText: Alright, so if you're a skinny guy and you want some very lightweight and comfortable pants, these are what you want. If you are, like me, a large fellow with a body shape not popularized in catalogs or the media, you do not want these pants. They look like skinny jeans on me, and skinny jeans do NOT look good on me. My wife couldn't stop laughing, which was not my desired reaction.The upside? They're stitched well, are super soft, lightweight, and even have pockets!  Yes, pockets, so you can have your phone in your pocket while you walk around the house in comfort. They have a single button on the fly, so they won't gape open in an obscene manner.All that being said, I would NOT leave my apartment in these pants, unless I wanted to end up being arrested for public indecency.edit/update: Alright, I don't know what's going on, but I got a pair of XXL (thinking this might resolve some of the issues I had with my XL pair) and they are ENTIRELY DIFFERENT. Hanes must have redesigned these pants or something, because my new pair didn't pill up with fuzzies all over them, and they were HUGE. I mean, they are like full-on yoga pants. Maybe this is a design distinction between the XL and XXL sizes or something, I don't know, but my XL pair was like leggings, and my XXL pair is like wearing a pair of Andre the Giant's yoga pants. They're longer and the seat/groin/everywhere IS HUGE. Remember Pee Wee's Playhouse, that old show that was on Saturday mornings? When Pee Wee would pay in his giant underpants? Yeah, that's how much bigger my XXL pair were than my XL pair. Anyway, the fabric is nicer, the fit is much more like what I expect from "lounge" pants or "sleep" pants. In short, they made a vast improvement, and my guess is that all the sizing and fit stuff changed from one incarnation of these pants to the next.I'd post before/after photos, but again -- I don't want to be jailed for public indecency.

Lee Jeans makes a great pair of loose fitting jeans for gentlemen who want a slightly more relaxed look to their jeans; and these jeans are also a good choice for people like me who are slightly overweight. They just plain give you extra room; and that's great!The denim is nice and thick; and these jeans are extremely durable. The excellent stitching helps make this possible. In fact, these jeans last for years at a time without any fraying--even at the bottoms of the legs. Although they are permanent press, I would wash these jeans with similar colors to avoid any color dye bleeding onto white garments in the wash or dryer cycle.I also like the relaxed, very slightly oversized look on the sides of the straight legs.Overall, these fine jeans by Lee Jeans easily rival jeans made by other manufacturers. Make sure you choose the right size and color for you if you're using the pricing and availability chart above on this webpage. If you want a pair of jeans with some extra room in the seat and thigh areas, this may be just what you're looking for. I doubt that you'll be disappointed.Wear `em in good health!

I'm a Levi's guy and have worn them for decades, switching from one model to another, depending on the desired fit. The quality of the last model number I'd worn regularly, however, dipped so low that I had to stop buying them (I know some people like paper-thin jeans, but I wear jeans for the reasons they were created, and so I have no use for a paper-thin jean.)At first, I looked around at some alternative brands. While I did find some I liked better then the Levi's I'd been wearing, I didn't find any that satisfied me. After noticing how the 501 STF's seemed heavier, I decided to give them a try for the first time in years.In the beginning, I loved the new fit and the starched denim, all while hoping that the material would remain firm after losing the starch. Unfortunately, the material was not much different then the ultra-thin pre-wash 501's, after a few washes.I also want to note that the seams were ridiculously crooked on some, including one pair where the seam twisted 45 degrees until it was completely in the front. Having been a big fan of Levi's Americana for my entire life, I'm very disappointed in what's become of the brand lately.update: It's time I update this review, so here goes.Since my initial review, I think the Levi Strauss & Co. has rebounded some and is on the way up. I now own many pairs of Levi's that I like, including about a dozen different colors of the 501 STF. I've seen some improvement in the problems listed above, but most of the improvement has centered on updated styling with both old and new models.I'm still disappointed with the diminishing quality of the old models, but they do seem better then they did just a few years back. I'm also disappointed with the rising prices, but I'll continue to buy Levi's until the sale prices I now pay are unjustifiable. I still find many good reasons to criticize Levi's products, also, but I like how the company seems more focused on today's styles, rather then styles of the past, as they have been doing for decades.My reason for updating this review is because I recently purchased the indigo-navy jeans found here (style #005011404), because they were on sale. They look nice, but they're awfully close to the light-blue rigid I already own, so I'm not sure if I'll keep them.Speaking of style numbers, why can't retailers list these so customers know what they're purchasing? Not only do most retailers not do this, but some even change the color name to something else. Levi's should put the color name on the tag, so people can see it in the pictures and while looking at them in stores.Update 2:  I've been wearing these, again, for several years now and mostly love them.  My only problem is that the butt is too large and I agree with others who say that it used to be smaller.  This causes them to sag in the butt on me, which I really don't like.  I think they're now making them so they fit men who really should be wearing relaxed jeans and this is probably why they're so often incorrectly labeled as having a relaxed fit.Update 3:  A while back, I purchased a pair to wear without washing and they fit great.  I don't know how they'll end up after washing, because I sized down in the waist to a size I never and the inseam is my normal length.  Then I purchased another pair with the same waist size, but longer inseam, just to see how they'd fit after soaking.  I'll update this when I do, but just want to say that the only difference with the other pair is that they're 2" longer in the inseam, but despite having the same waist size, they seem MUCH larger in the waist.  So much larger that they're baggy on me, while the others are not, and both are 100% cotton.  Levi's are just odd like that sometimes.

I normally wear a size 4 or 6 in pants but a large in this skirt was pretty much skin tight. It's a beautiful color but the rayon fabric really clings to your form and even though it's a maxi skirt you end up looking pretty scandalous. Not a fan, I was hoping for a more flowly look.

summary: Runs small in the cup, band too loose - still bounce
reviewText: Wow, this bra had WINNER written all over it here and it looked like a winner to me.  I just got it.  Putting it on was not hard for me, I'm flexible but it will require the ability to reach around the back with both hands at the same time so take that into consideration.  The material is great / quality and sturdy - shiny - pretty - okay... but the breast couldn't completely fit into the C cup size (I bought at 34C and I am a 34C).  So lots of boob went UP UP UP over the top and you know that looks silly.  This is because of lots of SIDE pushing in, for motion control.  The band on the tightest hooks (there are three back there and the padding over them is great) is too loose... need ONE more set of hooks.  I can't order this in a 32D.... I'm not a 32D and they don't make it in a 32D... so that's that. Upon jumping up and down several times... yep, some bounce ----- NOTHING BEATS THE ENELL - NOTHING... and I have worn one of those... so if this doesn't cut it, try the Enell... but finding the right size in that can be a real nightmare - costly... ~~~~ Returning this and wearing Enell 00 instead.  I'd rather wear a too tight but works Enell than an "almost tight and not right / still bouncin' " Champion Powerback.  Also, the straps on this were too short... even when let all the way out.  Hmmmm.  Guess I'm bigger boobed, longer waisted and smaller chested than most ladies?  Most seemed happy here.  If I didn't have Enell, I'd wear this, but I'd still be looking for a better bra (less bounce, cups that fit and a smaller bandsize.)  Darn.  Oh well, Enell isn't a bad option, it's just hot as **** in the summer.  Thanks for reading this.

summary: Waste of Money. I should have bought the ones I wanted.
reviewText: I bought these boots recently. They were a decent price so I wasn't expecting anything fancy, but I WAS expecting the boots to fit. I even looked at the sizing chart JUST in case and measure my foot to make sure I was ordering the right size. According to the sizing chart, I was a 7 1/2 (which is the size I am for all my other shoes). I ordered this size, and guess what. TOO SMALL! Not just a little bit too small, but REALLY small. I thought maybe it was just the fabric and that I needed to break them in. I wore them for several hours several days straight and regretted EVERY second of it. All that, and not even a bit of slack. They stayed just as tight and pinching as they were when I bought them. According to the buyer, if you wear them out you can't return them, so I guess I'm stuck with them. They look alright, but it doesn't even matter since I can't wear them. I should have just returned them instead of trying to assume that there was no way they could get the size off that much. So.....if you for some reason still want to buy these shoes, go TWO sizes up or just don't buy them.

summary: Great for "Larger" Women! Very Comfortable, Moderate Support,
reviewText: I'm a larger gal and have worn Bali underwires for many years. I've seen the commercials for the "amazing no wire bras" that had horrible reviews online. But finding that illusive underwire free bra for comfort has eluded me thus far.So I stumbled across these at our local department store and tried one on. WOW. It was so comfortable I was amazed. It was like wearing a... well, nothing!So the comfort is amazing. No digging in, no pinching, tugging, riding up, etc. It has some good support (not great) and is perfect for wearing around the house when you want support but don't mind a little droop.When you first put it on, things can be perky and well supported. As the day goes on, they do sag a bit more. So underneath a tighter top or blouse it is not the best support. For wearing while sitting at my desk or doing things around the house, it is terrific.I have also snuck out on some errands wearing them and not been bothered at all.They come in a huge variety of colors and a small array of sizes. I like wearing matching colors underneath colorful cotton tee type shirts.Highly recommended with the caveat that they are not the same support as the average bra.

summary: Reducing from 4 stars to 3 stars for fraying!
reviewText: This bra does reduce the bounce when riding and it is comfortable enough to wear from an equestrian point of view. It's soft and doesn't pinch or bind when walking or in the saddle and that is a huge plus over several other brands out there.If you are a truly large bust size (DD and E cups or larger, we know who we are) then this bra will in fact be helpful in a number of ways when you're exercising. It does minimize the bounce and subsequent soreness later. It does offer some stability on the front side if you are a rider and fight that tendency to "tip" forward in the saddle. The straps did not drift around nor did they pinch or dig into my shoulder either while tacking up my horses.There are two reasons that I am giving this bra only four stars instead of five.1. It's hard to do up by yourself. The hooks in the back are small and difficult to attach without eyes in the back of your head or a second person. Doing the old hook it up in front and twist it around to the back and pull it up thing you do with a regular bra just doesn't work well with this one. Front closures would make this bra one I would consider buying multiples of in every color.2. My husband's first comment upon seeing me in this sport bra was "You now have a uni-boob".So... the trade off is good support, no pinching or binding or excessive bouncing while you ride, but your once lovely bosum is now a uni-boob. Thus the four stars.*******************UPDATED REVIEW July 4th 2009 **********************After wearing this bra 3 days in a row in 104 degree temperatures during a horse show and washing it out at night in the hotel room, I am amending my intial review and taking back 1 star! Here's the problem.... The bra began to fray in two places by the end of the second day. The first spot is along the rib band in the back and the frayed area is about the size of a quarter and by the end of the 3rd day it was almost all the way through the band. This is just really poor quality materials - it cannot stand up to friction and wear against the body for 3 consecutive days. It has frayed on the INSIDE of the band against the skin. The second frayed area is on the inside on the front of the left cup. The wear is not along seam either, that I could accept as being a fluke or just a weak spot.Additionally the two frayed areas began to rub on day 3 and were starting to cause red irritated spots against my skin, so I had to ditch the Moving Comfort Fiona Bra all together and go back to the old Enell standby that is 4 years old. I will not be purchasing any other Moving Comfort products again - in the future I will pay the $60 for the high quality Enell bras.

I am 5' 4" and they go all the way to my feet, but I don't think they would be long enough for a tall person. The top comes to just below my belly button, but I am carrying some extra baggage there right now. Ten pounds less and they would be high waisted.Brown color: The brown is a medium, red toned brown. What I didn't expect was how short the adjustment you get for the bra straps. I like being able to adjust the straps, say tighter when needed. So wish there was a longer strap for adjustment. And one more thing  that stopped me giving it 5 stars, maybe it's the fabric, but when I sweat buckets, I really feel the bra's soaked through and it tends to get cold. Maybe the wicking's just not that ideal. I love Champion bras, it's pretty much the only brand I use, but this one falls just that bit short for me. It's still a good bra though. It's comfy and I would definitely be using it when I work out, and I'm a gym rat. But this could still be improved upon.

summary: Cool, bohemian, great with skinny jeans or leggings
reviewText: I love the BoHo look...relaxed, chic, lots of bracelets, leggings or upscale skinny jeans with boots, hipsterThis, at the time of my review, is one of the best blouses at the most affordable price points I have seen to fit right into my style.  I've paid so much more for shirts that begin with the look, but shrink.  Not so here.This is not ballooned out and unflattering.  It's long-fitted, yet fitted at the base so it does not look like a maternity shirt. That said, it's also the one blouse you'll choose for a party when you know you want to overindulge or are retaining water that week.  It's that one--fits well, but not tight so it's always flattering.Pair it with an infinity scarf, skinny jeans, and knee high boots--or pair it with black leggings and black ballet style slippers and stacks of BoHo bracelets.  It's cute, trench, comfortable and a true go-to top.

I bought my normal size (8), medium, and it fits like a glove, comfortably.  When I first opened the package, I was sure it would be too small, but even after a warm wash and throwing it in the dryer, it fits just right.  It stretches.  The length of the torso is just as it looks in the photo...mid-hip.  The arm length is perfect.  The V-neck is low, but not too low. In fact, it's just where I wanted it.  The finishing details on the hem, arms and seams are well done.  I bought white, but the other colors look great and I may get a few more.  In fact, with a sleeveless thin cotton T-shirt underneath, you can wear the Bella T-shirt on top and it looks great.

The seller is very nice & refunded my money. At first, I sent them a picture as they requested, and they never replied after this. But I sent them a reminder email, & they refunded me immediately. They're extremely kind & fast & I look forward to ordering a lot more for them. Their items are all very cheap in price but never really disappointing.
