I am very impressed with this fleece jacket. It's very soft, and is perfect for the weather we've been having. It's pretty much been spring all winter and since we are heading into real spring, I know this jacket will be my go to even on cool summer nights so this jacket can be worn year around if you're usually always cold like me.The color is great - I ordered the Charcoal Heather. It's a little lighter grey than the photo, but is still rich and warm.The pockets are also worth mentioning. Not only are there the normal pockets on the oustide that are fashioned with zippers, but on the inside are two very deep pockets that can hold more items than you can imagine. Think of a Mary Poppin's carpet bag on the inside of a jacket...I'm 5'4" 120lb and the small fits loosely, but comfortably. I am ordering another Columbia fleece - the Fast Trek II style - in x-small because I would like it to be more fitted.I'm hoping with two fleeces, I won't wear them out as quickly because I have not taken off this Benton Springs fleece since it came in the mail. I'm all about comfort and this jacket definitely meets those expectations. Worth every penny, and I have a sneaking suspicion that I will be purchasing a few more in different colors.Oh and the tag that comes on the jacket does say $50 so that's another added perk to this already perfect product.

reviewerName: Dianne E. Socci-Tetro "Never Judge a Book by ...
reviewText: Made of an interesting blending of materials, this T-shirt is light weight non-clingy, breathable, pulls moisture away from the obdy and provides some (50 + UPF) protection from the sun.I got it in this size for two reasons - it was either going to be great for me for around the house comfort and perhaps a sleep-shirt or great for my larger-sized husband. Unfortunately now he is going to have to snatch it from my life-less fingers if he wants it. I love it.It was comfy for around the house wear since it was sized just perfectly. The color is true to the picture (Cobalt). It is a true MAN'S XXL. It fits me by skimming across my body loosely, and falling at mid-thigh (I am round 5'3") and normally a woman's XL or XXL.There are many more pro's than there are cons - as a matter of fact the only 'con' I could find it that it picks up stray cat fur quite easily. However, it is just a easily and quickly cleaned of with a fabric brush.As far as washing - the very second day I was wearing it, I got tomato and some mayo on it (eating a sandwich, darn-it!) I sprayed it with a little Spray 'n Wash, washed it with a load of other clothes that needed cold wash, tumbled dried everything on low (recommended) and it came out perfect. No staining, no wrinkles and no shrinkage.It didn't even pick up any snags from my cats claws or my jewelry.You can't ask for more in a T-shirt.I wonder if I should let my husband wear it too? Nah.

I bought this as a little St. Patricks gift for my daughter who is totally into scarves. The price is excellent and the weave is as I expected, (not too thick, but not see thru thin either). The color is true to my screen, a bright medium emerald green. The texture is soft and slightly silky, whenever she is wearing it I am amused to notice that her fingers are always, always touching it.I'm so happy with this wrap, (and yes a little green with envy!), that I ordered myself one too, for the price you can't go wrong!

summary: Convenient Amateur Watch Repair/Maintenance Home Toolkit (DOES NOT COME WITH CASE)
reviewText: All these inexpensive small home watch repair kits are pretty much the same tools, made in China, and about the same price.As you surf around you'll find this exact same kit, made in China, is offered by many different vendors at different prices here on Amazon. But as the photos show, it's the exact same kit. And that ain't bad! These are handy to have.The zippered case that is included with many other combo kits makes a handy organizer, as these small items can easily get lost otherwise.This one is JUST THE TOOLS, NO CASE. At the right price this one is still worth having, but you'll want to put the tools in something to keep them together (too many sharp points for a ziplock bag) so if you can find a competing vendor who includes a case for just a few bucks more, I think it's worth it. That's why I give this 4 stars instead of 5.None of these budget kits are what a professional watch repairer who works on high-end watches would probably choose to repair Rolex's and other high end timepieces. At this price, the steel and fit and finish overall are not 'jeweler's quality'.But for home use to change your own watch batteries or re-size links, swap watch bands, take the back off etc this kit will do just fine, and you'll be about as well set up or slightly better than the watch-servicing department at the average retail department store.By all means get one of these kits if you'd like to do routine service on your watch(es) at home. It's a great way to save a few dollars changing batteries (especially if you have a lot of watches in rotation) while learning about watches at the same time.If you don't overpay, these are well worth getting.

reviewText: I am from Baltimore, Md. I order this necklace on October 1, 2013, and received it on October 16, 2013. Fast shipping, since the item came from China. summary: Flip Flop Top-Own over 20 party tops this one is just OK
reviewText: I own many Patty items-20+. I delayed to order this for a couple years and finally decided to try it. I got it in black/XL even though the size charts say to get a M and go by bust size, I just know better now. I just knew it would be clingy & I dislike clingy jersey materials because they only make a person look thicker. Although I like the top it is definitely not what I've grown to love about Patty. Its not the usual silky jersey material and its still not a sweater. Its definitely a jersey top thats slightly more abrasive and not as smooth on the skin-I LOVE the material on the off the shoulder kimono top-I own 6 of those alone-(FYI:highly recommend you try those!)  It isnt scratchy by any means, just feels like a cheaper fabric with a looser knit. FIT: it seems proportioned to fit many body types and if you are tall, have a small waist and flat midsection I bet it highlights that quite well. Personally, I am short, I am not over weight but Im more straight figured. It doesn't do anything amazing for me yet it doesn't look bad. Its just not a WOW shirt if that makes sense. The sleeves are extremely long, but from the reviews over the years I see people appreciate that-for us petite people it gets old having shirts made like this & having 6" of extra fabric to roll/scrunch up. I like that its longer/ covers my rear, can be worn with leggings easily or skinny jeans.  All in all, its a nice unique top-Im curious about trying a color. I just feel its slightly missing the mark in fabric, and the waist is too snug-I'd have preferred a little more width to the waist-while the shoulders are extremely wide on me. This could clearly be because I ordered a much larger size in terms of big shoulder size; however, had I ordered according to the size chart it would be WAY too small in the waist. Since Im short -5'2"-where the "waist" of most Patty tops falls hits my hips area so thats why I order up. Id recommend the top, I'd just caution it's clingy and if you have a mid section it will hightlight that from behind especially with the ruching-it isnt going to do many favors I dont care what people think its doing for them extra fabric may be bothersome and add bulk especially if petite or have a roll or two. SHIPPING: AMAZING! Came in four days! That must ship from the US now- good deal Patty Boutique/Boutik- whatever name you use now I still love your clothing!

This is a pretty, simply styled, 3 stone, band ring. The center stone is about 6mm or 1cttw., and the side stones are 5mm or 3/4cttw each. The band is quite thin, about a 1/16 of an inch. It's little too narrow to give a good balanced look to the size of the stones. Narrower than photographed.  The gram weight on the metal is 1.7 grams. A nicely weighted band would be about 3 grams.  The metal looks like highly polished silver. It doesn't appear to have a finish and may eventually need a good polish.The stones are quite pretty and sparkling, but they do not look like diamond. Two of diamond's main visual characteristics  are shooting fire and brilliance. These don't have depth of fire, but they do sparkle like crazy.  To me, they don't even look like CZ. They certainly are not top graded, AAAAA CZ.  Those stones do rival diamond's appearance.  This ring appears like the Swarovski Crystal stud earrings I own.  For the 13 bucks I paid, I have no complaints.  I'm not returning and will definitely wear. It's not my favorite, but I like this ring okay.This ring didn't need to look like diamond for me to like. The reasons I didn't like better has nothing to do with the stone's quality.  I would have really liked if the silver was heavier weight, the band were thicker, the side stones were 1/2cttw each, and if the silver had a rich plating.For anyone wanting a diamond look in CZ, I recommend the Amazon.Com Collection of Platinum Plated CZ Rings. Those CZ rings look like flawless diamond. They are set like diamond, in heavy weight solid silver.  Of course, they're more money, but still reasonably priced.

My daughter saw this in a catalog and said she really liked it. I bought the white one, because that's what she wanted, and it turns a nasty yellow color, for no apparent reason, after wearing it a few times.I found a much better, similar watch with a metal white link band and she wears and loves that one.If you want something quick and cheap to match an outfit for one time use etc, this is a good choice, but I wouldn't plan on using it as your everyday permanent watch.

Although its a nice fit. Sometimes the buttons look crocked. But whatever. It's still a cute and fun and comfortable top.

i was hesitant to order a 1x shirt since i usually wear large and i'm short waisted, but i'm also a dd chest and so i went for it, hoping the style would be flattering- and it is!  it hugs my top like a swim suit and flows over my belly- also, the length is nice and i like the choppy uneven bottom- i'm going to wear it over patterned leggings and with heels to go out in, and over jeans at work.the only downfall in my opinion is that the fabric is kind of swim-suit feeling.  i was expecting cotton, but it is my fault for not reading the description well enough.

SHE LOVES KITCHY JEWELRY TO WEAR WITH CERTAIN OUTFITS AND THIS WAS LESS THAN A DOLLAR SO I TOOK A CHANCE AND THIS WAS A VERY NICE PIECE OF INEXPENSIVE JEWELRY IM PLEASED TO SAY WAS QUITE SUPRISED WITH WHEN IT GOT HERE. MY WIFE LOVED IT AND IS WEARING IT ALREADY TODAY.
The shipping takes long and something that you need to keep in mind before ordering. The bracelet looks well made and has bright colors with a antique gold look.

This pants are great, especially if you like the classics. Despite that these pants not be in style with most tops that you see these days, they have a fit that rivals the likes of the Miss Me JEANS - PARADISE BORDER BOOT, LADIES WOVEN PANTS. There is no doubt a sense of nostalgia in these jeans. I think you can certainly bring these jeans back into style.
EVERYONE has commented on how I dress. Especially the accessories that I use with my outfits. Fun and flirty goodness!

Here's everything helpful I can tell you about this top: the one I received was LONG but some people have said they are short- so I'm assuming there are variation in the cuts (not unusual with items like this that are often handmade in countries like India, SriLanka, etc.).  Its boxy and lightweight, which makes it very comfortable for a really hot climate. (Hint: it likely will look & fit EXACTLY like it appears in their picture!) Its also somewhat sheer, so I plan to wear a thin tank top with a coordinating color underneath (or one could wear a coordinating bra, or coordinating bathing suit top).  Overall: Its very pretty; the colors and embroidery.  I would also say its cut on the large size.  I bought a size UP and then returned mine for my usual size.Lastly: I love so many of the Sakkas brand cotton/rayon blend tops & dresses because I appreciate them for what they are.  They are intricately embroidered and detailed,  very inexpensive, and usually provide an exceptional great fit/drape. They are also fragile items (colors will bleed when washed even in cold water, items will need gentle care in washing, etc.)- but I'm OK with that because of the great look, fit, and price.  I have MANY Sakkas items.  And as far as this company goes...they are GREAT with fast shipping, returns, etc.!1/15/13 update: I returned the first blouse I got because it was too big (I mistakenly ordered UP one size, which I tend to do with very inexpensive clothing), the newest one (down one size) arrived and was perfect.  I just want to mention that the newest one I got was shorter and I liked it better (I thought the first one was cut too long).  So it really is a gamble as to whether you will get one cut all the way to mid thigh, or cut to hit mid hip.  Click on all the colors and you will see the different lengths that you MAY get (but I'm betting its not related to color you select, its just going to be random) and then you'll have to take a chance to see if you get it in a length you like!

summary: Quality is down a bit, but they're still good socks
reviewText: I've been buying Gold Toe socks for my husband for at least seven or eight years.  Although we've tried picking up other brands, the Gold Toe are his favorite.  The cotton is pretty soft, they stay up around the ankles, they last at least eighteen months, and they don't develop holes too quickly.  This most recent pack feels a bit thinner than packs we've bought in the past, but I imagine that they'll still hold up fairly well and won't need replacing for quite some time.
Nice and comfy flip flop. The black, hot pink is sharp looking. Am a size 6 and purchased that size. Fit was perfect.

summary: Comfortable, but not enough support for larger cups
reviewText: I was excited to try this bra based on all the great reviews, but am disappointed with it.  While it does run true to size and is very comfortable, it definitely is not a high impact bra if you are a larger cup size.  I'm a 32D, and the first time I wore it to do a high-impact workout, I had to go change into a different bra since I was bouncing all over the place.Since this is labeled as a "High Impact" bra, I am giving this three stars.The Moving Comfort Juno bra is more expensive, but that one is a true high-impact bra for larger cup sizes.  I love that bra, and will most likely pick up a few more.
Comfy, easy to wear, easy to clean, easy for a little one to get on and off by themselves.  Crocs make great shoes for indoor or outdoor wear.  We will continue buying these as their feet grow : )

summary: This bra is the most comfortable
reviewText: This bra is the most comfortable bra I have ever worn.. It gives good support and it doesn't pinch or bind like some do.. This is the one bra I buy the most.. I have tried others but they just weren't as nice as this one.
cool pants they fit well they are made well but these are old man pands so i sent them back
bought this for my wife: runs a bit on the large side; std keds shoe - no cushion but functional

I liked these so much despite the reviews, I ordered them anyway.  This must have been one of those rare times that the reviews didn't apply.  I found these comfortable, didn't slip off my heels.  I must say the toe bed is just a tad snug but I think once I wear them they'll be fine.  I am happy with my pumps, I'm not one to wear sky high heels so the heel height was perfect for me, and they're quite sharp looking.  I'm pleased with my purchase!

They're a little lighter than I had hoped but they fit well & feel good. I hope they last long enough but would buy them again because of the price factor plus the brand name.

summary: comfy even if the memory foam isn't as good as it could be
reviewText: These Isotoner Men's Microterry Clog Slippers are comfortable even if the "memory foam" doesn't exactly hold up too well over time. The foam becomes worn down after a few short weeks and that's a disappointment. Surprisingly enough, however, these slippers remain relatively comfortable anyway; they are actually a huge improvement over some rather inexpensive and poorly made slippers I had been wearing.Another thing that I really like about these slippers is the very sturdy sole; the soles of these slippers are very well constructed. I can tell I won't trip and fall too easily when walking around my home.Overall, in this price range these are some of the best slippers for guys. I recommend them despite the issue with the "memory foam."

This is one of the most comfortable night pant I have ever worn. Really soft and very comfortable. Also does not shrink upon washing. Has lot of room, very adjustable band. I wish they come in more colors so I can stock up on them!

I bought this as a birthday gift for my college god daughter.  She reports that it is very useful and cool.  So I consider that a win/win!  There were many prints and options.  Also a reasonable price. It arrived on time and wrapped.  Thanks Amazon.

summary: oh YES!  Good fit, super comfortable ...
reviewText: It took two tries to get the right size in these, but I finally got it right. I normally wear 11C/D, but ended up having to go up to 11E to get these to fit comfortably. I'm SUPER happy with them now.I got the "blue suede" color -- but they're really a smoky gray, which is just fine. It's neutral enough I can wear it with my black trousers or my denim jeans and they look great. The sole has the "nubby" super-grippy stuff, plus a deeply ribbed texture under the heel, which means minimal slippage, important at my more advanced stage of life.And comfortable? Oh my, YES! They're about as close to perfect as I could hope. Cloud soft -- great for weekend running around. They don't provide the kind of support I would want for extensive walking/sight-seeing, but for casual wear doing normal day-to-day errands and relaxing around the house, they're just right. They may stretch a bit, but the tie is adjustable, so I should be able to compensate for that.VERY happy with these, and will probably purchase another pair in a different color.
loves this size, it fluffty, makes a easy presentation color  perfect for our university ships quickly.great price .lots of colors to choose from

The material on this hat is really soft but the weave is pretty loose so it is not that warm. It would probably be good if you wanted a fashion winter hat or maybe climates where the winters are not that cold. It is a little more slouchy than I prefer so I am going to wash and dry it to see if it will shrink a little and maybe tighten the weave.

I bought these for my husband for Father's Day. I noticed he was in need of new sandals for the summer. Well made, quality flip flops that hold up to wear and tear, look great, and are extremely comfortable. True to size, and by far the best flip flops I've ever owned.

I mostly wear Levi's 501 Shrink-to-Fit jeans nowadays and have for years, but I purchased a pair of pre-shrunk 501's because I liked the wash. The color/wash I purchased was called "Aged Perfect", which looked like an indigo jean worn for about a year in the pictures. The actual color/wash was close this time, but it looked more contrived then in the pictures. This is fairly typical and it wasn't that far off, this time, but it would have been better if it didn't look like someone had accidentally left a belt sander on them.Another reason I purchased them was because this particular color/wash offered a heavy fabric weight of 12.5 ounces, which doesn't compare to Levi's of the past, but is heavier then many offered today. This is the same fabric weight offered for most shrink-to-fit models, but even though I knew it would seem less heavy due to all the distressing and washing, I'm still amazed by how much lighter they seem compared to my STF's, even after my STF's are well worn and have no starch left in them. And yet, they're still heavier then most colors/washes of pre-washed 501's, and better too, in my opinion.The fit is quite good, although they seem a little roomier then in the past. Unfortunately, I'm so used to buying my STF size that I forgot the sizing is different with pre-washed 501's. This isn't a problem for the waist, but unlike washed STF's, the inseam is about 2" too long. This isn't a huge deal, because I like the idea of having them tailored to fit better, anyway.Overall, I'm mostly pleased with them, but I still prefer STF's and probably won't be buying another pair of these anytime soon.

summary: Allegrs K Womens Scoop Neck Long Sleeve Bar Striped Hem Tunic Shirt

great price. good quality. arrived in good shape and on time.  would definitely buy another one.made a good gift for my husband who works construction- he really likes it.
Just the right length (5'11"), I ordered a small, and it fits like a glove. Super sexy and understated. Fabric is very soft!
unless i lost weight i dont know about, this fits like  an XL.reg tee n all, looks nice, but i dont need a long nightshirt...go1 size small fellas

I was very wary of buying this set because of the negative reviews on this product but I didn't want to spend a bundle and this set seemed to be the best of a bad lot.I used this to resize a couple of stainless steel bands and I have to say that it worked great. First of all, this set contains a lot of items, of which the thing on the top left of the picture, the rubber tipped hammer and the resizer pins are already worth the price of the set because you can't get them anywhere else.Second of all, they did not break when I used them hard, unlike some of the other reviewers' experiences. The kit does not come with directions but I've seen jewelers change bands and I pretty much just figured out how to do it by examining the tools and the arrows stamped on the watch band links. After doing the first pin, the rest were easy.Seeing that it costs at least $10 to get bands resized at the local store, doing it twice, I've already got my money's worth. Your mileage may vary, but I really like this set and recommend it.

summary: Why didn't I think of these...
reviewText: This is such a clever idea, that I am surprised someone didn't think of them sooner...but I am sure glad someone finally did.I like to hike and go for long desert walks.  My shoelaces are always coming untied and I hate it.  It is so annoying to have to keep slowing down to tie my shoes, let alone worry I am going to slip on the laces, if I don't realize they are coming undone.These Lock Laces are the best.  You can cut them down to size, so they will fit any shoe perfectly.They are built great and are quality.  The price is very fair at under ten bucks.Not only can I recommend, but is will be buying two more pairs.
Great fit, and cushy sole. I really love the strap, it adjusts across the whole foot. Decent arch support with firm hold from the straps. May need another color in this one!

summary: thinner than expected and way smaller than marked - XL is more like med
reviewText: I have gotten some AMAZING stuff from Allegra K and will continue to purchase from them but this one was way smaller than marked and the white stripe was very thin - like old tshirt thin. So if it is too tight-  it just looks odd.Do not let this review keep you from buying from Allegra K though - they have some wonderful stuff!

summary: The best pair of comfortable & casual sandals I have owned....
reviewText: Flip-flops can be fun, but, honestly, are they that comfortable?  I never thought so.  They are flat and I do not need that repetitious sound of my feet smacking against the bottom rubber sole--or ratan or whatever material--to announce I am about to make an entrance.  I have been pleased by the quality, comfort and durability of other Teva footwear I have purchased, but this simple Mandalyn Sandal takes the cake.  The fabric straps keep your foot secure and the wedge adds a "cushiony" feel as you walk or hike. Cross a stream with them & get them muddy--grab soap & water or a garden hose and they are new again. I have received many complements and was even asked by someone to try them on (I know, sounds kind of strange, but it was a relative--this person now owns their very "own" pair).  You can go casual or semi-casual with them--love the versatility!  Call me crazy, but I have just purchased another pair of the exact same ones from Amazon "just in case".

summary: Decent deal for a men's thin belt
reviewText: The reason I needed a thin belt is I got a pants/belt combination that calls for a thin belt.  The belt provided in that combo deal was junk, so I had a problem to solve.This belt solved my problem.  The black one I got here is fine for men.  I don't think the belt will last a long time without looking worn.  That's my impression but I'm hoping it stays looking nice as long as possible.

This was paired with my 5-stone ring and my hammered silver band to be stacked in a make-shift grown up looking wedding set. I prefer the look of silver/white gold over anything else, and this has a high shine.It looks incredibly delicate, but has the strength to not bend or warp despited it being on my hand all the time. No tarnishing or marring yet, so that's a plus.Incredible feminine, and fantastic to stack.
I love the color of this scarf. It is really beautiful! I wish the fabric was a little heavier. I have lost my hair to chemo and this scarf feels a little skimpy on my head. I still love it!
These are really cute and really cheap. I haven't worn them anywhere yet so I can't truly comment on the quality of them but they are cute.

The pictures that the seller provided certainly make this necklace appear finer in quality than it actually is, but can you really expect outstanding craftsmanship for the price? The seller's price certainly matches the quality. I love this necklace SO much that I've bought 3 & am seriously contemplating purchasing more. It captures the "sparkly" necklace concept, from the Secret of NIMH movie. It's super cute & also has earrings, a ring, and a bracelet you can find on amazon to go with it! <3

Once again, Fitflop does not disappoint!  These are so comfortable that rather than walk barefoot, which is usually the only way to alleviate my foot pain for a brief period of time, I look forward to putting these on.  They are also nice looking clogs.  I have multiple pairs of Fitflops flip flops and wear then all summer long.  I recently developed a bone spur on the top of my foot so some of my winter crocs and other closed toe every day shoes are no long comfortable.  These Gogh are a life saver!

Inexpensive, yet sturdy enough for my 10 year old. They are adult size, but not overwhelmingly huge. He loves them, and for the price I would replace them when they break or get lost. They came in a box which kept them safe in transit, vs. a bubble envelope which is what I had been expecting.Costume wear or for light daily use these are as good as ones I'd looked at in a couple stores, but priced better.

I bought this bra in 46 dd because I had bought another bra, the Playtex 18 hour bra in the same size and it fit perfectly.  This one was tight and uncomfortable.  I like the concept of the bra but I am going to stick to the Original Playtex 18 hour bra.  It is a long lasting bra with more breathing room than this one.

This top is very attractive and fit just about as expected. I ended up giving it to my daughter because it was a little young wearing for me, but it goes great over leggings for some cool casual fun wear.

summary: DO NOT BUY A SIZE UP!!!
reviewText: I read all of these reviews about how tight these were and how small so order up!  DO NOT ORDER UP!  Normally, when I buy Fit Flops I wear a size DOWN.  So if you are judging by the size smaller you would normally buy, then maybe that is why they all say that.  I ordered up and they fit me a little like clown shoes.  THEY ARE SUPER COMFY so I will  be buying another pair...IN MY NORMAL SIZE THAT I WOULD BUY IN ANY OTHER BRAND.I ordered the color "cougar" (ironic if you knew me) and they are a very cool color of brownish grey.  I love the color, the style isn't as hideous as others claim--they should DEFINITELY be worn with flared bottom pants because the straight leg--look out Flipper!  Super comfortable.  I am going to find a man to give this pair to as soon as I get my new ones in my NORMAL REGULAR SIZE!

summary: I ordered 2 of these.  Love them!!

I was a little worried about the stones with it being an Eternity band, but they have done well over several months of wearing them daily.  I put 2 of them together with an engagement ring, and it's a sharp look.

I love them and I am glad to have found these so reasonably price via Amazon. They arrived early and were well packaged. Thank you to Sloggers and Amazon.

Everyone else was complaining about the cold while I wasn't. (although to be fair I normally run hot anyways).I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking to buy a decent pair of leggings for the winter.

i wish these cost less, i can tell she wont get to wear them too long. she is in between a 13 and 1, depending on the brand. i ordered these in a 13 based on reviews and talking to other moms. they fit her great, some room to grow, but not much. the 1's were way too big. Very lightweight and comfortable.  I had to return them for exchange because the heel of the right fit was looser than the left; not as snug.  I'm waiting for the replacement pair.

Just received this bag.  It looks (and is) smaller that I anticipated.  I managed to get all of my stuff in it though --- mainly because of the many many pockets. The pockets on this bag even have pockets! It would be a great bag for people who are unorganized --- providing they can remember what they put where.The top zipper, while longer than the bag length, is still alittle difficult to get into --- so I put tissues and hand cleaner in one of the outer pockets. Almost all of the pockets have zippers --- an absolute necessity for me.Overall, I would say that this is a "great little bag", but I wouldn't mind if it were even an inch longer. (Also = very fast delivery from ebags).PS --- the zipper pulls do not add to the beauty of the bag (my opinion) but are easily removed and replaced with something more personal/attractive.

summary: most unflattering shirt i've ever owned!
reviewText: i am an hourglass with dd breasts. i was hesitant to order from allegra k because they are an asian company, and i lived in asia, where i couldn't fit into the clothes. however, i've ordered several things from allegra k and have loved the items and the prices! however- this is the WORST shirt ever! the material is a weird polyester, the shirt is wide, but not long (except a little in the back), and the way it poofs makes me look like i'm pregnant but with a flat butt. HORRIBLE! i'm not gonna bother with the return, just donating it to good will instead. don't stray from this company, but DON'T buy this shirt either!

reviewText: bought this for the brand but sizing is a bit small than what I wanted. I recommend it but has to know it runs small.

These fit oddly.  I love hispters but these bunch up between the band and the hip and the band is very tight. They also shrank in the wash, which was dissapointing.  I was hoping to love these but they just do not fit well.

Ok, so I have odd feet: wide in front, very narrow in back, R a whole size bigger than L.  Looking for shoes that did not look like 'sneakers'; since that is all my feet can tolerate-I need a R toe fusion at this point and have an arch issue on that side. So sneakers have been my only option. Any shoes I can find; I walk right out of with my very narrow heels; or they crunch my toes! This shoe: very surprised! So light, not much arch support looking at them out of the box!  Put them on my feet: did not walk out of them, they are cushy; but not as much as expected; but that's ok! I have finally found a more 'moc' looking-sneaker type shoe that actually looks 'girly'! Thank goodness for this shoe! I had ordered the 9's first; because that is what my R foot now is; but the 9's were too big; went with the 8.5's! I am so happy, I now have a sneaker that looks more like a cute shoe! Highly recommend this style of sneaker-shoe!  I also have the white cloth-type; I don't like the real bright colors. My husband says the white look like a nursing shoe; but I ignore that! Only issue I have with this shoe is that I got them to wear barefoot; and my feet do sweat a bit wearing them around the house. I have worn these on my treadmill; I am extremely surprised; with how light they are; that my feet feel better in these than my $140 Asics; which make my R foot hurt at the end of a workout! These are amazing!

summary: only issue is my lack of color ...
reviewText: coordination and that is my issue, not the skirt. I am a dork when it comes to coordinating teal but the skirt itself is comfortable and perfect for the office. I love it even with my challenges with it. So far just staying with the solids - black white off white and purple but I need to expand a bit. Wish they offered it in other colors!

Over the years I have gotten picky about what kind of underwear I wear.  I have narrowed my preference down to boxer briefs, but have had a hard time finding brands that fit well, are comfortable and hold up over time. These Champion boxer briefs meet all those criteria to an above average degree.  For me, the comfort is the reason they are a four and not a five.  I have found them to be some of the best I have worn, but not as good as the claiborne for men boxer briefs that still rank highest for me.These Champions have continued to have a snug fit after months of wear and washings.  The elastic continues to be tight, and they are not developing holes anywhere.I have a 32 inch waist and weigh about 175 lbs and these are about a perfect fit.  I would highly recommend them.  If they had a slight softer feel, I would easily rate them 5 stars because they are so good in every other way.
34B and this bra is perfect. Gives a slight lift, isn't tight around the ribs and gives beasts a natural lifted shape.A++

The pictures didn't give me a sense of the style of these shoes. Nevertheless they could be okay, but they fit on the large side. I have 10 1/4 feet on the wide side, and with many styles an 11, even an 11W, can be a good fit, but these had room to spare behind my heel. I couldn't keep them on my feet walking on carpet, so bear that in mind when you order.

I purchased this as a Christmas present for my wife.  She usually wears small tops (size 4 or 6 dress size, depending on the cut), and this fit her well.  She says it's comfortable, and she is happy with the shirt.

summary: I have once again fallen in love with skinny jeans!
reviewText: I usually am not a fan of skinny jeans because they never seem to fit right (not since I before I had my child). But after reading reviews (both here and on consumer product blogs/sites) and comparing different jeans, I decided to try a pair of 524s. I'm 5'9", 155 lbs., and have full hips and don't exactly have a super flat tummy. I don't like the muffin-top look and cannot stand jeans that are too short. I ordered size 11 Long. And while I think I could potentially go a size smaller, these jeans hug but are in no way tight. They are very flattering and are the perfect length and fit all over. No muffin-top and no high waters! I have once again fallen in love with skinny jeans! Since purchasing my first pair, I have since bought 2 more pairs!

love the way this top hugs your arms but not the rest of your body. I am a size 16 and i bought 2x and it was big on i could almost wear it as a dress. Just be careful with the lace it pulls very easily. But it is very comfortable on.

summary: Good support, a little on the uniboob side
reviewText: Good support. I love that it covers cleavage as I wear it for power yoga and anytime I do a forward fold, the ladies stay in place without spilling forward and revealing way too much.

It's pretty and nice to look at. Good for casual wear. I disliked the fact that the back was open and you could see how cheap the rhinestone is. I found that tacky and disappointing, but I couldn't expect much from the price. I like it a lot and I will wear after I find a way to cover up the back! :)

For someone who likes owls.  This owls were beautiful, sparkly and surprisingly decent quality.  Considering for the price and free shipping. It's a great buy!  Product arrived faster than I expected. I bought six of these as gift and friends love it . :)

I am 5'10" and 170 lbs. The large fit perfectly! They're so comfortable. They hit a little higher than some leggings but I think that's why they feel so great. They don't dig in at all. I think these will be my new go-to workout pants. They're also work well if I want short leggings but I think I'll mostly use them at the gym.

Love this hat as it's functional and attractive at the same time.  Unfortunately, I laundered it instead of spot cleaning and now it's too tight.  Although I didn't purchase it through Amazon, it was a given they'd have it and the color selection is awesomely overwhelming! Deciding on which color to order instead of white.

summary: handlebar mustache vintage adjustable double ring
reviewText: bought this for a friend that loves mustaches, she things they are cute and funny. She ended up loving it and thought it was cute and funny. i paid about 50 cents for it, so I was very happy. i think it only took about 2-3 weeks to ship to me. great purchase.
Good quality t shirt and color is exactly as expected.  Unfortunately, as with most 100% cotton shirts, it comes out of the dryer very wrinkled.

This is the first PattyBoutik purchase i have made, I love the style of the clothing and have read quite a few reviews. I decided the start with this top and I am so glad I did. The cut is very well done and I love the extra length on the sleeves. At 5'3" the shirt starts to cover my thigh and is very flattering. I hope there is a consistency in their manufacturing and sizes and will be ordering other tops from them.

summary: The hot pink one is a fun way to try the colored belt trend
reviewText: I've been looking for awhile for a thin hot pink belt, but all my local retailers and most online stores seemed to be sold out of lower-priced ones.  Since this isn't an item I'd be wearing every day, I didn't want to spend a lot on one, and am so glad I found them here.As another reviewer mentioned, these do run big, so I'd suggest going down if you're between sizes.Also, the belt doesn't have an interior soft lining; it's a rough suede-like material.  For the price, though, this is a great belt, and I'm looking forward to wearing it this season.
GREAT FOR GUYS...WHEN I'M NOT WEARING CHICK SKINNY JEANS, THESE ARE MY NEXT FAVORITES.  THEY ARE A LITTLE BAGGY IN THE THIGHS.  ARE GREAT FOR EVERYDAY KNOCKING AROUND WEAR.

summary: Good price, good product, fits as expected, blue color is true to picture
reviewText: Just below knee length A-line skirt arrived on time, as described. Good casual skirt that doesn't wrinkle easily. You can throw it in your gym bag or suitcase and it's easy to wear. Thick elastic waistband can roll a bit within the fabric, but not too annoying.

I don't like wearing closed in shoes without socks,  but in the summer I want a no sock look with my ballet flats.  These work perfectly.  There is a little rubber strip on the inside back that keeps them from slipping down.

These are the best. I am a walker and these are like walking on pillows. I hope the memory foam doesn't wear out to fast, if it lasts awhile, they will be worth the price. Black/hot pink is pretty. I am a size 6, and that size was perfect.

These are really good t-shirts, that are designed with the man-on-the-go in mind. They are very comfortable, with "moisture wicking." I am not sure what that means exactly, but the shirts do seem to dry quite quickly. They are nice and long, and don't ride up when exercising.On the downside, the very thinness of the fabric seems to make it vulnerable to pulls and tears. Also, the shirts seem to be designed to be tight, so if you want a looser fit, you might need to go up a size.They do seem to be well-made shirts, and they look very nice on my him. I like them a lot.(Review of Tasc Performance Men's Carrollton Performance Running Tee Shirt)
Never made it to my door. Was part of a Christmas Goth basket for my sis. Don't know if I am gonna order from them any more.

summary: Cat pendant is perfecto, brassy chain is a no go.
reviewText: I am from Baltimore, Md. I order this necklace on October 1, 2013, and received it on October 16, 2013. Fast shipping, since the item came from China. I bought several items from this seller, and will write reviews and pI would recommend buying a better looking chain that doesn't look cheap. There is no clasp for you to undo the necklace to put on. You will literally have to place the necklace over your head. So, if you have a larger head it would be nearly impossible to fit over your head. I love the cat, and it is made of excellent material. The four stars are mostly towards the cat pendant. I got what I paid for....I paid nearly a dollar for the item, and it arrived quick. I am expecting more items from this company in the mail. I will also post pictures for each item I buy.

I originally bought one pair, and then we came back on and bought four more pairs.  They are very comfortable, look neat and were a great price.  My husband and I do not like to go out shopping so Amazon is a wonderful resource for us.
I just received these flip flops and it's still 30 degrees outside so I haven't worn them BUT they are so comfy!  I'll be ordering more!
Great basic jeans in hard to find sizes.  Not much to say otherwise.  They have washed up well and held up well for my long and lanky teen.

The bamboo fiber in this shirt is essentially a rayon fiber. The fabric is pretty thin and lightweight. The rayon does improve wicking, but this shirt does not dry nearly as quickly as a polyester athletic shirt. Probably best used for casual outdoor activities where the fiber will not be overwhelmed by perspiration. The cotton blend doesn't have the shiny poly look of athletic shirts and is not as snag-prone. Fit is on the large side. I weight 160 pounds and size small fits me best. The neck is a little snug when new, but it stretches out quickly and is comfortable for me.

summary: When you want things in order!
reviewText: Normally I like to roam free--sweats, Levi's, T-shirts etc. so boxers work well. But on occasion I put on slacks and sweater and need underwear that won't fold or bunch. These work well--fit perfectly and are thin enough to not be noticed like knit boxers under slacks. Waistband is tagged but w/thin tag that is pressed into it so it is fairly comfortable--hardly noticeable. Material is a knit so it is smooth and warm when cold--cool when hot outside. Try 'em.

These boots arrived within one day of the promised date. I ordered one size up and they fit perfectly. Easy to pull on. I'm somewhat disconcerted by the fact that the toe pattern on the left boot is predominately red while the toe pattern on the right boot is a totally different color.  First impression is that the boots don't match. I guess I'm the only one bothered by this since I'm the only one that can only see the toes when I'm wearing them. The red of the pattern does appear in other places on the right boot.  Still I think more effort should have been made to make the left and right boot match as much as possible.  Its almost like I got one boot from one pair and another boot from another pair. Since it took Amazon 3 days to ship them maybe they had to search around to find both a right and a left boot in a l0.  Its not a big enough problem to bother me and the boots are otherwise as advertised and an extremely good price. They seem to be really waterproof which is what I need when the weather here is very wet and I have to slog out to the bird feeder or to the car through puddles of water. Sloggers is an excellent name for them.  Hopefully they are as watertight as they appear so I'm all set for winter.

I strait up love these socks. They are comfortable, cute, and don't cost an arm and a leg like alot of the similar-styled socks are. So the product is great, it got here in a timely manner, and it was a great deal; would recommend!

I'm 5'1 120 lbs. I was hesitant on the one size fits all. However, they fit great! They are a bit shiny. I wear them with a long shirt. The material is not thin on me. Some reviews have said if you have more curves they are thin looking. However not in my case. You can't see my panties at all. They are a little long but it adds more style. Will be ordering more in different colors! I have the brown ones
Love these pants.. nice material, cute, they fit well... come to a good spot on my waist and arent bulky on my waist.. i feel like they are slimming. Love them

First of all, we have turned into a KEEN family.  All four of us have at least one pair.  My daughters love their Newport H2's, and they are their favorite shoe when we go on outdoor adventures.  We live near the beach in a warm climate, and the breathability of the shoe is good.  It allows the foot to stay cool and also adds a good deal of protection.  These shoes are very durable.  Our youngest can destroy the toe in a shoe in a matter of hours, so having the thick rubber toe on these shoes means they hold up better than anything else in her closet.I will say that these shoes will need occasional cleaning to prevent odor - even in 8-year olds.  Fortunately, cleaning is easy in a bucket of soapy water with a plastic bristled brush.  Kids can put these on and take them off easily because of the elastic cord design.  We have continued to purchase KEENs for our oldest as she has grown and passed the old ones down to her younger sister.  The shoes are still in great shape after our youngest is done with them and we pass them on to other families to keep using!  I highly recommend these shoes for active kids who like a comfortable shoe, and for parents who like a durable shoe!
If you like walking barefoot and do not need any support or cushion whatsoever then these are the perfect shoes for you.
Just want I needed, I hate going to the store and shopping for hours for bras. This brand fits well and is comfy.
I wear size Small and it fit me perfectly well. The material is soft cotton and stays put. Good for workouts and absorbed sweat well.
Material is definitely not thick. More or less tshirt material. Guess you could use for layering. Better for spring or fall. The color is not blue like this picture, it is a definite purple.
Excellent bra! It fits perfectly and holds and lifts to perfection. I like the style and wish it came in more colors.

These leggings are so comfy and fit so well! They are not sheer but they do show every curve in your body. They offer NO support whatsoever, so if your body isn't quite so tight, I may not recommend these for public use.

summary: Great legging, with good stretch, soft fabric
reviewText: I love these leggings, they're great for casual wear. I haven't work-out in them yet, but they've been great to wear under cute tops and dresses. I'm 150lbs and I got them in Medium. I think they're a good fit, but they do slide down just a little in the back.
These sandals are super cute but they weren't wide enough for me. They will fit you as long as you have a narrow to medium foot.
These pants are super comfortable! They fit me a little long, but when I wear my tennis I have no problem! I used them a few times to work out and I've also used them as lounge pants!

summary: Such a great footbed but sizing is off
reviewText: The footbed of this sandal is awesome - cushy and comfortable, just as I wanted. Unfortunately, the sizing of this Crocs sandal is off. It's inconsistent with the A-Leigh line, of which I own 6 pairs (slingbacks and closed toe). Definitely does not fit like other A-Leigh wedges.The length is right, maybe a bit long. Unfortunately, the shoe is too wide. My width is B-C, so I often have problems finding a good fit in a shoe. The width of this sandal is in the C-D range. As a result, my foot slides forward.I might be tempted to re-try these a whole size down. However, in my current size which is a true 8 in length, an 8 in the A-Leigh Mini is just not going to work.A huge disappointment in an otherwise terrific shoe. It's just not the women's sizing that I have come to expect from Crocs.Unfortunately, my recent experience with Crocs is that sizing is inconsistent, not only between shoe models but within models also. My suspicion is that the place and manufacture makes a BIG difference. In other words, quality control is a problem.

I ordered this top in the color of pink; however, I received this top February 3rd in the color of black/color.  It is a nice top and the material feels wonderful against the skin.  I will keep this but I would have preferred the color I ordered instead of the substitute which.  In the future, I would like to be notified if the color I ordered is not available.

summary: Next Level Ladies Soft Long-Sleeve Thermal
reviewText: Very soft and comfortable, looks great on its own or under a shirt. I got two and love them both.

For durability, fit and price, these are great. They look fine too. I got the brown ones - they're ok.This isn't something where you get support anywhere. It's a flat slipper, that's it. The thin, flexible sole is good against the cold hard floor.The size was true, no problem. I can walk well in them. They're fast enough to take off and on. For the price I could not complain.
Made with feet in mind. Very comfy, nice color, soft. And beautiful design. I bought them in other colors, too.
I love this shirt.  I actually bought one in another color I loved it so much.  I get a lot of compliments.

I have been ever more disenfranchised with the cheap materials that pass for clothing product these days; the number of returns that I do is astronomical because of that. Things always look so cute in the pics but then when they get here, surprise! It sucks because of cheap shabby thin material, time and time again. Don't get me wrong, there are some successes with clothing on here but they have to get returned at least half the time. Well not only is the material quality on this garment, but there are two layers of it so you don't have to worry about being see-through. It is just as cute as in the pic if not more and I can't wait to wear it to the Farmer's Market to shop. It will look brilliant with one of my other good purchases which is the "Plus Size Top, In Soft Knit, The Perfect Cotton V-Neck Tee" from Woman Within; wear the melon or teal with a cute scarf and some cute sandals.

This bra may look simple, but it is a good one to have around. It works just as well as a Coobie Scoopneck Seamless Bra (Style#9012) in both comfort and fashion. It is a good bra to have around if you are looking for a good one.

summary: What an epic fail of a sports bra! Chafes, band rolls, youch!
reviewText: I decided to try this due to the low price. Well, I was hoping...and hope failed. This bra is so uncomfortable. I'm a 42G. I normally wear Goddess, WAcoal and Anita Momentum sports bras (both wired and underwire. Wired for active and unwired for Pilates). This bra was horrible for me. The band kept rolling, bunching, and chafing. The girls did stay in place, but the shoulder strap dug. There is no way to adjust sizing, so it's either good for you, or it's not.I really appreciate that Glamorise makes larger cup sizes (for us F and G gals), but this bra, um, no.
I like this shirt because it is comfy and fits well. the material is very soft and it is also pretty cute. soft, cute, comfy, and casual. it's a winner
I'm 5'5 and 115, typically wearing a size 3 in pants and small for shirts, so I ordered small. Received quickly, washed & tried on- great fit!

I paired this with a long cheetah-print tank that came from the same brand in a different set and wore it with  black mini skirt and flats and this was just a lovely outfit!This blouse stands out because it is fitted at the bust (if it is TOO tight due to your bust size, simply wear a tank, unbotton it some and you have a great fit and then it's flowing at the waist.  To me, that's the ultimate flattering fit.  This pulls in a tad at the waist, so it is femine and compliments your figure, but you can still have the "in" look of the flowing blouse and show your legs without something looking like it is an unflattering A-line or moo-moo cut.  It goes in where it should, yet remains flowingI wore long bangle necklaces and loads of bracelets for a Boho chic look-- you could also tie it with jeans, you could wear a long tank, leggings and boots--it just goes.It is hard to think "flattering" while it being something loose.  Loose is what is in.  thie one is fitted in the arms, the bust, and goes in a tad at the waist--so it does NOT look like you borrowed your man's shirt.  It looks like a designer woman's blouse, that pairs with today's fashions.

What a beautiful color and the fit is great.  I love to have a wide selection of color in my undies and this bra is beautiful.  The quality is excellent and the price was great.  I wear a 34DDD and am glad AMAZON carries all the things I desire.

summary: I LOVE them on my hubby!
reviewText: I got a 38 by 29 for my husband in "Fume" color and oh boy does he look HOT! I'm in love with this color, plus the fit was awesome and way beyond my expectations.Hubby doesnt have a body like a model, he's got a bit of belly (at 5'9" and 215 pounds), so I was apprehensive about how this straight fit was gonna work out..because it's actually more like a slim fit, but it looks great.I was tired of him wearing "relaxed fit"...too baggy for my taste..too much like "pop jeans"...no offense for guys who like the style.I wanted something...how can I put it?!....something younger, fit and svelte, to make his legs look longer...and I'm very pleased with these 505.I will definitely buy him more, in other colors.
Never before had purchased this brand, but the quality surprised me, exceletes for exercise or just to wear a day one summer.

Allright.  For the money, this bag is the absolute jam.  I didn't want to spring for a fossil bag this year, so I seriously downgraded the cash.  No, it does not look like a $300 bag.  That being said, it looks WAY better than a $30 bag- I'd put it in the $120 range.  Feels supple, has great pockets inside, and is the perfect size for me- That size being large.  I'm a big fan.

summary: Retro Peacock Crystal Necklace Pendant Jewelry Vintage Style with a cute.....
reviewText: This Peacock necklace is so pretty looks so much better than the picture the necklace looks more expensive than what I paid the stones really stick out this is one piece of vintage jewelry that I really like .The chain is long perfect with a sweater looks awesome on I bought  a few and may buy more for friends who like the vintage look.

These Fruit of the Loom classic crew neck T shirts are very comfortable; the smooth, 100% cotton fabric will be comfortable the very first time you wear them. Moreover, the back inside of the shirt has no tag that could feel scratchy on the lower part of your neck. The information that used to be on the tag is now imprinted onto the rear inside of the shirt.In addition, the strong neckband makes the garment last longer then ever! The shirts even come five to a pack for added value--great!Just a few extra words of advice based on my experience: I would wash these before wearing them. Sometimes the shirts come out of the plastic bag package with a very, very slight funky smell that must occur because they were packed the way they were. They may also shrink a little during their first wash, so keep that in mind if you want a rather loose fitting T shirt--you may want to order one size up. In addition, check both the sizing chart above on the webpage and the "pricing and availability" chart to make sure that you choose the right size for you. I would also wash these T shirts with similar colors to minimize the chances of any colors bleeding onto these T shirts during the wash cycle. If you dry these shirts in a clothes dryer, set the dryer on "low" temperature.Overall, these long lasting T shirts by Fruit of the Loom make for great underwear; they could be worn outside but their real purpose is underwear for gentlemen. These shirts last forever, especially with the proper care. Get some and wear them in good health!

summary: Perfect fit for my big old wide feet
reviewerName: KonaGal "When I do good, I feel good.  When I...
reviewText: I normally wear a wide size 10 or 11 in slippers but with these crocs, size 10 is good enough, they run wide and the fit is comfy.  Not much of a lift but fits well and I don't get blisters, now that is a really good thing considering I've got real sensitive skin that rubs off and blisters easily .... can't go wrong with this croc capri

I work outdoors. During the Summer, I prefer to wear fabric belts, because I sweat a lot and don't want to ruin my nice leather belts. I really like these Columbia military style belts, because the fabric is thick and durable, so it doesn't fray after a lot of wear, unlike your typical fabric belt. The cotton material sheds water and dries similar to Nylon, which is great. It just ages very well, unlike your typical military style belt that frays and changes color with time.
I wish I had ordered one size larger. This Crocs are 6W, they ran small. Doesn't stay on feet well. :(
It's cheap and cute.....But since it is for my grand daughter who is 3 and likes kitties....it's perfect.....I would not buy this if your looking for a nice piece of jewelry....

These are very pretty but also very large! I guess I had no idea how big 2 carats really is because I was shocked at the size of these things. Overall a really good deal, I wear them every day and they probably don't look 100% believable because they're gigantic and everyone knows I'm a college student, but I'm very happy with them and would buy again.

summary: 2pcs pack - vintage retro art deco owl head charm studs and necklace
reviewText: bought for a friend and they look great! such beautiful jewelry that sparkles wonderfully. great present idea too! friend loved em! tool about 2weeks - 4weeks to get to me which isnt bad! such a great buy!

Really liked the neon green. Not too flashy but different from just plain black flip flops. Have owned other Reef sandals and a pair I had for years finally fell apart. These were the perfect replacement!

I bought this sweatshirt for my husband, but he just passed away on Christmas, so I'm giving it to my son, who is the same size.  I know he will love it.  It's well made, and a beautiful color.  Thank you so much!!!  I do truly love it!!!! Lynda
This was actually really nice for the price! Just a fun piece that would go with a lot! Can't beat the price... Very cute and vintage looking.

summary: Very nice, a bargain for the price, too!
reviewText: I purchased this wallet for my son who will be testing for his license in a month.  It was very nicely packaged, the leather is of good quality and overall it is a very nice wallet...not too big, just the right size.  I accidentally ordered two, but am keeping the other for my younger son, who will, not before long, be driving, too.

summary: Retro Peacock crystal necklace Pendant JewelryVintage Style pendant
reviewText: Its beautiful and nice and light. I bought 2 for gifts and they loved them. Watch out for the bronze chain. Not strong at all.

summary: used for a 2 week trip, it was nice to have
reviewText: i liked these packing cubes, I havent decided whether they are essential or not. Maybe on my next extended trip I will get a better idea. I did use them over seas on a 2 week trip and they were helpful to separate the items i needed for different portions of the trip. My husband argues that they are a waste of money. I can see his point, but if you are OCD about being organized like me, then you will appreciate these cubes. I used the medium and the small in my carry on, the large went into another suitcase.
Fit great. Very comfortable.  Would order again. Perfect lengh. Not to thick or see through. I was worried they would be see through but they are great.
I will never buy any other brand again.  These fit perfectlt, and the price is exceptional.  The durability is extremely good, and the quality is 4+.
Love these

these brown rainboots are not your typical oversized ones. these fit true to size. I noticed in the beginning they were tricky to get my foot into, however, after wearing them several times its not so hard anymore. they wash easily and function great, no leaks. stylish too

summary: Fits in All The Right Places
reviewText: This bra fits in all of the right places.  The fabrics in this bra do not fade and it is easy to handle. Much like the Coobie Strappy V-Neck Lace Trim Bras, this Bali Passion bra is a must own and you not disappointed from the purchase.

This shoe stretcher is great for avoiding the literal and figurative pain of new shoes!  This stretches length and width to properly break in your shoes before you wear them.  I've tried it with the Bravo-fit Shoe Stretcher Spray too and had a lot of success.
These are the most comfortable pants I've ever worn. Soft & stretchy, but not flimsy.  I love the length!  They are nice and long and flared.  True to size. Really glad I bought them.

10 pairs? Hard to tell which ones haven't been worn yet! Hanes is the only sweat socks that I buy, but I usually buy them at CVS in a 3 pack. Normally ~2-3 dollars @this ten pack brings price to ~$1 @ pair. Quality control is better--all socks fit well,and are typical Hanes w/grey heel & toesand signature in red under toes! Great deal guys--need more like this!

The fit was not as I had hoped, as the groin area baggs a little bit and the high pockets make my rear end look huge. I did keep them, and after being washed and dryed they fit a little better.I am very curvy, but found these to be as any other jeans I have tried- too tight in the thighs and too big in the waist. I have recently purchased the Levi's Bold Curve ID and the Levi's Demi Curve jeans and do love them. These have a much "cheaper" feel to the material than the Bold Curve ID and the Demi Curve jeans.

summary: Beautiful and great quality for the price!
reviewText: It is very pretty and high quality looking for the price.  I will probably order some other colors soon.  I don't know why people are complaining, the price is awesome compared with regular retailers who would charge alot more probably.

summary: Gold Medal Womens warm winter fleece lined leggings-black
reviewText: These fit very well as expected and feels soft on my skin which I like. My only complaint about these pants is the smell. There were washed and I can still smell a chemical smell on them. Otherwise so far they are ok. I hope they will keep me warm when the weather gets bonechilling cold. More updates to follow.. UPDATE!!!!!Do not waste your money, these leggings are good in 50 or 60 degreee temps but not good for 40,30 or even colder temps. They are so thin and my legs freeze!!!!!!These suck!!!!

Amazon notes that these socks are "only made from the finest yarns." They mean it, too! These socks keep your feet warm; and they are very well made and last forever. I especially like the way that they are reinforced at the heel and toe for lots and lots of wear. These athletic crew socks can be worn for athletic activities but of course they could be worn for everyday routine use as well. In addition, they are mostly made of cotton but Gold Toe adds stretch nylon and a little bit of spandex. Oh sure, these socks may cost a bit more--but you get so much use out of them that these socks inevitably pay for themselves.These crew length socks also fit any shoe size between 7 and 12; therefore it is--almost--one size fits all. These socks also come in a "king size" which fits shoe sizes 12 to 16 for the big and tall customer.  Excellent! The sock itself comes in white or black; but the toe area is literally made from gold colored fibers.I would not dry these socks at high temperatures. This could result in the sock becoming too loose on your foot. Eventually they will "bunch up" when you wear them and that's very uncomfortable. Dry these fine socks at a lower temperature. Then they will remain just as comfortable as ever. I know mine do!Overall, you can't go wrong buying these socks. They keep your feet extra warm during colder weather. Moreover, there is a king size for the big and tall customer as well; that size is harder to find these days. They are manufactured so well that you definitely get your money's worth. A good deal!SMILE

summary: What a great pair of shoes!
reviewText: The shoes arrived before the expected delivery date, and in great condition.  I put them on and did not take them off for the rest of the day.  The shoes are light weight, yet supportive, and so very comfortable for walking.  I feel like I am walking on springs. The only regret is that they don't support my very high arch but I will put in an orthotic and take care of that.  I really like these shoes, and will order more in other colors.  I will recommend these shoes to my friends.As a postscript, the more I wear these shoes, the better I like them!  I bought these shoes for the office, not as walking/exercise shoes.  I do a lot of standing and walking around the office and so wanted some comfortable shoes.  These are wonderful shoes, as comfortable as my house slippers.  If you are loooking for a shoe in which to exercise, you may want something with more structure.  But for office wear, these are the best shoes I have ever experienced.

summary: Good for children, elderly, disabled individuals, and lazy guys
reviewText: I looked at the package when this showed up -- it said that these are ideal for children, the elderly, and people with disabilities. I would add another group of people for which these are ideal: lazy fat guys. There are a lot of times when I'm going out to walk the dog or go to the grocery store, but I wear sub-optimal shoes to do those things (i.e., flip-flops). This leads to foot pain, clumsiness, and a general ugliness of the foot (no one should have to see my feet). Lock laces to the rescue!Now, you're not going to get as snug of a fit as you did with traditional laces. That's not the point of lock laces -- they don't replace your old laces in every sense. You trade stability and snugness for convenience and comfort. You'll notice this if you're walking laterally along a hillside, or if you're running and try to change directions suddenly. Your foot will just slide around more inside your shoe and you won't have the stable base that you're used to. On the other hand, you can slip your shoes on really easily without damaging the structure of the back/heel of them, and if your feet swell at all due to heat or fatigue, you'll have a little room in there for them to stretch out.So if you're looking to put these on your running shoes to reduce change-over time in your ironman race, I suggest instead just practicing putting your shoes on very quickly. You won't have the stability and support that you're used to with normal laces.

Works great, very easy to set, stronger than the standard travel lock shackle.  One suggestion is to design in an indicator to show if it has been opened, but that is likely in the works. You can order a 1/4" shackle model for larger hasps. I recommend this over any thin shackle type, which break during travel and can be easily cut or twisted open with pliers. summary: comfy, excellent support for 36G, pretty, and a bargain
reviewText: This bra is a godsend for busty women with shoulder issues.  I have tried on a dozen bras, mostly back-closure because front-close bras in my size (36G (US)) apparently don't exist... none fitting as nicely as this one.  It provides excellent shaping and support, lifts/separating beautifully and keeps the girls in place without requiring constant adjustment (this is sort of a plunge style, rather than full-coverage, so I expected some adjusting required).  There is a plastic friction strip sewn into the upper hem that assists in keeping the girls exactly how you positioned them initially, and surprisingly, it works really well without the wearer being able to feel it.  The satiny material is extremely soft and comfortable, and very nice construction for the price.  I have worn it for a week straight without taking it off (at 36G I have to wear a bra to sleep.... you smaller chested ladies out there, count your blessings!) and it hardly caused any indentations at all, which in my experience is miraculous.  The padded shoulder straps are about 3/4" wide and are very, very comfortable without being bulky.  The band is nice and wide to minimize back roll appearance, a huge bonus.  I must say I was apprehensive about buying a front-closure bra in 36G because the physics doesn't warrant optimism, but frankly the construction of the bra overall along with the sturdy clasp mechanism seems like it should hold up.Two things to note about the fit of the band here:  front closure bands are not adjustable, and I wear a 36 band on the closest hook set (a little bigger than the farthest setting on a 34 band) and this particular band in a 36G fit me perfectly.I will update after a few months of wear on the durability.Update:  I bought 2 of these and at 6 weeks of almost daily use, the white one's clasp broke.  The red one is still going strong at 9 weeks.  Just be gentle with the clasp and make sure you are wearing the correct band size - I think my advancing pregnancy (i.e., expanding ribcage) combined with rough handling trying to adjust it while wearing (again, due to expanding boobs and ribcage... pregnancy sucks) was too much for the clasp, but most people won't have this issue.  I would still recommend this bra, just with the caveat to be gentle with the clasp.  I just bought another one in the next band size up.

summary: Ouch. Poor fit. Would not recommend.
reviewText: First, the positives. This bra does stay up. And, it looks like the photo online. The quality is so-so - not great, but not bad, and I'm not too worried about it becoming deformed over time as some other bras do.Now, the negatives. First off, this is one of the least comfortable bras I have ever owned in my entire life. It is seriously uncomfortable. The stupid wires dig into me. They're too thick or they're in the wrong places or something. I've never had side wires before. As in, structucal wires on the side of the bra, besides the underwires. Seriously. Those side wires are obviously uncomfortable. But even the bra cup underwires are uncomfortable - they go up too high or something. They ride up and hurt me in between my "girls".Additionally, the sizing is off for this bra. I am normally a size 32" in strapless bras and a size 34" in strapped bras (I normally like my strapless bras a bit on the snug side to make sure everything stays up). I bought a size 34" in this bra, and even that was too snug. I'm on the largest hooks and I'm so thankful when I can come home and take this horrible thing off and put on one of my other bras.I had hoped that this bra would be an ideal solution to my desire to wear halter tops and strapless dresses in the summer. However, due to it being extremely uncomfortable, I am sorry that I bought it. Additionally, this is not the most breathable fabric for the summer anyway.

summary: Toasty warm sheepskin slippers with durable sole
reviewText: I'm married to a man with ice cube feet in the winter.  He's usually in a pair of ultra-thick heavy wool socks once colder weather comes.No need for the wooly Sasquatch socks anymore, though.  These sheepskin slippers are just the ticket for icy feet.  The slip-on style is easy to slide feet into and the soft shearling fleece interior offers incredible warmth.  The outer surface of the slippers is a thick suede which is so far very durable against scuffs.The cushioned memory foam insole is an added bonus for my husband.  A daily long distance runner, he often suffers from tired and sore feet...so the cushioning offers some extra pampering.  There's much to like about these slippers.  But the best thing about them is how comfortable they are.The soles of the slippers offer traction against slipping and are durable and sturdy enough for the occasional traipse outside with our dogs.As other reviewers suggested, I ordered them a half size larger...and they fit perfectly.I do have one small gripe about the pair I received.  I ordered them in the darker Root Beer color; and on the forefoot of one of the slippers, some of the adhesive used to adhere the sole was smeared over the surface of a small inch-square area of the suede.  I used a fingernail and was able to scrape most of it off.  Probably should have sent them back for a "perfect" pair; but that appeared to be the only issue with them.  And cold weather is already here...no time to wait.  Can't let those feet get any icier.

summary: Band curls up but good for mobility limitations
reviewText: THE GOOD: I like a lot about this bra. I initially got it for a hospital stay when I couldn't pull anything over my head or arms- the straps detach from the front with adjustable velcro (which stays put very well!) and there is a closure in back making it easy to get on and off someone who can't move much or has a lot of tubes attached.I now use the bra for working out or sleeping in. As someone with a large bust I feel much more secure and comfortable wearing a bra at almost all times, and this is comfortable enough to sleep in. No underwire to worry about which helps with fit and comfort, but it has good support for my DD bust. It has a lining but no extra padding or foam. I also love that this is a heavy duty sports bra without the common racer-back, which cause problems for me. I got the nude "Bronte" color and it works very well under white t-shirts. And it's an unbeatable price here.THE BAD: The band at the bottom, although it's soft heavy elastic, curls up. Almost immediately and evermore after. What a huge let down. Why do sports bras always do this? If the outer fabric is tighter or less stretchy than the lining it would result in the band curling up. I think that is the case with this bra. I'm wracking my brain for a way to fix it. I bought the bra in two sizes but kept both. They both curl up- even the one that is a little looser in the boob.One other small thing: my shoulders are really wide so the straps pull at their little "button holes" in the front at a weird angle and it may shorten the life of the bra.

summary: Very watertight and breathable rain jacket...worked better than the competition
reviewText: The best review of this jacket that I can offer is to relate an experience and how it compared to another top-rated jacket during a recent vacation. I bought this rain jacket for my husband earlier year. This summer we went to Quebec for a week. We took this jacket for my husband and I took a competitor's rain jacket that I've had for a year or so. Both jackets were advertised as "watertight," but my jacket was in the $175-200 range. We had previously noticed while using the jackets as windbreakers that his jacket seemed to "breathe" more than mine. I would get a clammy feeling as if skin respiration was getting trapped inside...almost like you would get with a cheap vinyl raincoat...but my husband's Columbia jacket worked great. The big test though was during a day of whale watching. The weather was drizzly when the boat left dock and turned into a pretty steady downpour over the next few hours. While the boat offered an enclosed, heated section, the whales were in abundance and variety so we stayed out by the boat railing in the rain. When we were returned to our hotel later that evening, I was surprised to see that my husband's clothing was completely dry under his jacket. I, on the other hand, was completely soaked through (and cold). I would have expected the opposite since the Columbia jacket was more breathable.Thanks to comments made by some of the other reviewers, I did order the jacket in a size smaller than my husband normally wears. And it fits perfectly.
