summary: My best type of underwear...sinc years
reviewText: This was not my first experience with that amazon seller. As always underwear arrived earlier than was stated in order confirmation, so I was nicely surprised. I assess that quality of boxers is rather high, and fits as expected to my body size. I cant say now anything about how durable is this kind of cotton used for production, but time will tell. FotLoom is my best provider of underwear, I have worn this boxers since years and never exchanged for any other producer. Good thing for not a high price - this is my assessment. I strongly recommend the seller because never let me down.

The leather is soft and it fits me very well. I got this to coordinate my outfits that had white and it does a good job of holding up my jeans, even around my little pooch. Very decent belt for the price.

Nice hat, nice wide brim to protect from the sun, perfect summer hat and works in the pool and water park as well. My Grandson is 18 months and while it is a little big, he will be able to wear it for a couple of summers.

Great priced lounge wear, probably not ideal gym pants unless you're doing low intensity stuff. No gusset make these pants a non workout item, twisting and bunching suck, I want my active pants to be as sturdy and as functional as possible, I'm already suffering, why add pulling at crotch wedgies to the list of horrors? They have a really good hand, heavy weight material, non see through and seem to have some quality compared to the 'Sakka's' pant which is almost identical. These are better in quality and look. They are very long, I'm 5'7 and they drag the floor.Overall, they are nice and perfect for lounging or walking or shopping at Target, boot camp or HIIT workouts? Say NO!
I like the quality of material and design of those earrings but they too small for adults. I will not recommend it.

This is a good tool for removing spring bars.  It's got a few different attachments.  It's also got the attachment ends for driving link pins out of watch bands.  I bent one while removing some links and had to straighten it with pliers.  It's got a couple of spares though, so it should at least last for adjusting a few watchbands.  Much cheaper than taking it to a jeweler to adjust anything.

OK, these are not going to be the cutest flipflops you own. But, if you're like me and I usually wear them with yoga pants or jeans - who cares! These sandals are SUPER comfy and I love that they have a little lift on them so my pants don't drag. They're comfy enough for all-day wear and honestly, if I get a little workout, AWESOME! I definitely started to feel it in back of my thighs after a few hours, but it was that "good" kinda feel - not painful or anything. Really looking forward to wearing these more!
It never showed up. It was going to be part of my mothers Christmas gift bag, but it was not meant to be.
Great fit. Very comfortable. I like that they can be dressed up or kept casual. If you need to make them bigger you can on top. Great for those whose feet sweal in the summer.

How can you beat $.01 for a price on earrings? Who cares if you lose one? LOL!! These are some cute little earrings for anyone, especially little girls. If you have multiple piercings in your ears, these would look great lined up in one ear...maybe a nose piercing...whatever. They have enough bling for no money. Hypoallergenic will always get my attention.

summary: comfortable, but needs more heel padding and color is off
reviewText: Comfortable Clarks' shoe, good construction, as expected.  However, there's very little padding at the heel, which is a recipe for blisters - it's not as bad as most women's loafers, but I was expecting more based on what I've seen on other Clarks' shoes of similar style.  Also, the color is more purplish than mahogany... that's a matter of personal taste, though.

I wanted a long, loose (to hide figure flaws) lightweight short sleeved shirt to wear unbuttoned over a camisole. This isn't a glamorous top but it's comfortable, it's very nice, and it fits my needs.

I am located in MD. I bought this tunic on September 6, 2013, and received it on October 2, 2013. I consider this quick, since the item comes from China! I am 5'8 and weight 145 lbs, and I ordered the Medium size. It fizs perfectly, and it is long enough. It looks great as a Halloween outfit, when it is paired with black pants, and black boots. The material is excellent! Great sweater-like material. It is a great long sleeved tunic to be worn in either the Fall or Winter seasons.

summary: Bought for a gift - its so so
reviewText: Not as impressed with it in person. It fit the bill but wasn't show stopping or have the wow factor at all.

This is one of those amazing tops that you put on and have that Can't-help-that-I-am-this-damn-hot look. You don't look like you're trying, but you can't help but get attention.  I love the looks I get in this top as I roll in for a cup of coffee like I just don't care.It is a thin material (which I love) and it washes well time after time.  You will LOVE this top.I am busty but this top downplays that a little...which is good.  Makes me look thinner and just so damn cute.  I am here ordering other colors.  I am 5'10 and normally wear a large.  I ordered an XL in this and it is perfect.  As I said, I have an ample rack....this would be too small and short for me in a regular Large.**update**. I don't know how many more positive things I can possibly say about Patty Boutique, but I wanted to leave a note that today I received a personal email following up on this order to make sure I had received it (several weeks early) and that I was pleased.  I responded positively and they wrote back within minutes thanking me.  This is the kind of customer service I respect and will continue being a Patty customer...not only because the clothes are awesome, but because they clearly care about what their customers think.  BRAVO.

summary: Light airy comfort at a great price...
reviewText: I gave a detailed rating of this item in the yellow color, but will re-cap. Ordered two, one black one yellow and both fit the same and were just what I expected at the price point - unstructured slouchy lightweight knit sweater for casual wear. They had a slight odor from the package, but it was not awful and washed out easily. Washed gentle cycle and air dried and results were fine, dried very quickly. Great to throw on over leggings or skinny jeans. Loose and baggy fit is forgiving to all figures. At this price, as all Allegra K items I have ordered, you can switch up your wardrobe inexpensively, but keep in mind that the clothes were not made to last forever but are cheap enough to allow you to wear for a few seasons and not feel guilty about replacing. Works for me!

summary: Love this great medium tote/purse.  Not heavy before adding my regular items.
reviewText: I love this purse.  I just arrived and it is great.  Good zippered middle pocket.  Yes, the handles are too short for shoulder carrying, but I can adapt.  Plenty of room for what I need to carry and enough space for a book or Kindle. The interior lining is a light golden color which is a big plus for me, I can see the bottom. The blue color is bright and goes with all my Levi's jeans.  I am very casual.

I have a waistline of about 25-26" and it fits me great! This will look great with a long flowing dress. I also have it in red. This belt/waist cincher comes in many different colors, which is a plus!
The material is soft and comfy.  The fit is loose but nice.  I love the graphic and the tunic style length.  It is lightweight and one of my favorite sweaters.
Theses are really cute. I wish they came in half sizes. I always wear a eight but these eights were a little long. I am going to keep them, hoping that the summer heat will make them perfect.

This purse has a lot of compartments, plenty of places to put all you stuff, it looks nice. The strap is nice, it doesn't hurt your shoulder but I would have preferred a thinner strap, the picture doesn't show the strap as wide as it is it seems. But all considered I would buy it again, it is sturdy and has a nice appearance.
Material is very good and the size is just right. This socks are made for last. They are very confortable and does not make you sweapt.

These sketchers are very cute.  They are a lower cut then the regular Go Walks.  Also they are a little bigger in the heel area.  I always add an insole for added comfort but with these I am also going to add a heel liner.  They are more stylish then the regular Go Walks so they are worth the adjustments.  If you have a wider foot they should be fine as is.

This was impressive for the price. It has a beautiful long chain and it is just lovely for casual and party wear. I love it and recommend it to anyone. I took the ribbon off because it made it look cheap, but it is still a beautiful peace that is 100% worth it. :)

summary: Well Crafted Belt Of Excellent Quality Leather
reviewText: The belt is just great. The leather is supple natyural grain, strong and sturdy with an over staturated dye and tanning that looks fantastic. It's got a nice matte finish which I prefer (shiny is usually a sign for lower end hide). The thickness and quality are what I would expect to see in belts costing twice as much.The buckle is well cast, solid and sound. The matte finish compliments the leather quite well, giving it an upscale yet understated look. The versatility is a plus too as it ashould work equally well in suit slacks to jeans.One very thoughtful touch is the at the loop where the buckle is - it's rivitied with two thick steel snaps. Most belts in this price range and higher are stitched. So you have to be very careful when pulling or cinching because this is the weakest link and stitches tend to burst over time. Not the case here:This not only makes the belt extremly strong you can replace the buckle by simply popping the two snaps and changing out the buckle. Excellent quality, thoughtful design and a great price make this belt an excellent value.

This is a great sports bra. It fits right and is durable for any kind of fitness. What more could you ask for? Then again, the way this bra feels, it almost feels like a Coobie Scoopneck Seamless Bra (Style#9012). In my book, that makes it a great bra; which it is.

I wanted a good shoe for around the house, market, yoga, etc. This is exactly what I was looking for. Perfect fit, minimal arch support (so beware if that's an issue for you). The only draw back is they don't have holes to let your feet breath. I don't wear them for too long during the day so it's not a huge issue.All in all: very pleased.

These boots are okay. The problem is the image posted by seller makes them appear taller than in reality & to have better tread on the bottoms than they truly do. Also, they are extremely comfortable until you have walked miles in them, because there is no cushion to the soles really. However, you can just by insoles to add comfort to them. They're very cute, but one of the lower side straps was bent over during shipping. Not sure if I should flat iron this or just glue it down.
I love the fit of this pair of pants.  I love the color as well.  I bought the right size on the first try.  I would recommend them to others

summary: One for me and one to donate.
reviewText: Toms continues to donate a pair of shoes to the needy for every pair bought.  Just as the name claims, these are a classic.  The cloth construction allows a bit of stretch for my less than perfect feet.  But the construction is designed to not get out of shape.  They are nice enoughbtonwear with pants to work.  My thirty something daughters have a "thing" for them that they share with their friends, so I always have a welcome gift to give.  Now I have found that I share the enthusiasm.  Try them, you may join us.

summary: So much more than flip flops
reviewText: When I was unpacking these, my hubbie...is thrilled I've gotten filp flops,  not.  But after showing how well constructed, the orthopedic heel and arch he's a fan too!

My daughter loves Vans. They are simply awesome whenever we order them and always arrive just as described. She wears a women's 9.5 so we ordered Men's 8. They fit perfectly. She'll be getting her Spring pair soon! But Amazon doesn't carry the ones she wants so I'll have to order them directly from Vans.

This is a thick, well made shirt. The fabric is warm enough in cold weather but breathes in warmer weather so it doesn't feel too hot or stuffy like other thick shirts. The large really is a large, it is long in length, and holds up after washing in warm water without shrinking. The pocket is an added bonus.

summary: Affordable, comfortable, and does the job properly
reviewText: I bought these Champion compression shorts for our son, who is doing wrestling.  I was pleased by how well they are made, and how well they fit.  Adult medium fit him snugly but not too tightly, and it supports all the important parts too.I just ordered a second pair so I don't have to wash them every night after practice.  I will update this review when the season is done, to report on how they held up.  But with him growing quickly, I already expect to replace them next season.

I had such high hopes for this blouse, because I love the style. Unfortunately, it was so small I couldn't wear it without my fear that my bosoms would fall out. So I exchanged it for a size larger - hopefully that one will fit *just right*...

This a wonderful long sleeve top. Not only is it stylish, but it simply comfortable. This top makes for a wonderful alternative to the likesJess & Jane Tops for Women-3/4 Sleeve Poly/Span Ruffle Sublimation Tops"Paloma"(Style#74-281); but that's just me. If anything, this is a great top for any season.
This was a gift for my sister. She loves it,. Material is good and is very fancy. I will definately recommend it.

This thermal is very comfortable and the length is perfect. I'm 5' 4" 120 lbs and ordered the medium in grey and it fits great - a little roomy like on the model but that's what I like. I also love the color. I ordered two more in white and black now that I know my size. It is very versatile and good quality. I can't wait to layer with the new colors!
These pants are too cute. They are regular sweat pant weight but are capri or crop length because of the elastic at the bottom. Love them

Levi's makes a great pair of loose fitting jeans for big and tall gentlemen who want a slightly more relaxed look to their jeans; and these jeans are a good choice for people like me who are slightly overweight. They just plain give you extra room; and that's great!The denim is nice and thick; and these jeans are extremely durable. The excellent stitching helps make this possible. In fact, these jeans last for years at a time without any fraying--even at the bottoms of the legs. They are made from cotton and they are permanent press. However, I would wash these jeans with similar colors to avoid any color dye bleeding onto white garments in the wash or dryer cycle.Overall, these fine jeans by Levi's easily rival any jeans made by other manufacturers. Make sure you choose the right size and color for you if you're using the pricing and availability chart above on this webpage. If you want a pair of loose fitting jeans, this may be just what you're looking for. I doubt that you'll be disappointed.

I was looking for a casual bra to wear when I worked in the yard and chose this one based on reviews and price.  It's going back.The bra is thin with old fashioned pointed nipples.  The material fails to stretch to adapt to breast dimensions, causing some areas to be too tight and others too loose.  It felt uncomfortable (not too tight - just too rough) as soon as I put it on.Because it's a Bali, it's probably durable and would hold up over time better than cheaper bras but I just can't get over the positive reviews so I'm giving it only one star.For a better fitting and much more comfortable bra, try a Victoria's Secrets wireless cotton bra.  It gives you the smooth coverage you want, excellent support, and you won't even know you are wearing it.

summary: Very cute but feels like a C cup instead of D
reviewText: Adorable bra, lovely light blue color with soft polka dotting throughout.  I like it so much that I don't want to send it back but the D cup feels more like a C, so I just use a bra extender and it's fine.  I don't like to order a larger cup size than that because the wires tend to jab up into the underarm, so the extender helped.Soft fabric, really nice color, well-made.  I would give it five stars except for the cup size, which may be me and not the product, not sure.Nice to order from Amazon and not have to go bra shopping. Good return policy, too.
very cute dress, COMES WITH BELT, fits great, not to short, true to size, very comfortable, good quality, great price. LOVE IT!

I haven't been a fan of flip flops since 2003 when I wore some on vacation and developed plantar fasciatis and suffered with it for 4 yrs.  My feet are finally better, but I haven't found flip flops that feel comfortable enough to wear for extended periods.  These are great.  Some features I love:  soft feeling of the foot bed, a decent amount of arch support, thong that doesn't rub toes, the cute strappy style.  I imagine they will become even more comfortable with time as my foot molds to the shoe.  They come in a huge variety of colors, and priced at $15 to $20, they are definitely worth it.  I may invest in a few more colors.

summary: Good quality, subtle belt; size runs large
reviewText: I'm really happy with this belt. The leather is the kind that is thick, stiff, and rubbery, I'd say, but it's just a personal preference that I generally much prefer softer leathers. But I like the width, comfort, and quality of this belt nonetheless. I especially like that the buckle is not flashy and not too large, since I was looking for just a subtle belt to wear with slacks or black jeans.The belt is 1.25 inches wide, and the buckle is just under 2 inches at its widest point. The size for this brand runs large. I usually wear a size Large (using a hole at about 35 inches), but I ordered a Medium, which works great.

summary: Small, well made and wear well.
reviewText: I typically wear a pair of silver hoops as my every day earing. I put them on and don't usually take them of until I change into another pair. So the hoops I wear need to stand up to showers, sleeping in them and other everyday abuses. These little 1 inch hoops do all of that beautifully.I haven't had any problems with the clasps loosening or the silver tarnishing. They hold their shine nicely and don't have any issues with bending or misshaping.They are small, only about the size of a quarter, so they are also a small enough size that they would be fine for young girls. I like these so much, I'm going to order my 10 year old daughter a pair for herself as well.
My husband asked for more of these after I bought him some for Christmas.  He wears them hunting and says they keep his feet warm! (He never brags on anything, so this is great)
This is a very comfortable shirt. This is the second time I have purchased one of these. I will buy more. Thanks
I have 4 or 5 of these in different colors and just ordered 3 more colors.  They are soft and fit comfortably. Flowy and flattering.  True to size. Nice length and well made. Really cute.

summary: Pretty comfortable, not enough padding for my liking
reviewText: I like this bra well enough, but I thought it would have a bit more padding in the cups to avoid "nipplage," if you will.  It does run on the small side.  It is, however, very comfortable and I will continue to wear it around the house or under several layers when out and about.  This is merely speculation as I'm not a large-busted woman, but this bra probably would not offer enough support to someone with a larger chest.  If I tried it on in the store I probably would not buy this again due to the lack of coverage (personal preference), but seeing as it's comfortable and I'm lazy about returning stuff, I'll keep it.

I love the pockets in this. I am so happy it arrived an original Allegra K item, and not a no name imitation. This is so soft, and fits true to size. I wear it constantly. It can be paired with leggings, jeans, even capri length leggings, or shorts. I will wear this to death. It can even be worn in the winter months, with a turtle neck under it. Gray, white or black. A perfect year round piece in your wardrobe. Confirm with the seller, you will be receiving an Allegra K piece, or a no name knock off. If it's Allegra K, you will LOVE IT.

I did not like this blouse on or off. In fact, by the time I got around to it. I just put it in the Good Will pile to give away.I'm not a fan of PattyBoutik. All the blouses I bought from this company, I gave away. I travel a lot and just did not havethe time to send them back. Don't waste your money.
Great with jeans or a long skirt.  Easy wash and dry flat.  Soft.  I am small and the small is is good fit.  Love the color.

This is the second pair I have purchased this month.  I really like the leather strap between the toes.  It is soft, not like the rubber straps.  The comfort and constant massage by the crocs bumps is wonderful.  Living in Florida I wear flip flops while hanging out at home.  Now I have an indoor and an outdoor pair!  Would recommend to anyone.  I usually wear a 51/2 but the 5 fit me perfectly.
They are very soft and comfortable and are on the long side if you are looking for that. I like them

summary: These stay in place and are comfy
reviewText: I have two pairs of these (in nude and black) that I bought about a year ago at my local Jockey outlet.  I love them!They are *much* more comfortable than my Spanx shorts.  While they don't have as much compression as Spanx, they do suck you in a bit, and help create a nice smooth line.If you have a thin skirt or dress, you will be better off with a regular slip since you'll be able to see the outlines of your legs with these.  If you have a non-see-through fabric, though, these work great to keep your fabric from clinging.These also stay in place for me, with no rolling up at the bottom or down at the waist.  They're very comfortable!They also run true to size.

summary: I should have read the reviews before purchasing...
reviewText: I should have read others' reviews before purchasing. Alas, I purchased impulsively. Had I read others' reviews, I would have known that these yoga pants run quite small (by American sizing standards). I am a size 12, so L is usually right for me, but these in a L are much more form-fitting than desirable for yoga pants. The fabric and color are fine, but the length is rather too long for me (I am 5'3"). I am in the process of trimming down, so in a month or two, this size will be just fine, so I won't return the item.

These short are OK, but the pockets aren't easy to put your hands into, and the material is not as  nice as the Under Armour flex shorts.  I paid twice as much for the Under Armour shorts, but am much happier with them.

summary: Gave it as a gift, she loves it
reviewText: Gave it to my sister for Christmas and she loves it. Very long cord and that's the best part.  Great product.
Looks cute- Easy off & on- Great colors- Give the feeling of vintage jewelry- A nice piece with a sweater- or over blouse.. I highly recommend as costume jewelry- great price-

summary: now I've got a pair too
reviewerName: D. Deutsch "Chance favors the prepared mind."
reviewText: I finally bought a pair of Crocs after finding them for the reasonable price of $19.99 on Amazon. I like Crocs, but I refuse to pay something like $30 to $45 for what essentially amounts to a pair of plastic slippers. I was skeptical of their usefulness, but they fill the niche (for me) between slippers and clogs pretty well.The fit was surprisingly small. I mean they are wide and clunky, but seem to run a bit short; I bought the 9 for my 8 1/2 foot, but there is not as much room in the toe-box as I expected. Despite being plastic, the shoes breathes very well and are comfortable enough for extended wear. Running to the mailbox or cleaning the house is an ideal use for this type of footwear. Beware taking out the garbage in the morning as the dew seeping through the holes will come as unwelcome surprise.Not that I knew I needed them, but Crocs are popular for a reason.  They are great for lounging around, but I am skeptical at the touted advantages of some of the more specialized models. Now, having bought a pair I feel existentially complete.Update 10/12/2012I am writing this review after about a week's worth of wear. The fit was simply too small and I had to give them away. I am trying the men's size 10 to see if they will be more comfortable. In my case it may be a matter of going a full size up.

summary: do not reccomend wearing while driving
reviewText: these glasses are really cool but make everything super dark even with the sun out. I am not entirely sure what their purpose is since you can't wear them while driving because if the sun comes n a an angle, the sun reflects back into your eyes and you cannot see a thing! and if it isn't too bright out, the lenses make everything too dark.

This is nice for a casual semi- formal evening out, it fits very well, in fact this label is very good in it's sizing, as the info is accurate.It falls well, and obviously long for tall women, this is the only setback, as the design at the bottom will be affected once cut.I honestly like this label!
Needed a pair of "skinny" jeans.  This pair is terrific.  Even though I am not used to wearing anything that is tight, the feel is very good.  They look great as well.

I am a very active 50 year old woman. My chest is large for my size and I have a hard time finding a sports bra that works. This is one of the best bras I have found. It dose not flatten my breast. I highly recommend this product and seller.

These are my first Easy Spirit sneakers and I really like them. They are very lightweight and cushy. I like the laces as well - they are sort of an elastic with plenty of give, but they stay in place. I wanted a pair of shoes I could wear instead of riding boots when just working around the barn (and not riding, these are NOT suitable for riding). As the summer wears on boots get very hot to wear for long periods. These sneakers have been good at keeping my feet comfortable in 100 degree temps so far. Additionally, they don't slip and the width is perfect with socks. I would totally buy these again at some point.

reviewerName: D. Deutsch "Chance favors the prepared mind."
reviewText: The Stedman series of polo shirts is a step up from some of the other Hanes shirts that I have purchased. The fabric is substantial and generously sized with a pleasant texture. The color is vibrant without being garish and holds up well in the wash.

summary: very comfy and not granny looking
reviewText: I love these - they are very comfortable and don't ride up at all - they can also be worn as a bathing suit bottom for a solid bikini top or a bikini top with black in it....

I bought two of these shirts to wear under my scrubs. I'm happy with the feel and fit of the material. I love that the wrist has a band it keeps it from creeping up and doesn't hide my watch. The neck collar is high and takes some getting used to but covers well. I'll likely order more in the future if the price is still this great.

This is a very comfortable bra. However I gave it 4 stars because the cups have a very slightly coned shape which the girls have to fit into but are ok once secured. It is a very comfortable bra.  Will do the job well.
I do have big, wide feet, but not that different from the norm.  I found these very small, and so narrow my feet cramped immediately.  I returned them.  Bummer.  Bogs were great though.

summary: Good for the price, comfy and sturdy
reviewText: These shoes are exactly as described, they are very comfortable, and true to my size. I bought a size 8 and they fit fine. These are great for in the house after wearing muddy boots and I am sure I will wear them to do some gardening this summer.  I like them, they can easily be rinsed off, they are comfy and my only complaint is that they are loud when you walk on hardwood floors or down wooden stairs.
these shoes are very bulky and almost look like clown shoes, they are comfortable though, but very pink and vibrant
Is slightly large but looks like a dress also! :) very warm and really comfortable. I love it, very casual.

summary: Nice enough, you only get one.
reviewText: Pretty and so far seems sturdy. Yeah, I thought I was getting two when I ordered.  Should not have the main picture be with two clips.
good show polish, but not as great as some reviews.  No better than Kiwi from what I can tell.  It does have the 'unique' factor in that its hard to find where we live.

allegra k is a hit or miss company, sadly this shirt is a miss. the picture makes it look like a dress, i ordered the XL (which is the size i buy all my allegra k clothes in) and the white band that goes around her hips hit me right across my belly- snuggly. i gave it to my sister in law and she plans on wearing it under shawls/sweaters because it's snug on her too, but she likes the color. if you're a small person, go for it, but don't expect it to fit like a dress.
Very eye catching. Jewels need better glue, as it did not hold up as long as I would have liked.

summary: ALLEGRA K LADY ROUND NECK LONG SLEEVE BAR STRIPED SLIM TOP SHIRT
reviewText: REALLY FEMININE STYLING ON THIS PETITE SHIRT WAS A GIFT FOR A LITTLE PERSON IN MY FAMILY SHE GOT THIS AND SOME BRACELETS I GOT FROM AMAZON ALSO SHE LOVES IT WEARS IT ALMOST EVERY WEEK WITH SOMETHINGLIKES THE WEAR AND WASH FOR A SOFT TOP FOR WINTER  AMAZON ROCKS!!!

When I compare the picture to the actual shirt I received I need to assume that the model is not more than 5' tall! As pictured, the shirt reaches down to her thighs, I am 5'8" and mine hardly covers the mid section even I do NOT have an extra long upper body at all and ordered the largest size available.I ordered this one and some others for a 3 months trip to Europe and I have to say that none of them was even close to the size I expected. As much as I like Amazon, and i am a loyal customer for years,  more and more sellers are offering goods here that absolutely do not fit any sizing norm. I will return item and won't ever again order these "Asian inspired", meaning "sized for kids", items. I might have to make a "blacklist" of sellers :)

I always receive many compliments when I wear this to work.  I really love that you can just pull out of dryer and hang until ready to use...no ironing required.only issue is that the neck is a nit snug and there is no extra in the opening....but once it's on it looks great.
These fit WONDERFULLY, they stay in place thanks to the rubber backing for your heel, just small enough to hide in flats. I LOVE these and I recommend them!

summary: wow now I can work better
reviewText: This belt gives me plus 4 strength, +6 in charisma and +8 in intelligence.  You should seriously consider buying it
I like charm bracelets I have many of the them that is way I got this one I like how the ribbon gose in and out of the chain it fit well and looks good  thank you
This is both mine and his go-to sock. They have all of the needed colors and you get plenty of pairs for the price unlike stingy singles or small packages.

I am happy that i made this purchase.  I really love these Pretty Bands.  They look so very pretty on.  I purchased (3) and I wear them all together and they look just GREAT!Sincerely Farrell E. Manuel

What a lovely necklace! It is quite large but that is what makes it cute. Seems sturdy and of good quality. With this price, you can't beat it so go ahead and buy it! Do not hesitate, I highly recommended.
I have 2 of these now- they are comfortable and have a great fit. They are quite well-made for the price and are very flattering.

reviewerName: D. Deutsch "Chance favors the prepared mind."
reviewText: My son needs dark dress pants as part of his high school's dress code. These are perfect. Cheap, durable, and color-fast. However, I don't know that I'd wear them to the office. They are stiff and don't have a polished look.

purchase these shoe on February 12 I DO LIKE THEM AND VERY COMFORTABLE, WOULD RECOMMEND THESE SHOE TO ANYONE. JUST RECENTLY I HAD A PROBLEM JUST BEING WEARING THEM FOR 2 WEEKS AND STARTED TO WEAR AND SELLER DID NOT TAKE CARE OF PROBLEM BU AMAZON DID, STILL GERAT SHOES ANDS COMFORATABLE BUT I WOULD NOT PURCHASE FROM THIS SELLER AGAIN CAUSE THEY DO NOT TAKE CARE OF THEIR CUSTOMER, BUT AMAZON IS GREAT WITH THERE CUSTOMER. SO I LEAVE IT UP TO YOU TO TAKE A CHANCE LIKE I SAID THEY ARE COMFORTABLE SHOES.

summary: These are great casual socks! Thick, comfortable and stay put.
reviewText: I've bought these before and I will do so again.  I do wish these came white, too.These are casual socks to be worn with sport shoes or boots. They are NOT "trouser" socks.They are not 100% cotton, but they certainly do feel like it. No funky smell like nylon or acrylic socks.They're thickThey stay put - no sliding down the heelThe socks I bought last year still haven't faded or stretched. I just wanted more in my drawer so I bought some more.  *heh, a rhyme without trying*LOVE LOVE LOVE these socks.The dope who says these aren't to wear with dress shoes, umm...duh.

They are right when it comes to comfort. This one comfortable bra. It even rivals the Coobie Scoopneck Seamless Bra (Style#9012), which took me by surprise. Plus, it makes for a good sports bra. It definitely everything you should look for in a bra.
I bought these for myself and glad I purchased them very comfortable and easy to put on when your on the go love these.
These are the most comfortable workout capris I have ever owned. They stay on without being too tight, and they are very flattering. I am slightly apple shaped, and they look great on me.
it did not look like the pic. I hate to say but you want it I is or looks a little cheap in person I still like it and will wear ot  thank you
I purchased a size up and I am glad I did since it fit just right. I did send them back and it was my fault because I assumed that they were fold over yoga pants and they are not.
Good quality and support.  Acceptable by the military reports my daughter and the comfort and easy laundering makes life a bit easier.

They fit better than the NB 576 running shoes I bought a year ago.  Whether they last as long???  Remains to be seen.  I always replace the insoles with special ones on ALL shoes I buy, so that was not a problem.

I wrote an extensive review for the Waterproof Moab, so I'll keep this one short.  The main thing I want to concentrate on is the sizing.  I wear size 11D in most shoes, but often go with a 10.5D in Merrell's.  However, the Waterproof Moab was so small that I went with a 11.5D, which fells big, but I wear them with heavy socks.  The 11D just seemed to small.With the Ventilator, the 11D seems slightly larger, though.  It's still a little small on me, but not so much that I think I need to size up.  My toes do touch sometimes, but the toe box is generous and they're not uncomfortable.  Unfortunately, neither size seems to fit me great, so I had to choose and the 11.5D just seemed far too large with the Ventilator.For the record, I don't think my feet could fall in between sizes more then they do with this shoe, and I don't know why it happens, because they're very spacious.  Overall, it's a great shoe and I really love it, but just wish the sizing was better for me.Update: Well, several months later and I wish I had gone with the larger size.  The 11's still feel big enough with the uppers, but unlike the larger Moab waterproof version, they strain my legs after wearing them for a while.  I'm not sure if my foot is just a little too big for the footbed or if the sole is different with the Ventilator, because unlike the waterproof version, the same? Vibram soles make a lot of noise while I walk,  and just feel hard and cheap.  The waterproof Moab's feel great, but the Ventilator was killing my ankles.  Strangely enough, my feet are fine and it's just my ankles/legs that hurt, but again, I don't have any of these problems with the Moab waterproof shoe.I also find the Ventilator very hot.  They may even be hotter then my waterproof Moab's, but that may be because they're a tighter fit.

I use these for running and other sports. They are lightweight and breathable in warm weather, but still offer adequate support. Fabric is soft and comfortable, unlike some nylon compression shorts that just feel odd against your skin. They do not have a fly, otherwise I would use them all day long.

summary: Uggs are like having Pillows of Happiness on your Feet :)
reviewText: First to help with Real vs. Fake Uggs....If you look at the Left boot inside behind the label is a reflective sticker that has Uggs written on it with Sun's which will help let you know if they are real.The same sticker should be on the box. As of 2013 Uggs changed the security feature when you turn the boot 90 degree's the sticker will change from Black to White. You can go to the Uggs website to see the pictures of the stickers and get a more detailed explanation. Depending on what year your boots are made will depend on the security feature.Next Sizing....I usually wear a size 7/7.5 pending on the shoe. The Uggs site tells if that if you are in between sizes to order DOWN as their boot tends to run large, torn between a Big Kids 5 or 6 I ordered the BIG Kids 5. They fit PERFECT, a little snug, snug with a thick sock on BUT.... Uggs form to your feet which is what makes them soooo comfy, so after a few wears the snugness will hug my tootsie's just right with socks on. I know some like to wear with no sock but I have to wear socks.Now to tell you what you probably already know... Uggs... LOVES them, how could you not, they are like having pillows on your feet, they are like walking up a staircase of clouds taking you to HEAVEN. Yea they are that comfortable. When they first came out I swore I wouldn't jump on the bandwagon so much so that I would wear the EMU and BearPaws or as I would freely admit "Fuggs".Uggs are without a doubt the BEST boot in this type of style, you know the sheepskin, warm & fuzzy, cozy & comfy, that you can wear with sweats, jeans or shorts because they feel that AMAZING on. I have worn BearPaw, EMU and other popular competitors and without a doubt Uggs is definitely the way to go. The popular competitors seem to over do it with either the boots are too heavy on the feet or they don't given enough support.If you are looking to keep the feetsie's warm, want comfort and something you can wear with anything these are the boots you want. Don't settle for the knocks off whether they are they are unknowns or popular competitors. Ugg's LOVES them :)

summary: spendy but comfortable and seem to aid recovery
reviewText: Although still on the spendy side for a pair of socks, these were the best value I could find in compresion type socks. They seem well made and are comfortable to wear, whether working out in them or lounging around afterwards. They have additional padding in the foot and ankle areas. I wear a size 12 shoe and have about a 15.5 inch calf. The large size fit me well and as these are sized for your feet vs. your calf circumference. I won't go to a smaller size even if I had skinny calves as the sock padding along the foot fits perfect. They are a bit long and I need to fold them down about an inch or so to keep them from going up onto the knee, however doesn't seem to effect the comfort or wear at all. The large should work on a person up to 6,6" of so without issue.I put them on for a run and walk on the treadmill (4.5 miles) when I first got them. Can't say I noticed a lot of performance benefits while working out, but they were comfortable and didn't slide around in the shoe even when mixing up the speeds and inclines quite a bit. Didn't effect my minor shin splints at all. Afterwards though I did feel they helped me feel better more quickly then I normally do. I also wore them overnight and found them comfortable and that my legs felt more refreshed in the morning. In fact I just ordered the white pair to go along with my original black pair.Sizing as listed on a chart on the box, based on shoe size:Women  XS 3-6 S 6.5-8.5 M 9-11 L 11.5+Men  S 5-7.5  M 8-10 L 10.5-14

summary: Too small for my size 5 feet

summary: Very comfortable with a nice slight wedge in back
reviewText: These are very comfortable slippers with a very soft terry feel, nice grip base, and a wonderfully cushy insole that is similar to a tempurpedic mattress.  It conforms well to your feet and these are fantastic if you do lots of cooking as well.  I have a stained concrete floor in my kitchen and these make cooking comfortable...I just slip out of my shoes and put them on, who needs a chef's gel mat?These are fantastic.  And nice looking as well!

I'm a devotee of big bags, and this one is a tad small for my taste.  It's an appearance thing; this bag holds plenty.  There's a zippered divider in the center, creating two nice sized pockets on either side.  The bag is shallow enough that you can see everything inside, which is nice if you, like I, have to scrabble around to find your phone before the caller hangs up.  So size matters, but not so much for this bag.It's definitely a handheld bag--there's no shoulder strap and the handles aren't long enough to go over the shoulder.  I feel a bit ridiculous toting a smallish bag in my hand, but YMMV.The faux leather is good quality, and my orange bag is the perfect summery shade, no pumpkins in sight.  Unfortunately, there are threads sticking out from the seams, and the thing just isn't very well made.  I'm going to keep it and use it for going out or to stick in my tote bag, but this isn't my favorite purse.

I had two watches that needed adjusting, but they've been sitting on my dresser since I haven't had time to run to a jewelry repair shop.  Although this kit had mixed reviews, I decided to take a chance on it, and am glad I did!I practiced using this first on a cheaper costume jewelry watch, before using it on my nice new Kate Spade watch.  It took less than ten minutes to re-size each one!One big tip is to be sure to push the pins out following the directions of the arrows on the watch links themselves.  You basically want to tap out the pins on their solid side.I'd also recommend doing this on a soft piece of fabric so as to avoid the pins dinging your furniture when they pop out.I'd also suggest watching a video online.  The best one I found is called "NEthingFun-How to Resize a Watch Band," and the man who made it walks you through all the steps.Although I have experience making jewelry, this process is so easy that I think anyone with good eyesight could do it.The only reason for four stars instead of five is that the tools are not of the nicest quality, but they didn't bend or warp at all for me, and the cost of this kit was cheaper than taking my two watches in to have them done.I definitely recommend this!

summary: Great for winter in midwest ladies, just high enough but got at half the cost elsewhere....
reviewText: I own at least 5 pairs of these and just ordered three more.  I love them all for times when I don't want to add risk of falling...like winter especially in the Midwest this year. Comfort is fine, stability is excellent because it is a lower heel but doesn't look silly like it is a "training wheel" type of heel.  I will say I just purchased three more pairs at Belks online-got three pairs for the price of one plus their ten dollar shipping which was too high but for fifty bucks total that's a heck of a deal.  I ordered two other pairs of gorgeous heels off Amazon last night and ran across that site because I was searching for reviews on longevity for the getta's since this is a newer madden girl heel.

summary: Seem to Be Right for Skeletoes
reviewText: I purchased these for my son who wore his Skeletoes without socks the first time and said he needed socks. Odd coming from someone who loves to wear his sneakers without socks...He is between a size 7 and 8 mens so I purchased the small (size 5-7). They are a little tight but I was afraid if I got the next size up they would be swimming on him. They fit fine and snug which is probably good since you don't want a lot of extra fabric in these form fitting shoes.So far so good. They were comfortable for him to wear all day and when he first put his foot in the Skeletoes with the socks on he said, "That's so much better."We'll see how they hold up with use and washing. I'll come back and update after we've used them for a number of months.

summary: The sizing it shows on the product page is not what's on the tag: order a size or two up
reviewText: I couldn't understand why the reviews said that these run quite small and to order at least one size up--because they have the waist measurement on the page which seemed to be accurate.Problem is, the waist measurement on the product page is not what is on the actual item.  I typically wear a size 7 or 8, never in my life a size 9. And the reviews said to order a size up but, since this only comes in odd sizes, that meant ordering a 9 but the page said a 9 is a 29 inch waist--far too big.Not so.  The TAG says a size 9 is a 27 waist, a regular size 7.These are juniors sizes and they don't match the sizing listed on the product page which are ladies sizes.., but the 9 did fit just fine--like a size 7.Order up a size for sure and you'll be happy.  They do fit well and fit every curve and the short was perfect for my 5'4" frame.  They have excellent stretch to ensure great fit.Why does one want skinny jeans?  If you don't have a pair with knee high boots yet, the 2014 fashion train is passing your station.
Gift for my dad. Loves them!  Wears them around the house and when letting the dogs out.  I like that they have a true sole and good grip so they're comfy and safe!

Disclaimer:  I have only tried these on and walked around the house; I have yet to put them to the Seattle weather test.  That being said, I think these boots are awesome and priced well. I purchased the charcoal gray color which I really like.  The boots are very sturdy, and the soles seem to be attached well which isn't the case with many rain boots that are shoddily glued together.  I can see how some reviewers had difficulty pulling them on, as the vamp can be a little snug before your foot is all the way in (I have relatively small feet in that respect, and I was able to get them on easily enough).  But once they're on there's plenty of room.  I ordered mine in a 9 which is a half size larger than my regular size, and the fit is perfect -- there's a little wiggle room, but the boots are not "clompy."  The foot bed is pretty comfortable, and I imagine I'll be able to wear these all day.  Another perk for those trying to be more green: when you're done with the boots, you can send them back to the company to be recycled.
