reviewerName: D. Deutsch "Chance favors the prepared mind."
reviewText: Can't say that I fit the description of my own title, but I like this belt.  It is sturdy, utilitarian, and simple to fit and adjust. It runs 1 1/2 inches wide which makes it a hassle to fit with some pants. Overall, it was a great deal at this price.

This has been an awful winter in my part of the country. We've had weeks of zero and subzero temperatures, snow, ice, more snow, and did I mention how cold it's been?  I have a shoe rack full of boots, but the ones I go to day in and day out are my Bearpaws.  I don't even wear socks with them, and they keep my feet toasty warm.I've had these in the tall version, in light blue, for many years and keep them by the back door.  They're getting pretty ratty and the color is unsuitable for anything except jeans.  I'm so sick of having cold feet, and of scavenging through my boots and shoes to find something appropriate for the weather and the day's demands, so I broke down and ordered the short black ones. Bless Amazon, they were here in two days and I'm wiggling my toes in them right now.  They're as comfortable as slippers, and presentable enough to wear in public with long pants and leggings.  The only thing I don't like is the enormous Bearpaw logo on the backs, but the pluses outweigh the advertising a thousandfold.  These are not glamorous boots.  They're wide and clunky, but oh, so cozy and I'm thrilled!The soles of a sand colored pair I had for a couple of years disintegrated, but the soles of my new ones seem to be made of a different material, as do the soles of my blue pair.  Even if they don't last, they've been worth their weight in gold this winter!

I'm very pleased with this necklace.  It's big, and makes a statement!  It's a great match to the earrings and ring.The only downside is that the chain is pretty cheesy.  There's no clasp, it's a bit flimsy for the size of the owl, and it's barely long enough to fit over the head.  Still, it looks great on and I'm not complaining.  It was also inexpensive!
This is very, very impressive for the price and it is 100% worth it. It's very pretty and wonderful for casual wear. I am very happy with this piece. Would recommend and definitely buy again.

there are so many tops i have for summer that show a clevage. not my intention. so i'm very pleased with this bra!It fit well on my size F cup and with the material at the top, i'm able to wear all the tee shirts and clingy tops i want.
I ordered them for the fiancee and he kind of danced around when he put them on which I take to mean that he liked them.
It's has like a lace overlay in the front and it's very delicate looking.  I really like it with skirts.

This item was shipped on time, and was packaged well. The belt itself is very nice - EXCELLENT QUALITY for the price! I have seen similar belts selling for much more. The fit is good too, I'd say they run true to size. Highly recommend seller, and I will definitely buy again.

It is a very cute dress however the material is incredibly cheap quality. You will need something to put under it as it is mildly see through. It also wrinkles very easily due to the material. Comes with the belt. But for the low price, it's fair.
The most simple, comfortable shoes ever. You are also helping a cause while buying a pair, you donate one to someone with no shoes. Great company and a great product.

Unlike the other FOTL's I got recently w/out pockets, these mediums shrink to just a little too small. No big deal, I need to drop 5 lbs. anyway. They are quite thin btw. Great colors, just as pictured. Will make great undershirts this winter. Still a pretty good deal.
these are good pants they fit well i liked the color except i figured that these are old man pants
I bought them for my daughter and shipped them to her.  She was very happy and said they fit perfectly.A winner!
they are thin enough you can double the socks on cold days and they stay in place all day love the different colors and they wash well and keep their shape

Just received it so I have not washed it yet. It runs small though. I ordered 2 sizes larger than usual to get the "loose" look, but that did not work. So it's just an ordinary top. Kind of disappointed.
Very comfortable and supportive, would recommend this. Great fit and love the wire free support and wonderful colours they come in
this is very comfortable; i wear a 40c, but this is on the very last hook and probably should have gotten a 42.  I like the look and feel and would order again.
Crocs are the best, so innovative, and these can be worn casually or informally. I would recommend them to anyone. Worth the money!

I like this top because it is very comfortable. I like how the top is very lose, but at the same time, it is also stylish. I also enjoy how it differ from the likes ofLast Tango Tops for women - Scoop Neck 3/4 Sleeve Top (Style#1196), giving me the right variety. So not only is this top comfortable, but it can make a great edition to your closet. I think that is all more reason to at least try it on.
I am a believer in AMAZON.  I was overjoyed about this purchase of a bali bra for my sister in law.  It was beautiful, it fit, great quality, and the price was excellent.

summary: This moisture wicking tee worked out great
reviewText: These were purchased for a gift and from what I understand they worked out great as it wasn't too loose or baggy,had some give in the back and shoulders and aeration as not to have them hot during a strenuous aerobic workout.I would buy more if the occasion arose again.

This is a terrific handbag. I was really shocked at how well I can fit things in this bag. It makes a wonderful alternative for something likePRADA MV515 Prada Tessuto Vela Nylon in Black. I highly recommend getting this bag if you are looking for a solid bag.

This bra is extremely comfortable and is true to size.  It is supportive for jogging and walking.  It has minimal give so it holds everything there is needs to be.  It is difficult to take on and off because of the racer back but it is worth the struggle.  Also it had a nice rounded shape and no cone effect.
Love my Clarks. These are extremely comfortable and I never leave the house without them. The colors are great too.

The center portion of the body length was shorter than anticipated. The "hankerchief" cut to the bottom is beautiful and flowing, however I personally felt that the middle section should have been longer. The sides are very long and the center line is very short. While it is a very pretty top, it is not proportioned for me.
I saw other reviews stating these didn't seem authentic. I disagree. They are perfect. The 55 mm fits an average adult face fine. I would by these again.
Once getting to know this company's sizing, the comfort and support met my needs.  Very lightweight and breathable in hotter months.

Probably deserves a little higher rating, but these are relatively new and time will tell if they held well to the passage of time. So far Big Mama can not mask her joy, finding out how comfy they turned out to be. Another member of the family had been buying these Crocs and started showing them around every time we got together, and you know how it is. Monkey see, monkey do. So in no time I took it personal and started building Big Mama's collection and so far we have purchased 3 pairs, all well received.Once the issue of the correct size was determined by visiting a couple of outlets and trying them on, we ordered this pair, Crocs Classic Clog, Women's 8M, blah blah blah (they really make it a little hard, like if it was a science project just to be able to get the correct size).Crocs are apparently well liked, they might not look expensive or all that fashionable, but I must admit they do look comfortable even to the point where I have been wanting a pair, for all the comments about how easy to wear and how comfortable they are.The price on these was very nice and when they arrived they were a hit. Big Mama now wants more and more, but who can blame her? If a pair of shoes bring joy then the more the merrier. 4 Stars.

I've tossed out all my other ones and now have only these undies in my lingerie drawer! They fit beautifully and come in wonderful colors. What more could a girl want? They also wash and dry quickly if you take them traveling with you, as I do.
Well made, good quality, small fitting so be careful about size ordering. I like it and it serves the purpose as gym pants go.

summary: BEWARE of SIZE before you order
reviewText: These run really, really small. I am an XL right off the rack and this tunic, when on, makes you feel like a sausage. Tight in hips and accentuates your tummy region. Nobody wants that-especially in a tunic. My husband said I looked ridiculous which was not the look I was going for. Not sending it back because of the hassle. I gave it two stars because I thought it LOOKED cute laying on my bed.
Could be an inch longer, but I resolve this by pulling it down a bit. Nice material, not too hot but not to thin, no see through. Great price as well.
No they don't wick sweat away, but they're comfy and fit perfectly. I wear them on hikes, around the house, and to pilates. I love them.

These are true to size, which is a real plus and the style is cool too, but the length was WAY too long for me (size 14, 5'4" height) and you don't get to select the length, which you should to ensure a good fit. So I will return these because I would have to take up 4" (which is a LOT) to have the bottom near my ankles and the flare at the bottom is so WIDE a good wind good have me airborn! I did not realize how wide they were and I prefer a narrow bottom like skinny jeans are tailored. I'll look for this style with the narrow bottom.
This shirt runs a little small but is cute. You have to wear something under it because the arm openings are really large.

It's amazing just how supportive and comfortable this bra is, even in a size 44DDD. The material is soft and there are absolutely no rough seams or edges. I don't feel like I'm wearing a bra at all! It's more comfortable than my oversized sports bras that I wear in the evenings.The only thing I would change is how high the cups are in the front. I wear a lot of scoop neck shirts and dresses, and I'm worried about the bra showing. I'm thinking I will try the "Playtex Secrets Side Smoothing Full Figure Wirefree Bra" as it looks much more low cut. If the fit is better, I will send this one back but ONLY because of the cut. The support and comfort are amazing; I can't stress that enough.

I already have 2 of these that I use as everyday bras at home. My one issue with this one is the band at the back where the hooks are, there's this rough part at the edge that chafes. Of the 3 I have, one didn't have this issue, but one did. Though the rough part of that one slowly softened up after numerous hand washings. Hoping it happens with this pink one. Other than that, it's still uber comfy, great to just wear at home. As this doesn't really have that great a support, I wear other bras for that.

I live in South Florida. But the office I work in is so cold. I usually wear long skirts and because of how cold it was I would put on regular leggings underneath but I would still be freezing all day. So I bought these fleece leggings and they are awesome The inside fabric is fleecy and is so cozy and comfy. They keep me warm and they are not too bulky under my skirts.The only thing I don't like about them: on the outside they have a fabric that is easily picked. Meaning it catches on your finger nail if your fingernail has a tiny ridge that you can't even see comparable to the way your nail would catch on panty hose. It does that on the outside of the leggings. It's not going to "run" like panty hose but it will show a little picked. Might want to consider that if you plan on wearing them as regular pants and not under a skirt/dress.
Perfect and exactly what I expected.  My wife likes the look, but says they take a while to dry.  A little extra power is worth it. (Review written by Bun's husband)

I wear a full bodied bra, usually 38DDD or F depending on brand, I have tried most of the big names in sports bras from Anita to Wacoal, the Champion Pwerback is the best motion control bra I have worn. I wear them a size smaller in cup as it only goes to DD, it is secure, non sliding, highly supportive and it looks good under clothing. They last about a year before the netting over the cups start to thin but I recommend this bra to any full bodied girl who spends time in any high impact activity. True to regular bra size, they should fit slightly small overall for bounce control. The next best is Moving Comfort Maia.

summary: A nice pendant and necklace for the price
reviewText: While I was browsing on Amazon, I came across the owl pendant and necklace for less than a dollar, including free shipping. The reviews were mostly positive, so I ordered the necklace and a few other pieces of jewelry that were very inexpensive, thinking they would be nice little gifts for the young nieces in our family. I was pleasantly surprised that it's actually a nice piece of costume jewelry. The zinc alloy metal gives it some weight, weighing 0.6 ounce (18 grams), and the antiqued bronze finish looks very nice. The pendant and necklace came with a small blue presentation box for gifting.Delivery from China took 22 days from the day I ordered.

I love this wallet!  It's small enough to fit in the palm of my hand and doesn't weigh half what my old wallet weighed.  Despite it's small size it holds a LOT of cards (alas, not as many as my old wallet so I did have to down size a little).  I will definitely buy another one if this one ever wears out although I doubt that will be any time soon because the wallet is so well made.
These run small.  I got a pair for my husband but they were too small so my son claimed them.  I got a larger size for my husband.  Both guys are very happy

This item was a little big.  I was surprised to receive a large which I had ordered and it would have fit a person larger than I a size 12.  Or would be perfect for a person smaller than I as a dress.  It is really nice and would have loved it in a smaller size.  I did give it as a present and the person just loved it.  I would recommend that if you buy this to get a size smaller for a sweater or two sizes larger to wear as a dress.  It is beautiful and soft.  So go for this.

I bought this bra to wear to bed and it fits the bill perfectly.  There is very little support and the fabric is thin so I would certainly not wear this bra out in public I wear a B cup).  I like that the straps are not adjustable but fit flat to the body.
Very well made, comfortable material, I would recommend buying the next size up, but still recommended. It is definitely incentive to lose weight!
I can't believe people are allowed to market things like this! It's poorly made, way too small and the quality of the material was horrible!

The color is darker than I expected, but it is really pretty - a dark chocolate.  It is very well made and extremely comfortable.  True to size.  Soft, but not flimsy, and has some stretch to it.  The sleeves are nice and long, but easily worn pushed up.  The cut is flattering. Shorter in the back than the front, but still covers my seat.  Arrived early and packaged nicely.  This is a great company.  Love their entire line.Update:  Four months later....the first one I bought is holding up really well.  It washes nicely and looks as new as the day I received it. So far, has shown no signs of fading. I just bought two more (black and gray) and they both fit great.  Just what I ordered.  These are great for either a casual or a dressier look.  Like the first order, I also received this one earlier than estimated.
These are beautiful studs. They are just the right size and have lots of fire. Low price and fast delivery. I recommend them to anybody.

I have already written reviews on the Skechers Women's Go Walk 2 Fashion Sneaker,Black White,7.5 M US, but since we have purchased 3 pairs, I guess each one demands its own, even though they are the exact type of shoe. Big Mama is happy as a clam, and looks like a million dollars wearing these shoes, well worth the investment. For her is very important to have the right kind of shoes for the job, and these fit the bill, making the walking a good part of her day. No shoelaces, and once used a few times, easy to get in and out. What is not to like? 4.5 Stars!
This can be warn as a dress, or a shirt, cozy like in the photo, or dressy even! I wish they were offered in more colors!

This slipper from Orthaheel is just exactly what they describe and I am afraid Orthaheel may have sold out, so get your slippers now.  I would certainly by from this seller again.  It came on time, good product, fair price.  The wrappings were new and very  very good.

I purchased Levi's 505 regular fit for my Husband, and he is hard to find the right length, the size is no problem. he had lost 51-lbs of weight from being ill, now he is eating better. so, i got 34x29. my husband tried them on and they fit to a T, even after i washed them. Levi's is the only denim this family can wear, they are the perfect fit. I highly recommend Levi's brand denim, they have been around since the 1853.
This is very flattering and easy to wear.  I like the loose fit and bright color.  I looked for other colors, but they were sold out in my size!

This is the first FitFlop clog I have tried.  I looked at the measurements and it was close in heel height to the Mukluk and that seems to be my magic formula.  They are great for my wide forefoot.  I have discovered that although I am an 8 and 1/2 I need to get a 9 in the boots and 8 for sandals so I went with an 8 for these. They are just a teensy bit big so 9 would not have worked. If you are an 8 you might even consider a 7. The extra room does not let me pronate though because the instep hugs my arch w much like their sling sandal I purchased here last month.  My only concern in wearing them outside is that I might fast walk out of them with the dogs. So I am considering the professional version with a strap on the back.  Then it is just a question of whether to keep both or give this one up. (sniff) Have to look at the bank account. Especially if the VIA BARR arrives at Amazon in black. But the difference in the pain factor is just amazing with this brand.
They weren't his favorite compared to the colorful fruit of the looms I purchased but the fit works. Again I went a size smaller and they fit nicely.

summary: Not a whole lot to say about t shirts lol
reviewText: They fit my husband and didn't shrink too much when I washed them. But if you're looking for the longer length as I was. These are not it. But still good quality for what I paid for them. Not to mention the quick ship.

summary: Cheap T shirt that looks great
reviewText: Color is slightly darker than the picture, which is a bonus.  For a cheap shirt, this looks great, seems sturdy, and fits perfectly.

These workout tights are great I ordered the Aqua the color is great. They come just below the knee. They are not see thru at all. I just ordered red and blue breeze today that is how much I like them. The only thing is I wish shipping was faster and there was more colors. My weight is 140 and I ordered the small and they fit great. The reason I only gave it 4 stars is the shipping takes so long other than that they are 5 stars for sure. I will recommend them.

Bought the Playtex Women's 18 Hour Original Comfort Strap Bra, Black, 40D, for a great trooper of the female sex. A fine senior that all of a sudden looked like their you know what had perked up, not necessarily a bad look, and she commented very positively on the fact that they supported her you know, very well. So much, in fact, that I have been instructed to secure at the very least a couple more pairs. Not knowing much about sizes and the endless variations, I was thrilled that some time ago it had been determined through excessive research that this great trooper was size 40D. It worked like a charm, and even though they are pointy for such a respectable senior citizen, they also support the before not supported you know what. Solid 4 Stars.

I rarely rave about products, but I'm crazy about this bra! Like so many women endowed with large breasts, I've been struggling with the unpleasant bounce every time I exercised; and more than once I avoided exercising altogether because of it. I found this on Amazon by chance, decided to try it, and I'm sooo glad I did!I received the bra about noon, wore it in Zumba class in the afternoon, and ordered my second one in the evening. I couldn't believe my senses the first time I put it on: it provides great support, reduces the bounce to a minimum, and doesn't 'squash' the breasts. It actually looks good enough that I could wear under t-shirts at all times, not only at the gym. For the support it provides, it also feels very, very comfortable, more so than many of my regular bras. I also love, love, love the form of the straps in the back - finally, I can wear one of those sexy sports tops without straps showing in all the wrong places! It was true to size, so no surprises there.For objectivity's sake, I must admit that it's not perfect: it goes on over your head (not the easiest way to put a bra on, and it's even more difficult to get it off), the nipples show (although I'd rather they show than have padding which adds another D to my cup!) and the band could be more snug. And I'm also a bit worried about durability.But all in all, for the support it provides at a very reasonable price, I'm delighted! I now own two, and contemplate buying a third.

I didn't pay very much for this, so going by that, I got more than I could have hoped. The chain has already broken but that's really not to be unexpected. The globe is cute and my child really enjoys playing with it.
These pants are perfect for working out or hanging out.  They fit true to size, and they are really flattering.  I got a lot of compliments on my behind the first day I wore them.
Its a Nice comfy shirt. Great for relaxing, running errands. Thin, always wear it with a tank, obvi. Really pretty color.

summary: Comfortable but Not Much to It
reviewText: These briefs are very lightweight and non-binding. But they provide only a modest amount of support up front.  I use them under light athletic pants for cool nighttime runs. Size medium fits true to size.

summary: Excellent Sport Sandal - I'm a Fan for Life
reviewText: I resisted for a while (years) while my wife raved about her Keen sandals. I like Tevas (Terra Fi 2) and have owned many pairs over the past 10 years. Love them for warm weather hiking, around the water, and general warm/wet conditions. But, I finally gave these Keens a try after wearing out the soles of my Tevas.The reviewers are right on. They feel like sneakers and I wear them all day with pleasure. These are a great buy. I'm going to buy another pair of Teva Terra Fi 2s also but I do love these Keens.Pros:- Rugged build- Great traction (I think the Tevas are a little better but I hardly notice the difference - that's the key detail)- I bought the mostly nylon (not leather) version (brown/bison) and they do dry quickly. My wife has the leather version and they're significantly slower to dry - overnight at least.- Extremely comfortable to wear all day- I never have to adjust these - they stay on my feet in all conditions with no worries- Look good with everything- There is a nice sense of comfort with that toe protector on the front- Wide toe bed - very niceCons if I have to name some (certainly won't deter me from buying these again):- In the sun, the toe bed/cap does get hot on your toes if you hang out in direct sun for a while- I agree with the other reviews (not necessarily on Amazon) that you'll read regarding the "funk". Yes, these do get funky/smelly very quickly - much more quickly than my Tevas ever did. But, hey, they're outdoor sandals. Throw them into the washing machine or go swimming with them every 3-4 days and you're set.The "funk" reputation worried me a little so I held off buying these but I can live with it. It's not as bad as I expected. And, these are super comfortable!Added after owning for six months:I think the Teva Terra Fi 2 probably have a slight edge when it comes to rafting/boating because they dry in record time and you can really tighten them so they don't shift on your foot. So, I'd give them a slightly higher score in terms of functionality for the very active or career outdoors folks.Also, I do get annoyed at the gravel that gets stuck in the toe bed of these - I can't shake it loose so I have to take them off and turn them upside down. This wasn't an issue with the Teva open toe design and I kind of miss those days. Last pet peeve: despite what my wife says, (she has same kind of Keens) the tread just isn't as good as the Teva's. Conclusion, I have to buy both for the forseeable future - they're both solid products and I won't give up either.Latest and Last Update: the sole gave out in less than a year - literally pieces/chunks fell off. I'm back to Tevas and happier with the much more reliable tread. The Tevas dry much much faster also. I think the Keens are really for wearing when you want to pretend you're doing something active outdoors - they were fine for just walking.2013 update: I bought what must be my 4th pair of Keens now. This pair is holding up much better than the last ones. So far, no problems at all with the sole. And, the stink/funk isn't a problem with these. There does seem to be a new kind of coating on the soles (inside) and so maybe that's helping. Anyway no issues so far and I'm a happy camper.
Its not what I expected, looks like a jammy shirt, less like something you would wear out of the house! But comfy!

summary: nice E shop(TM) Brand Fashion Leopard Pattern Shawl Scarf Wrap for women
reviewText: I ordered this for myself this scarf is long so I am able to wear it however I want looks just like picture even better and for the price I couldn't go wrong
This was a very pretty, vintage looking fashion necklace. The stones were actually very "sparkly" And, for the price, why not!

This is really really an excellent Wallet. The leather quality is worthy as well as the design the workmanship and the color. I'm glad I spent my $12.00 hard earned money on this high end Leather Wallet.
This is a nice quality dress belt, especially for the price. It looks just like the picture. The sizing information is accurate.

It had lots of support and coverage, but unfortunately, this isn't going to work. The middle part between the cups comes up really really high, to the point where the wires were poking way past my boobs and visible on my shirt.
Bought these for my 13 year old grandson and he absolutely loves them!  Fits him perfectly.  Thanks so very much.

I tried to like these, but the "super-slim toe post" is anything but! I wear thongs all the time, but I could not stand the thick, stiff and roughly sewn post on these. The Indium is a slightly metallic charcoal gray. The soles are very comfortable. They do not "flap" too much when walking. I usually wear 8.5 - 9. I ordered down to size 8 per reviews, which fit well - except for that post! I replaced this style with 3 pairs of the "FitFlop Women's Lulu Slide Sandal" which I find very comfortable. Same sole, no post, plus a dressier look I can wear to work on hot days.
I really like the look of these shoes, but they are REALLY tight on the toe area. The sizing seems fine, length-wise, but they do not have much give to them at all. Gotta send em back :(
This is a nice house shoe.  Besides being pretty it fits like a glove and the material is soft and flexible.

I have a lot of flip flops (LL Bean, Nike, and various store brands) but these are among my most comfortable. Well worth the price! Great quality. True to size. I expect these to last several summers. The Vineyard Pink and Vineyard Black and Cream styles are super cute. Recommend.

summary: Nice jacket, but runs a bit big
reviewText: I ordered this in the Charcoal Heather color for an upcoming cruise to Alaska in my usual size small.  It just arrived yesterday, and it's pretty big all over.  I was expecting the sleeves to run long since I always have a hard time with sleeves on my 5'4" frame, but the jacket also extends in every direction in a large way.I'll probably still end up keeping it since I'll most likely be wearing layers under it, and need the extra space.The fleece is really soft and cozy, and Columbia always makes nice products.  I also really like how this fits with a zipper, instead of being a pullover style.
This is a big bag and very roomy.  If you don't like big bags, then don't get this bag. The shoulder strap was inside the middle zipper inside the bag.

I think this tunic is amazing. First it feels so comfortable when you are looking to wear something at home. However, the tunic also makes for a great top. I find that it goes well with a pair ofLysse leggings for women - Basic Capri. Needless to say, this is a great tunic to have around as it is a very versatile item.

I can't believe I paid to much to have my watches sized at a jeweler.  This little high-quality kit made it so easy to size my watches at home.  If you're a novice at sizing your own watches, just go do a search on Youtube for some sizing videos - you'll be a pro in no time.  It has already paid for itself - and I'm able to size all my friends watches for free too!

summary: D&K Seamless Full Leggings One Size (Winter Fleece) Brown
reviewText: D&K; Seamless Full Leggings One Size (Winter Fleece) Brown  very Nice, great fit.Feels good on my Legs, very warm too.

Love em! Warm, comfortable, durable. Like all Men's Carhartt, in my experience, these shirts run big; Med. fit what's usually a 2X, and small what's usually a LG, and they do not shrink. Perfect for outdoor winter work in combination w/ my Active Duck Jacket. Ordered one for a friend as a gift,  he loves it. Green looks great, deep color. I highly recommend, just order down a size or so.

I wasn't sure what to think of this bra, but it is very useful. It works great for both fitness and comfort. In fact, the fabric in the bra reminds me of the Coobie Scoopneck Seamless Bra (Style#9012), which in my book, that's a good thing. Overall this is a versatile bra, making it great one to have. I recommend you get it if you are looking for a good one.

My boyfriend ordered these cargo pants for me. I needed a pair for work and these fit the bill. Originally this was ordered in a size 6 (my normal size) but it was falling off my hips, so I had to exchange it for a size 4. I would suggest ordering a size down from what you normally wear. The fabric is very firm with virtually no give. These fit like a tight pair of jeans. I am 5'5 and the cargo pants were too long, so I had to have them hemmed. The pockets are adequate.

This bra gives you full coverage, and good support.  There is very little bounce in this bra.  The gel straps are comfortable, and the bottom band stays in place.  You do get somewhat of a uni-boob look in this bra but at least you have support.  I would probably order this bra again, and I will recommend it as a sports bra.

Soooo comfortable ! Wear all the time with no sign of wear.  Love the footbed forcomfort and just use wet rag to wipe clean.  You can do anything in these shoes.Slight wedge helps knees as it takes the weight off knees and calves.They do run alittle small so if you wear a 9 or 91/2 order a 10 - then you will have a perfectfit.  I do also think they run alittle narrow, but fit a normal width as well.Could not be made any better !!Much cheaper at Amazon than stores !

summary: Nice looking shoes - not for old guys who need foot support.
reviewText: I like the simple retro look of these Vans shoes. Since I couldn't find an 11.5 EW, I bought a 12 D. They're fine for the width of my foot but not for the depth. My feet are thick from top to sole. I wear these shoes to a restaurant or as a guest at somebody's house. I do not wear them for much walking. They'd look great on younger people, whose feet haven't swollen with their years.

summary: Replaced my favorite Tevas with these. No
reviewText: I used to buy cheaper flip flops. And while I still like them, some of them are like walking on cardboard. And if you pound pavement for any length of time, you FEEL it later! (especially if you are no longer 16!) I didn't want to move all the way to "support" sandals or "hiking" ones...because they usually are just a little clunky for me. So, I went forTeva Mush. I loved them. But after a month or so, they were flattened out in places (especially the heel.) I don't like that. So I bought another pair...same thing. And while I loved the softness of those, I didn't want to spend every summer buying 2-3 pairs of the same things. And I found these.They look pretty much like the same shoe...but they are not. I liked that they both have a simple THIN strap, which shows off more of your foot and doesn't leave big "tan lines"! And they were soft. These are not as mushy as the Teva Mush, but firm-soft. Like you are walking on a mattress!!! Another nice thing over the Teva ones is that the surface is more solid/smooth. The Teva ones are more spongey...so sand gets in those holes and is HARD to get out. Which changes the color slightly. And that shows on a black pair. BUT there is a little trade-off, if your feet and shoes get wet (like at a waterpark or rain or something) these can be a little more slippery. It does improve after you wear them a while.This is the third year in a row that I have bought these. The old ones aren't worn out (like the flattened Tevas), but the color fades slightly and they do get wear. I wear mine ALL the time. I even wear them in the house when I am standing a long time! I do wear a half-size, and I chose a size UP. I don't like it when people's heels are hanging out over the end of the flip flops, so I erred on the bigger size. And they are fine. I was thrilled that they also come in more colors...I bought three pairs actually! The black ones on this page,metallic onesandsilver/gray/black ones. The metallic was for my daughter but she has wider feet than I do and she can't get the straps on comfortably. So, I guess they are mine. She CAN fit the same size Teva Mush, so she is getting those. Even if I have to replace them when they get smushed. So if you have wider feet, and love the style you might want to compare these with those Teva ones...Amazon does have free returns on these, so that is nice.

I have a laptop for work now and my shoulder bag was starting to be painful so I bit the bullet and ordered a backpack. The color are chill enough to wear to work and not feel like I'm in grade school - and, honestly, it feels like I have nothing in it! It is really well-constructed and fits a lot (I stick my purse and a couple other things in there as well). It's got a few pockets - large and small - so it's GREAT! I've taken it to the grocery store and stuck about 9 bottles of wine in there and it was fine (the last packpack I had ripped with just 4 in there!).

summary: Good, but not perfect for me
reviewText: I am a 34B but I like maximum support sports or everyday. I am always hunting for a bra that works under most clothing, that doesn't strangle you like a boa constrictor while taking off or putting on, and that doesn't give the uniboob or Madonna 1987 tour look. This one is pretty close and I will say that it is my go-to right now. My only complaints are the way it looks under t-shirts. I don't like the way the straps double up in front. I don't see the advantage of this design, and it adds a weird lumpiness in a place where I don't need it. The other is that the seams run around the outer side and then curve in toward the cleavage. Under shirts this creates a strange optical effect of sagginess. My last complaint is that while it is not a total uniboob creator, it does not create the effect of two distinct breasts. I like the support, and the fact that it gives that support without looking like something from the medieval knights section of the museum. Just wish it looked better under clothing.
Comfortable, nice color, fit well.  Was surprised they were so nice at that price.  Would definitely recommend.  I'm not on my feet all day so I'm not sure how they would feel after 8 hours.

summary: Great socks, I'm sold on the brand now.  Medium thickness all-weather socks.
reviewText: Bought a Carhartt hoodie recently and liked the quality overall.  Went looking for socks here and these came up so I thought I'd give them a try.They fit perfectly (I wear a size 10 shoe, bought the Large), stand up well (I wear them with boots normally) and are pretty comfortable.  These are not super heavy thick wool socks to wear when you're skiing, they're listed as all-weather and are more of a medium thickness.  I'm really not sure why several reviewers complained about them being so thin, they're not billed as super thick winter socks.I bought a 3-pack, plan on buying a few more packs to replace some of the older socks in my drawer.  Great product.-D

This necklace cost one cent.  Of course shipping is nearly $7 so do the math, but the necklace is really quite pretty.  I will buy more for gifts.  Doesn't look sturdy, but a cute necklace for a great price.
I love the extra length! It's comfortable & I have had so many compliments. The material is slightly thicker than a t-shirt.

summary: Fairly comfortable slip-on shoes...but the construction was not that great on mine
reviewText: I bought a pair of these TOMS slip-ons in red last spring.  I figured they'd be great for casual wear with shorts and other summer clothing.The slip-ons are quite comfortable; however, I wasn't that thrilled with the construction of the shoe itself.  There was loose stitching in areas on both shoes; but the area at the toe where the canvas is darted/gathered was uneven on just one of the shoes.  It would have been better if both shoes had been equally malformed...at least then they would have matched.  The shoes had already been worn by me several times before I noticed the toe manufacture issue.  I was trying on clothes in a store dressing room and when I stood back to get the full-length view, the first thing I noticed was that the toes of my shoes looked funny.  I now just use them for working around the garden rather than going out in public.

The shipping was excellently fast! Yay!The quality was fine, but when I opened the package the globe part of the necklace fell off and rolled away never to be seen again which made me really upset- but I made sure to tell the seller and they replaced it free of charged which was absolutely amazing!I love this necklace! It looks great with so many outfits! I love it! Thank you!

Another great bra from Bali. This Wire Free bra has all the right fabric to it, creating a comfortable item. It is great for any occasion as the bra gives you the proper support. As great as the Coobie Strappy V-Neck Lace Trim Brascan be, this bra could become a favorite among women.

summary: scoop neck stretchy long sleeve knitted sweater
reviewText: it was love at first sight. once i put this sweater on, I was in love. It's very soft and very light. I ordered a large and it's very slouchy and seems to have a bit of a bat wing effect going on. It is ridiculously comfortable and soft. its see through so a tank top for underneath is very recommended. one of my favorite sweaters now!

reviewerName: Aliza M. Beer "Books & Belongings By Beverly ...
reviewText: Without a doubt, this is my favorite sports bra! It's superbly comfortable. I have it in a bunch of different colors. Just make sure you get the right size or else you'll find that the velcro strap will slip and you'll lose support on one or both sides.

Weird and wonderful all at the same time. I bought a pair just because most people I knew had one and loved them. I have a pair in the garage and just use them to tool around the house and garden. Easy to slip on and off, wet and dry ok. They are much more comfortable than flip-flops and I wear them when I know my feet are going to get dirty. I just rise them off and let them dry and they're good to go the next time. Everyone should have a pair!

Although I'm fairly short, I have long legs and it's very rare that regular length pants are too long for me.  These pants are quite long and of course given the material, it's unlikely they'll shrink.  I also ordered up because I know spandex yoga pants tend to be tighter and they're still a little tighter than I like them to.  Keeping those things in mind, they're not bad pants.

This is my THIRD pair of Skechers Go Walk but I bought these for my Mom.  These are seriously the lightest, most comfy walking shoes I have ever had.  They can go all day or be used at the gym.  They are flexible and soft.  I just love my 2 pairs so much. I hope Skechers never stops making these!

I have these in every color!!!!! I am a size eight and they fit perfect, so warm to wear under jeans in very cold weather, or as pajama's at night. Even wear a hoodie over them during the day, they are great in all colors.the only drawback is the awful mechanical odor once you have removed them from the package, even after washing several times you can still smell it. It took mine at least a dozen Washington before that strong mechanical smell was removed. Otherwise, if you can live with that for a short time, they are the most comfortable leggings you will ever put on. No seams either. Mine have not drawn up after washing a multitude of times either.

This is a gorgeous watch!  It is a fun watch!  I don't wear it every day, but the days that I have, I have received many compliments.  People have asked me if it is a Michael Kors watch, but I tell them that it is not.  I tell them that it is a Geneva!  To tell you the truth, I like it better than my Michael Kors.  You cannot, I repeat, cannot beat the price of this watch!

These are my all time favorite yoga pants. The leg material is soft and form fitting but very comfortable and does not restrict my movements. The band at the top is a little stiffer and holds down my flabby stomach very nicely but again, it doesn't suffocate me. I actually don't wear these for yoga. I either wear them around the house or sometimes running if it is a little chilly out.
Very nice pashmina. Gave as a gift and it was very much loved. Very soft and a more unique color than most

As with all Clarks shoes, the Breeze Sea Flip Flop exceeded expectations for comfort. I have horrible feet due to years of abuse. My feet are also narrow and usually slip around in flip flops. These shoes, however, cradle my feet, so they don't slide around. I love the extra support both across the top of the foot and in the bed and heel of the shoe. I usually wear an 8.5, but ordered a 9 since there are no half sizes. The 9 will do, but I probably could use an 8. I will buy another pair of these. Maybe I'll try a brighter color in size 8. I was just really impressed with the quality and comfort. They also look just a touch nicer than the average flip flop. I also bought a pair of Crocs flip flops to compare. Not surprisingly, the Clarks were superior in style and comfort.

summary: PERFECT for what I needed it for
reviewText: I am very sun sensitive and live in Florida.  This hat is exactly what I neeeded.  I swim in my pool with the long sleeved swim shirts and I needed a very big hat that covered my face and neck.  This is perfect.  No-one will swoon at my beauty while I am wearing this hat : )  However, I may be quite fetching later when I am not burned and in a rash from the sun!  It is very big, sort of funny looking but I don't want to ruin some beautiful hats I have and this one I don't care if the water gets on it and it looks yucky, GREAT for sun protection.  Perfect size.  The adjustable string inside means that I can make it fit my head perfectly.  The large brim covers my face, neck and shoulders.

summary: A Fan Of Carhartt But These Socks Disapoint.
reviewText: Chances are if you're reading this review you're a bit finicky when it comes to socks. Generally I really like Carhartt and find their clothing to be well made and an excellent value. These socks were a disapointment on many levels. First and foremest they're surprisingly thin - as in paper thin.Compared to Champion Sport socks which usually sell at places like Marshalls for around $9 for a six pack these are I would venture to say 30% thinner. The lycra and spandex blend does little to help keep them up after the first wash. I found the gray "thicker" areas on the heel and toe to add some extra cushioning and the sewing - especially in the toe area makes for a more comfortable fit. But again, after one wash these benefits vanish.At this price you would expect these to surpass most anything you can grab off a shelf or out of a bin from most any big box store. However not the case here. You're paying almost twice the price for less quality and for that matter less socks!If you're looking for thick, well made absorbant cotton sox, I suggest taking a pass on these and keep hunting.

Love this top...I listened to the other reviews and glad I did!  I had thought this top was a bit 'pricey' but when I got it, I was really happy  with the cut, fit, softness and quality.  I might not recommend this style top for someone who has a really big stomach - but otherwise, Its quite flattering/slimming and I highly recommend!  .  Other: the fit seems true to size.  I'm tall and a size 14/16 and I ordered XL and its a little big.

I think people were expecting too much, but I loved it! I thought it looked better in person. People say it's too small, but it still fits a little big on me! That's just because I have small wrists. The price is really cheap, so you can't expect the best quality. What I received was a cute bracelet, and I'm satisfied.

I really, really love these Slippers.  When I arrive home from a long day of working, I look forward to the soft comfort of my Slippers.  The are so comforting to my feet.  I just love them.  I have another pair in Navy Blue and they too are just perfect.  You really don't want to take them off.  They keep your feet so warm and they are so, so "Soft".  They are a "Must Have".  I hope that you will enjoy them as much as I do.
purchased for a friend, has a bit of weight to it so you know its not cheaply made. very cute and stylish!
The fabric is thin so you'll probably want to wear a slip. The fit is flattering. A nice skirt for spring/summer.

I bought these Black Dockers Men's Gordon Cap Toe Oxford shoes, because of Dockers Brand name, and the price. What I got looks pretty good, well worth what I paid for. But now I realize only the uppers are leather, the rest of the construction is man made materials. I would've preferred to pay more and get a pair of shoes wholly made of real leather. However the workmanship these shoes looks pretty good. If they last as long as a pair of real leather shoes, then I made a good decision with these. They look and feel excellent. The rubber soles are a plus for me. So, time will tell if I bought a pair of shoes that will last a long time. Happy for now :-)
They hold their shape, fit well and work great under casual or dress button down shirts. My husband likes the fit and comfort.

This looks better in the picture than it does in person....but for the price it's ok......Since I bought this for a child to play dress up with, it works perfect....She loves her "angel heart" as she calls it. If I would have bought this for an adult, I would have been very disappointed.
This is a nice heavyweight t shirt. I got a white one and you cannot see through it at all.

I bought these a size up thinking they would work with socks now (winter) and without socks later but I am not sure they will last until warm weather they seem to run a little small.  Very cute and well made.  The two fasteners are a bit difficult, wish it was either the velcro or the elastic but thats my only complaint.
Even with socks my feet were cold in these.  I am thinking they will make a good summer slipper.  Make a good after bath/shower slipper also.

summary: Much tighter across bust than expected
reviewText: I ordered the black in a L because I have been ordering XL's in everything from Allegra K and most I am swimming in.  I am 5'2", 140lbs 34C-carry my weight in the middle and rear end since I am short-lol.  This top is tighter across the bust than I like, and the arms are snug not loose-but it isn't uncomfortable or too tight to wear-just would prefer another inch of material in the arms and a couple in the bust. It buttons up but gaps slightly so I wont be able to button as many as I'd like to or wear my favorite VS Bombshell bras.  The quality isn't horrible, in fact it is nicer than many things I buy at other popular stores like old navy, victorias secret, macys, buckle, etc. I mean its a shirt-its black it is fairly thick-it works.  It has the longer sides and shorter front and back so a long cami peeking out would be cute.  It is slimming and will look cute with skinny jeans and boots, a tank top and a scarf for sure.  I say get it but I wouldn't be afraid to size up ladies-it adds to the look of this flowy top.  I wish I would have.  All in all-I recommend it and am going to order the white one now-but in an XL.

Very gorgeous, but too big for my ears. (I'm 23 and I don't have small ears, mostly normal size) I felt like I was wearing too much "blind". Other than the size, the price was great and they really do sparkle. Just not an everyday wear, which was what I was looking for. I still like them and there sparkle shine, just won't wear them as much as I wanted too.

There are honestly very few places that I could find a decent pair of fit jeans in a half-size 31 Waist. Fortunately, Lee Jeans really knows how to make strong and comfortable jeans for the sake of a man and his need for comfort in his clothes. This pair of 31 X 32 jeans in a regular fit feels like a comfortable and relaxing glove that would wrap around your hands, but in this case you legs. I really enjoy the comfort of this pair of jeans. It aso doesn't drag down or feels like it is falling down compared to other brands in a half-size waist. So if you're looking for a great pair of jeans, Lee is definitely one brand well worth the effort.Price: BComfort: A-Overall: B+

summary: I don't like it but you might.
reviewText: I am not the biggest fan of this shirt. It definitely looks wayy different in person. In person it looks my like a workout shirt kind of a spandex/polyester material with a see through sheer strip that goes down the arm from the shoulder. It's long sleeved not quarter sleeved and it is not flattering at all on me.Only thing I can say for sure is that it is made from quality material but that's about it. I haven't even wore it yet. It's been months since I got it.

I ruptured a disk several years ago and have worn sandals around the house (hardwood floors) since then.  I read the rave reviews on Birkenstock sandals, so decided to give them a try.  After wearing them for a couple of days, they actually caused my lower back to start hurting and pain down my right leg.  Stopped wearing them for a day and pain went away.  Returned for a refund.  The sole also has very little traction.  When sitting down in a chair and trying to push back, the sandals would slide before I would.  Ordered a pair of CROC sandals and they are way more comfortable.
This petticoat is exactly as pictured.  It has 2 layers of super soft and super fluffy tulle.  It worked perfectly for a costume where I needed some extra layers.
The deep V is nice and deep.  The material is not thick but it is not too thin.  It is a nice shirt for the price.

it does come from hong kong so it takes it a month to get here, with that being said, it's really nice. the chain is long & it's cheap but you can add another chain if you want. this is a great gift for any girl or woman.
This shirt looks adorable over jeans or stretchies, washes well and it so comfortable. So far so good, no complaints.
Being a hospice nurse she is in and out and this is great for the colder months,  She ordered more too,

It's a bra, I have big boobs and to find well price, quality bras is hard enough, add to it that most are plain ugly, and you find yourself wanting something more.  It fits perfectly, supports the girls, and is cute.

I must admit that this is the first posture bra that I ever bought, and I must admit that I didn't know what to expect. What I got was a bra that really helps keep my back straight, and yet is comfortable to wear all day. The size seemed to be a little off, being just a little too large - I had to exchange it for one slightly smaller.It's a nice bra, and I definitely recommend it!(Review of Glamorise Plus Size Magic Lift Plus Front Hook Posture Bra)

This is a rugged, well-made and simple military-style belt.  It is great for wear with jeans or any casual clothes because it can be precisely adjusted as cannot be done with belts with notches.  The olive color looks great.  These belts come pretty large and smaller guys like me with 32" waists may want to cut off a couple of inches of the unfinished end of the belt, just like we all did in the Army, although this is not really necessary.  Great for casual wear and this belt should last about forever.  RJB.

This is a very comfortable bra; I forgot I was wearing it!  It is so soft and comfortabe that I will order another one.  The only reason I did not give it a 5-star rating is because it lacks support.  I am a D cup and need a bit more support than this bra offers me.  However, for a weekend, lounge around the house bra it is very comfortable.  The straps don't dig into my shoulders, the band is soft and comfortable, it gives you full coverage, I like this bra; just not for wearing to the office.
Very very comfy. I am a size 6, and ordered a 6. Fit is perfect. The aqua color looks great with a tan.

colorful- cool, easy care- However- be sure you do a vingar/salt rinse prior to use or packed- I used this one with out  a first set the color- It bled - If packed with damp clothing  such a  pool or beach wear-will bled- with out setting colors- Makes great travel blouse- easy pack- or around the house- a no iron- I warm-no wrinkle set dryer-  ready to use- Must hang right out of dryer to prevent wrinkling & yes, some shrinkage.Recommend for  budget friendly blouse  stylish in slacks/capris/shorts/skirt/jeans/over blouse for swim wear. Well made-

I bought this as a Christmas present for my wife.  She's fairly petite and typically wears size S tops (size 4 or 6 dress, depending  on the cut).  This shirt fits great and looks good too.  She's very happy with this shirt.
I do not like this belt because of lack of material. It is too hard. I will not recommend it.

summary: Very soft, ride well under pants
reviewText: Got these for use in Afghanistan and they do help with the basic cold & damp weather. They are very soft to the touch and ride properly under a pair of normal pants. These are NOT intended for truly cold weather or in windy conditions though. The wind cuts through these and eliminates any warmth, so I'm off to find a heavier material.

These seem to run half size smaller than the Emma style which I also bought @ Amazon.  For $35 on sale who wouldn't love them.  They are stylish and warm but feet don't sweat at the office.  They may not be Ugg quality but they aren't Ugg price and they are cuter.  Only worn 3 times so not sure about longevity.
I bought my first Croc years ago and I still have it, looks good and washing nice/easy.  This style is very good for the summer or for slipper ...........enjoy

summary: She loved it and fits great and is very comfortable
reviewText: She loved it and fits great and is very comfortable and she looks great in it and she like the slightly larger sleeevs

summary: Hands Down The Most Comfortable Slippers Ever
reviewText: These Sorel slippers were a more than welcome surprise. These are anythin but the useless slippers you get from relatives you don't care for during the Holidays and these are the LAST slippers you want to end up as your dogs favorite chew toy.The suede is is plush and the wooly inside is comfort at it's it best, warm and cozy they fit beautifully and are so light it's hard to belive you're wearing them until you realize your feet don't feel like blocks of dry ice. Unlike true clog style these have a heel which is a welcome touch especially if you venture outside. Which you can do to these thanks to the supple and textured soles.The quality is really superb, the slippers feature baseball stitching which s the strongest stitch there is. They break in easily and in no time at all. Just a superb, well made slipper at an equally excellent price.
My grand daughter absolutely adores this pendant of an adorable black Cat with many cute little pink bows! it's pretty high quality and has a little weight to it but it's real nice!

This isn't the most stylish purse, but it fits everything I need it to. I've been impressed with its durability It isn't very stylish, but I like the design and the color options. It fit into my larger "personal item" on a plane without taking up a lot of space, which was also a big plus.
Either my shirt was mislabeled, or someone doesn't know how large to make "large" size shirt.  It was so big, I just gave it to my grown son, who is much, much bigger than me.
I have always liked their brand of slippers by Isotoner, they fit me well.  I have been buying this brand for years because they are comfortable and they hold up well.

summary: I also have this bra in pink
reviewText: As stated on the pink bra, great fit, no underwire and has wide straps.  Seems to stay put all day.  My bra of all day choice.
These are a true to size, great shoe.  There is a reason these are so popular - the comfort is outstanding.  I highly recommend these.

This is a nice heavy henley shirt, an excellent value for the price.  They hold up well in washing -- no frayed seams, no lost buttons.  As someone else mentioned, they run a *little* large, but I prefer a loose fit anyway.  (Yeah, I'm a female, but I like to wear these as nightshirts ... )  You can find tee shirts cheaper than this, but they'll be made of much thinner material.

Sadly this product is going to be returned as was to small.  The description and review stated loose fitting so bought a medium, which is the normal size my (dress size 10-12) is.  However this was much to tight.Good marterial, nice product and was delivered quickly but just didnt fit sadly.

summary: looks and quality is ok but nothing more (5 stars rating was done via faked reports)
reviewText: proscheaplooks goodsoftconssyntatic and prone to gain static charges (don't massage your women when they wear this)buttons look very cheapoverall it is ok, but nothing special

The pendant itself was okay. It did have a peice of metal or whatever sticking out next to the ear that kinda runns the pendant for me but I figured whatever it's still cute and it's not sharp just not perfect and my daughter wont care if it's perfect. I wrapped it and gave it to her for Christmas (she's 2yr.) she was so excited when she opened it and wanted to put it on. Within minutes of opening it and trying to put it on the cheap clamp holding the pendant onto the actual necklace broke and got lost somewhere in the wrapping paper. Now all I have is a cheap chain and a not so perfect pendant that I'll need to find something to clamp it to a necklace it she'll ever be able to wear it. This was the worst thing I have ever bought on amazon and I wouldn't complain for the 1.29 I spent on it but it was for my 2yr. and she was so upset. DON'T BUY THIS!!!!

The shipping was spot on- it came on time and that was super convenient!The quality is actually pretty good! I would just avoid having the product snag on things..My necklace actually broke fairly quickly, unfortunately; however, the company totally replaced it for me free of charge, and also gave me the option of a refund if I didn't want another necklace- not to mention they were very friendly and fast at responding!Everyone who had seen the necklace before it broke really loved it and thought it was super cute! I really like it!
the reviews i read were helpful with this capri.  its a workout material but fits great.and looks trimming.(large).i like the large waist band and its sweat off ability.

After trying this on, I'm wondering what bra everyone else got that posted a review. It's comfortable and supportive, but it ran at least a full cup size small. And the shape - so much torpedo. My chest was so pointy it looked sharp. I'm sending it back before I hurt someone.

I love this blouse.  It's easy to wear, dressy enough for work, doesn't need too much ironing (I can get away with no ironing if I shake it out and hang it up immediately after washing -- the placket needs to be smoothed out a little bit).  The double lining in front means you don't HAVE to wear a camisole or undershirt, but I usually so since the back is pretty sheer.
super cute shirt.  fits nicely, true to size.  seems to be well made...the color in the picture is spot on w/ what I received.  all around satisfied
Stunning color and a floaty feel to wearing it. I really love it and might buy in other colors! I love gauzy material for summer.

This shirt fits as I expected and is very cute on! I am looking forward to wearing this to the office in the winter with black slacks. It does take a while to arrive, but given the price, it is well worth it.

For somebody with the right body, these shirts look and feel great. They are form fitting without being tight. The fabric is ultra-soft and feels fantastic. They show every curve and bulge through the shirt.These run pretty large. Normal size is XL, and a Large fit perfectly. They are wide at the shoulders, exactly the size for the people who should wear this shirt.There is something cool about the half the fibers being made from bamboo and the other half of cotton. I really like the greener side of this shirt. Construction is solid - the seams have neat and rugged sewing.This is an outstanding comfortable shirt.

summary: REEBOK WOMENS PRINCESS AEROBICS SHOE WHITE
reviewText: THEY FIT GREAT GOT A HALF SIZE LARGER AND IT WORKS OUT WELL WEARING WITH SOCKS I CAN'T DO AEROBICS IN THEM BUT I DO GET MY STEPS IN :) GREAT FIT AND NICE FEEL TO THEM THANKS YOU ROCK AS ALWAYS AMAZON!
What guy doesn't need a classic pair of Dockers khakis?The pants are low maintenance and go with everything. I keep two colors, tan and navy, in the closet at all times.

I am short and chunky and this shirt is huge on me. I'm glad that I ordered from this company. I wasn't so sure because the first batwing sweater I got was a little cheaply made but I wore it to work and got complimented by my hot boss. This is not sweater material and it doesn't look cheap.

I originally was looking for a gray top that I could wear during hot nights and this was a winner! It falls around hip level (I am 5'2) and is VERY soft plus the material is breathable. It is a light material and runs a little large, but if you like the loose look, get your regular size...I know I do!
GRANDDAUGHTER WEARS THIS WITH A PAIR OF GRAY TIGHTS AND IT'S A GREAT LOOK FOR A TEENAGER.  WELL MADE, WASH AND WEAR.
Another one of those you get what you pay for. I was hopeful since it looked like it could be pretty in the picture, but wasn't impressed when it arrived.

summary: You cant complain for a buck!
reviewText: I got these last fall as I was planning an extended back country trek and knew I'd end up breaking whatever sunglasses I took with me. And I did! I cant complain how quickly the bridge broke (almost two weeks) because they only cost a dollar and some change. Great disposable glasses.
Great heavy material and it looks very much like the picture//.which never happens.LOVE it. Will be in heavy rotation in the fall. LOVE

Funny, I'm wearing it right now as I type this review. Love the fabric and even the fit, although it fits much smaller then I expected (thought it would hang on me like in the pic, but no so much). I would still recommend this awesome shirt to anyone thinking of buying it. I'm going to buy the reverse one as well (black shirt, gray skull design).

I guess I should have expected that the tall, thin model would make this shirt look a lot cuter than it is.  I'm 5'1, curvy and ~145 and this just looks like an ugly lab-coat on me!  It's not worth it to pay for return shipping, so I guess I'll use it for a hair and makeup cape.  The vendor was great, though.  I mentioned that it took awhile for it to be shipped in my packaging review, and they gave me a small refund of my shipping price, which was a nice gesture!

Normally, I love Levi jeans but I'll pass on these...I am 5'2 and these jeans almost go up to my belly button!!! Plus the pant legs are loose...I looked like a clown! Definitely made for a much taller person. Looks nothing like the pic too, more like jeans my MOM would wear.
Belt is fab, the leather is quite impressive considetring the actual cost of the belt and tyhe style is classic.

Wow, I'm pretty shocked as to how many positive reviews this bra has.  The cup is shaped very weird, When on, it makes my boobs look like torpedoes!  And it pushes them wayyy to far apart.  They stick out too much on the sides and just makes the shape of my chest look un-natural.  No bueno.  I see other reviewers have had the same experience as me with this bra.  I sent it back immediately!The Bali #3372 is the one that makes my boobs look great and feel great, even though it's itchy sometimes.  This one looked almost the same, so I gave it a try.  But the way it looks on is very different from the way it looks off.

They may be pricier than other leggings but boy do they have much better quality! They are a smooth relaxing fit. No binding at the waist or constantly yanking them up. Nice color(I got graphite) it goes with anything! I would definatley recommend to anyone! I'm going to get more colors! Ladies these are a must for your wardrobe.

I love these. I've got big hips and thighs and these pants have a modern fit without being cut so close to the skin that I look like I'm about to hit the club (I have this problem with a lot of scrubs). At the same time, they aren't cut like the one-size-fits-all scrubs that you see so many of that assume that the wearer has a giant, square butt that comes up to their shoulder blades. Im 5'3" and it hit above the knee slightly but again you are able to wear it lower or higher on your body or roll the waistband to shorten if you want....its the perfect style in my opinion and I own at least 20 petticoats. summary: Not sure about the soles on rocky trails
reviewText: I purchased a pair of the Merrell Road Glove shoes for running on rocky trails. Unfortunately, they were painful, because pointy rocks pummeled my feet. So I figured that I'd give the Trail Glove a try, since it's actually made for running on trails, but as of this review, I'm still unsure (note that this is my initial review of the shoe and that I'll likely update it later.)The sole in the heel and the forefoot of the Trail Gloves may be a bit sturdier or more cushioned then with the Road Gloves, but the arch actually seems less sturdy and/or cushioned.  As of this point, I've only worn them around the yard and the heels and forefoot areas *may* be fine on rocky surfaces (I'm still not sure), but I worry about rocks poking through the arches. I guess you're supposed to step around rocky surfaces, so they don't poke in the arch area, but that's not possible on the trails where I run, so this has my very concerned. Other then that, I like them better then the Road Glove, although that may have something to do with the fit, which I'll expand on later.I also own a pair of Merrell Mix Master Trail Shoes and they're wonderful on trails. Unlike the Trail Glove, I believe they have a 0.4mm lift and the non-Vibram sole is more cushioned, which makes a big difference on rocks. If you want a great trail shoe, I have no hesitation in recommending the Mix Master from lot's of experience with the shoe. By the way, the Mix Master is supposed to be a hybrid of a barefoot/traditional running shoe, or an introduction to barefoot running, and I think it offers the best of both worlds.The thing I like about all these shoes is that they're light, airy and, most importantly, they handle getting wet well (i.e. they dry quickly and water doesn't ruin them.) I thrash mine, putting them through all sorts of abuse and they handle it very well. I'd actually been looking for shoes like these for many years before coming across these Merrell shoes, although other brands do make similar models today.Merrell is one of those brands of shoes where I struggle to find the best fit, because my normal size seems a bit big, but a half size smaller seems a little snug, so I normally stick with my normal size. When I purchased the Road Glove, I nearly went with a half size smaller, but the snugness had me worried enough to go with my normal size, instead. When I purchased the Trail Glove, I decided to give sizing down a chance and they fit perfect (remember that you're not going to wear socks with these shoes or I'd have gone with my normal size to compensate.) The Trail Glove may be slightly larger then the Road Glove, because they don't seem snug at all (in hindsight, I think sizing down with the Road Glove would have worked fine, also.) So, I'd recommend sizing down a half size, unless you have really big/wide feet or you plan on wearing socks for some reasons.Overall, these are very nice shoes, although I'm not a big fan of Vibram soles on barefoot shoes. The Vibram soles do offer a more barefoot feel and they're probably fine for running on soft surfaces, but I'm not sure that they have the cushion I need for rocky surfaces (they're great for wearing around the house, if you don't want to get your feet dirty, though.) However, I'm going to give them a try, in hope that they're better then the Road Glove on rocky surfaces, and I'll report back on what I find.
Love these.  I live in them on weekends; walk the dog in them.  The most comfy flip flop-type shoe I've ever owned.  Will never go back to wearing regular, thin flip flops again.

I suspect I'm like a lot of people -- trying to find a wallet that works for everything, each new purchase falling slightly short of the mark.  Not so with the Mundi Big Fat Flap Wallet!  This one is IT!I purchased my first Mundi from another source -- a lovely pale beige nubuck number.  I've had it for almost a year now, and it's holding up extremely well, despite living daily in my book bag (I'm a full-time "non-traditional" university grad student) and being transferred several times a week into my purse.  It's starting to show a little wear -- just a bit of shine around the edges of the nubuck, not a hint of wear on the interior (I haven't noticed any problems a previous reviewer had with it picking up "grime" -- maybe I keep my hands cleaner or something?), but it still functions perfectly.  It holds all my cards (student ID, copy card, credit cards, insurance cards) with room to spare.  Cash is securely stowed in the zippered compartment.  Checkbook and pen have their own places.  And it fits in a smallish Kipling bag that I use for day-to-day errands.  It's maybe a bit larger than your typical "checkbook wallet" -- so bear that in mind if you carry a REALLY small purse.I just ordered my second Mundi Big Fat Flap Wallet, this time in red from Amazon for a much better price than I paid for the beige.  No more annual wallet purchase trying to find the right fit!  This one's for life.

summary: Hubby was happy with them, but sizing can vary between the colors
reviewText: I picked up two of these pairs of jeans for my husband in size 34x34, one in the light stonewash color and and the other in the color called inspector. I bought them both at the same time from Amazon, and they were even delivered in the same package. However the waist in the light stonewash color jeans was about a inch smaller than the one in the inspector color. I'm guessing this is just variations in the sizing, but it something to keep in mind when buying them. You may buy a few pairs of the same jeans and find that the waist of each pair fits a little differently.The light stonewash pair is a nice Levi's color, not a 1980's stone wash. Just a lighter color of denim with white and blue color variations. It's subtle, something you would wear. Not something that looks like it came out of the attic from 25 years ago.The inspector color was my favorite. It's a great medium blue. Not dark by any means, but also not a light color. Inspector comes looking like the perfect shade of blue that will go with anything. Can be dressed up or working-in-the-garage casual.The Levi's 550 jeans are perfect if you're looking for regular basic jeans (not skinny jeans for guys, not boot cut for guys, etc). They're great for anyone who wants just basic fitting jeans, similar to the the straight leg style, but looser in the legs, which is perfect if buying the straight leg style is too tight in the legs for you.  It's the kind my 33 year old husband likes, and also my 61 year old father.
