I screwed up and put it in the dryer-which I NEVER do with Allegra tops (I own many) but even though I did this it didn't shrink on low heat....bonus!  I want it in black...its annoying this top doesn't come in black when it seems 98% of their stuff does. I gave it 4 stars because although it is soft and didn't shrink like a shriveled up raisin after the dryer I think the color description is bogus. It should be called rose not fuchsia....
This is a really great quality hoodie, I bought it for my boyfriend and he says it's the best one he's ever had. It has a soft lining inside and looks fantastic.

These may not be for everyone, but if you are looking for something with style, I can't think of anything better to have then these. They certainly fit in all the right places and they make a great alternative for the likes of the Lysse leggings for women-Ponte Knit Seam Detail Wide Leg Legging (Style#1410). These treggings are the definition of fashion. I think anyone would be impressed with them.

I have been wearing Naturalizers for many years. They were always the go to shoe for comfort. Not this time. I would return them, but I need to suffer through an evening with them, and don't have time to return and buy another pair. Wow, I have worn the same size shoe for 50 years, am wearing a relatively new pair of Naturalizers as I write this, in red, but when I put them on, I had to squeeze my feet into them, and then take off immediately and check the inside size. Unless they were marked incorrectly, they are just a bad purchase. Maybe that stuff that stretches your shoes will work. Naturalizers are  usually comfortable when put on the very first time. So beware!

summary: Soft pants, fit is decent, useable pockets
reviewText: I bought these specifically for the pockets. I needed pockets that were big enough to hold the large Galaxy Note phone without it sticking out of the top of the pocket. These are deep pockets and functional. The fabric on the pants is soft and lighter than a traditional sweat pant material. Nice lightweight pants for around the house or out at the barn on a hot day.

I've only tried these on around the house so can't comment on the longevity of them, but they are very comfortable ("squishy" might be a good adjective).  The strap design and wedge make for a cute sandal.  The do run small, and I wish they offered them in half sizes.  I wear an 8.5, ordered a 9, and they're just shy of being so small my toes flop over the edges when I walk. However, a 10 would be too big.  They also run narrow, so if you have wider feet you may want to avoid these.  Since they're comfy and just a tad too small, I'm going to keep them since they weren't very expensive.

summary: These are really comfortable! Skechers needs quality control on sizes between styles!
reviewText: White womens size 11I would give a 5 star because this fits perfect but I am a bit disturbed at Skechers lack of consistency in sizes.If you want return customers you really need to give them confidence that the size they purchased in one style is going to work as well in other styles!This is my 3rd pair of "Go Walk" and they fit perfectly.I have one pair canvas in white - they are wider in the toe box.I have another pair in black canvas and they fit as if they are at least 1/2 size smallerOf all of the Skechers styles this style is my favorite for all day comfort!The memory foam is really cushy and the higher part on the back of the heel keeps the shoe on my foot with no slipping.I have washed the canvas style shoes and they come out great but take a long time to air dry.I have not had this one long enough to wash but the surface is interesting - looks sort of like leather but feels more like fabric. Which makes it very comfortable - I just hope it holds up!

summary: Good, but not as good as more expensive ones
reviewText: I wear  comp. shorts for  sweat management, to avoid the stickiness and especially the chafing when running long distance.These fit nicely (i bought medium, my usual size), and while not exactly compressing, they don't ride up.BUT I don't agree with reviewers who find these to be as comfortable as higher priced shorts.I've always found the material to be somewhat itchy and not as comfortable as cotton boxers (when not running) and I recently bought some UA ones (found them on sale at the same price as Champions) and they (the UAs) feel definitely more comfortable when you first wear them (before sweating).The sweat wicking properties of these Champions are not on a par with UAs either, you can definitely tell the difference over 10 miles, in NY spring/summer.Then again, unless I find other deals, I'll be buying more of these Champions in the future, since they provide a a decent running experience (for shorter training runs) at an unbeatable price. But if you're free of budget constraints (unlike me), don't be hesitant to try other brands.

summary: Hands down - the best boxer brief in existence.
reviewText: I came from regular various cotton boxer briefs, silk, sport, CK. The second I put these on I felt quite a relieving "chill" of comfort that I was surprised by. I was skeptical to buy them, given they are very expensive for a single pair of briefs - however they are by far worth it. I've been buying about one pair every month or so and replacing everything else I own with them. I have recommended them to three different people - and convinced them to use them exclusively as well. They do not hold odor in, so if you wear them for a couple days, work out in them, or whatever - they will not stink.I wear them as my dailies, but they've replaced my other special purpose briefs. Like working out - I like them a lot better then my other compression boxer briefs. While they don't "compress" as much obviously - they seem to wick moisture a lot better then any other boxer briefs I've had, and generally feel more comfortable when working out. I also wear them backpacking when I'm out in the wilderness for a week or so at a time and don't lug around extra change of clothes on my back. They wash up well in a little bit of water, and dry within a few hours. I'd definitely recommend anyone looking for a luxury pair of boxers, and has never felt comfort in their shorts before, to try these.
Warm, long, and soft. What could you want from a pair of leggings except can you also make these in a variety of other colors. These are great!

This looks really cute in the picture. It doesn't fit on me at all like in the picture. I order a large, which should be baggy on me according to the size chart, but it's not. I can, and will wear it, but I wish it fit more like in the picture. I prefer my tops to be long and baggy. I wear a lot of leggings due to a disability, so I like tops I can wear with the leggings. This I'll wear with sweat pants.
Got these for my hubby to try and they are perfect and comfy for his long work day!! The xl were a good fit for his size 13 feet.. Not too thick or thin and he's requested I buy more! :)
I love this top, it is extremely classy fits great I get compliments everytime I wear it, will definitely order again and recommend to my friends.

Definitely high quality. These shoe trees sell as a pair. Two in the box.Spring loaded with a split instep. Force them into the toe of your boot/shoe and push the heel home. The instep widens to mold to the shape of the instep and toe of your footwear and the spring mechanism pushes back against the heel.These trees will break your toughest footwear in within a week.Perfect form and fit, very functional and priced right.I feel safe claiming the mechanics and the form will last a lifetime.I'm very happy with my purchase.

This purse exceeded my expectations because of it's price.  The color is nice, the feel is soft, and I love the handles!  They make the bag look like a designer bag!  I haven't tried the shoulder strap yet, I don't really like the way it looks on there and seems to take away from the look of the bag - that's not to say that I won't ever use the strap, just my personal preference on the looks.  Give this purse a try, I'm betting you'll like it as much as I do.

summary: A remarkably nice necklace for the price
reviewText: While I was browsing on Amazon, I came across the seahorse pendant necklace for less than a dollar, including free shipping. I saw mostly positive reviews, so I ordered it and a few other pieces of jewelry that were very inexpensive, thinking that they would be nice little gifts for the young nieces in our family. I was pleasantly surprised that it's actually a nice piece of costume jewelry. The zinc alloy metal gives it some heft, weighing 0.6 ounce (18 grams), and the antiqued bronze finish looks great, although it's a bit darker than the picture shows.Delivery from China took 23 days (including Christmas and New Year's Day, which may have delayed delivery).

summary: True to size and fabulously priced
reviewText: I have back issues and plantar fasciitis. My psychical therapist recommended these to me and I must say they help immensely with both issues. I find them comfortable and easy care. I definitely recommend them to anyone needing great shoes for walking or standing on your feet for long periods. I will be purchasing these for my husband, my twin sister, my daughter, and anyone else with one or both of my issues!

larger than expected given other reviews of other shirts by same vendor. very stretchy. I ordered in XL since I am 38DD but probably could've sized down. wasn't sure if it would shrink in wash so kept the XL. so far no shrinking. It is thicker than expected - which is good - but it means that it's harder to layer with multiple shirts. I love wearing it with leggings to sleep in o around town. Not a work short for me, however. I ordered this in 4 colors.

I got this here for a buck or two, and I let my daughter play dress up with it. Its a fun piece.The only side thing I would mention is that there are some folks out there that are buying them here for a buck or two, then selling them on the Sale Pages locally for 4x as much. Kudos to them for making mad profit.

I love these.  I wear a 38DD, and the XL fits me perfect.  I despise underwires, and like my skin to "breathe," which is exactly what these bras allow you do.  Nice product and the price is a perk.  No issues with wear.  Only good for under t-shirts or sweaters- casual attire.

I have various kinds of Toms shoes, but these are by far the most comfortable, mostly because of the canvas material, which softens with first wearing. Very comfy. The Ash color has an almost greenish hue to it, but it's very slight. It is not a true gray, if that's a concern.
D&K Leggings (Full Thin) White Plus , Fits really well, I Love how they feel so soft,they are comfortable too...

summary: NO strap pain! SOFT support! Comfort of a sport bra!
reviewText: I am very excited! Finally I have found a bra with the comfort of a sport bra, no uni-boob, and no strap pain! This bra has soft lightly padded supportive cups and an adjustable back tab. The shoulder straps are not adjustable and I have not found this to be a problem for me. It is soft and stretchy and if it does seem to loosen up a bit I simply adjust the back strap to tighten it up for more support. That simple inconvenience, if you call it that, is much less annoying than wearing a bra with itchy scratchy straps that dig and hurt.  I bought two initially, wore them several times and then purchased two more. The price is right - the fit can't be beat- the comfort is a dream come true. Hope that Bali makes these forever!

My husband has had two of these shirts for the past eighteen months, and he loves them so much that I just hopped on Amazon (where we bought the original two) to buy him two more, along with theChampion Men's Double Dry Training Short.They're really nice quality, and have held up well with weekly washing.He sweats a lot, and they do a great job of absorbing sweat and odor.After awhile, we have found that the odor tends to stay inside the fabric, but they're fairly inexpensive, so replacing them every two years or so isn't a problem.They also have a nice range of motion in the underarm area, so you can move your arms freely doing various workouts.They also run true to size.Champion always makes great products, and these are really nice quality!As I mentioned in my review of the shorts, these aren't fancy, but they do the job and do it well.
always looking for a sale and liked this one am not sure i like costume jewelry but when holding grankids i don't mind them pulling on it as much. it is what it is at a good price

summary: You get what you pay for
reviewText: Bought this to match my necklace and earrings, not a good idea. Just received it yesterday and tried to contact company and no luck. 4 stones are missing and the brass on the bracelet itself is tarnished and flaking.  Not happy at all.
This product fits wonderful and it is made excellent! It is super flattering and makes you feel as hot as the lady in the picture is!

Underfoot -- which was a problem with Crocs' "Sexi" styles except for this one. Lightweight, nicely "built" and just a shade large -- how I wish Crocs would catch on to HALF-SIZES in all their products. I ordered 8s and could have used 7.5s - they lost a star for no halvesies...
love everything from Soffe Men and will order again and always please with shipment and would recommend this item to anyone
I love this scarf!! The color and size is great! The quality isn't the best of the best, but for the price...wow! If you're careful and hand wash it, it should last you awhile.
no more boxers riding up & bunching up in my 'production' areathis is my 6th set & i wont ever return to traditional-fitting boxers

Is very comfortable to wear, was a perfect fit and like that the neck of the shirt wasn't to tight. In fact,,,, I liked this shirt so much that I have ordered another. And probably will order more soon after that. This is a good t-shirt. :)

I went from a bloated tri-fold that I never kept in my pocket because it was so large - to this. While it was an improvement in thickness, it wasn't nearly as much as I was hoping for. If it were me designing it I would not have made each credit card slot have it's own separator. Would've saved a good amount of width, and would rather stack 3 cards without separators then deal with the extra width. Only other gripe with it is the center card/license sleeve is not removable - it's sewn in - despite what some reviewers stated. Current width at the widest part sitting on it's back is 32.12mm/1.264in .On the plus sides :* Thick leather* double stitched around all the outer seams.* 9 card slots + id slot + 2x sideways slots behind the two sides of the id sleeve* Individual dividers on cards does make quick access to any card* Good priceWhen I get tired of this in a few years, I will most likely look around again for yet another thinner wallet. Otherwise this has been my favorite wallet I've ever had, and would recommend it to anyone who isn't seeking a real slimfold.

summary: Check for snags....poor quality control aka you get what you pay for
reviewText: Two plusses, three if you count the cheap price:  colors are pretty and the fabric is soft.Negative: snags. I bought seven of these in various colors (red x 2, green, orange, purple, peach, burgundy). Two had significant snags with pulled out threads and one had a discolored spot. I'm hoping the two I included in gift baskets---therefore didn't unbag to check-- were okay, but I didn't ask the recipients.I am not returning mine. I figure I'll wear them with the snags and count it as the cost of trying to get a cheap deal online where I cannot check.I'd advise you to check these (ie, take them out of the plastic bag they come in) if you plan to give as a gift. If it's for you and you don't mine living with snags, go for it.Note: These are very thin. Unlike some thicker pashminas, they will not keep you warm. I think of them as decorative with minimal warmth addition. Pretty colors and soft, but thin.
Crocs as usual does not disappoint. The sandals are very soft, great to be at home or go to the beach, can be cleaned easily, and the material is very good.

So far the shoe is comfortable,soft,and i like the color!i'm a size 7 and ordered a size 7 which seems to be a good fit . It feels like my feet may  get too hot when walking w/o socks soi'll be testing soon with very light socks.I have yet 'go walk'.

summary: really cute, great price, feel very soft and warm
reviewText: These are almost like very thick support pantyhose, but more stretchy.  They feel silky and with a tunic, make me feel much skinnier.  I've had a lot of abdominal surgeries and have problems wearing very tight pants, but these are perfect.  I agree with everyone else that these are really great and well worth the price - I ordered other colors.

I am very happy with this purchase that I am giddy from the satisfaction, lol!!! Top is true to size, so get your size...it's suppose to be a little loose otherwise it would look wierd. The top is semi-see through, but not much. You can get away with wearing it alone. It's a raglan top so it's to be expected...I love the top so much, I'm considering getting another color lol!!!

I've worn it two times since I've purchased it and can't get enough. It's so snug and well fitting. I love purple, so this goes great with a pair of black or purple leggings and some really cute boots.

I've never had aviator glasses before. They always remind me of cops. But since moving back to Sunny California, I have been seeing these everywhere. Then I tried on a pair and some guy told me I look like Angie Harmon. So of course I ordered a pair. I love them. Everyone comments on how hot they are. I'm old as dirt, so I will take the "hot" comments whenever I can get them.I am 99% sure the lenses in these are glass, not plastic. They're definitely genuine Ray Bans -- I've owned lots of Ray Bans, just never the aviator style. Oh -- I purchased directly from Amazon LLC. I'm not sure I would trust anyone else.There are three basic sizes. 55mm is for pinheads (sorry, smaller people with smaller heads). 58mm is what I wear and I am the size of a large woman or an average man. And 62mm which is for people with enormous heads that they can barely hold up....or maybe just slightly larger people. I was told that most people wear the 58. Small women wear the 55. And large men take the 62 (it may be 61...it is hard to remember all of this information with my average sized head)Great purchase. Great price. I will be buying more...
This is a good looking bra.  When Felina state it is for a full bust I get one cup size smaller than I would on other bras.  I recommend this product.
Soft and comfy. Large neck so definitely  wear a tank under it.  Thie little gem is so cute and it's great for running errands.

I was very excited and anxious to get this item. Unfortunately, when it arrived, it doesn't look like the picture or have the "batwings" that the description stated. I ordered a large and usually buy a large in tops since I wear a 38DD bra size.  This top fit is an oversized top (but not like it shows in the photo) with a fitted bottom. The material is a little toughter than the norm but nothing entirely bad.This top is more for someone who wears a small...no matter what size you order.  I can still use the top but with jeans...it just makes me look wider but for $11 and change, can't expect too much and I don't like returning items when they're that inexpensive.

Okay, so I wear an L-XL in womens so I bought the 3XL in this because it is Junior sized and I could have gone with the 2XL instead (maybe even XL) but I love this shirt! I just received it and all I have done is try it on but it is beautiful I will buy more like these! I have a big errr chest area but not belly area so I could have went with the smaller size..hope that helps future buyers. If I have problems I will update my review.
what???  is this lingere material??  should i feel sexy in them (lol)??  well??  i swear designers r getting soooo cheap

It's a good minimizer, comfortable, and not a harness. 3 hook back closure and tagless. There's nothing scratching your back and no uncomfortable side wire. The fabric is soft and smooth.  The bra can easily be worn with lower cut tops. Surprisingly, the cups are true to size, but the bra give very good separation and cleavage....just like the photo.  The straps are comfortable.  I don't normally wear underwires.  These underwires are comfortable

summary: Low-rise waist, slim and straight, good sizing
reviewText: Levi Men's 514 Slim Straight Jeans, Dirt Rush color, 34x34The sizing is spot-on, I normally wear size 34x34 pants and these fit properly. The Dirt Rush color looks like a bronze/brown/mud color mixed in with dark blue denim. It is not apparent on Amazon's photographs, but it is not a bad color.The fit is definitely straight, and it actually feels a tad looser but is perfectly fine. The waist is very low-rise. I'm not usually one for following fashion trends, but magazines for men's fashion seem to indicate low-rise jeans are "good to go". These definitely don't look old fashioned, but the pricing is good, and the styling is sharp. The material and construction quality is excellent as well.I have a pair of Kenneth Cole reaction jeans that are a slim straight cut as well, but are sized tighter. Unfortunately, the material is paper thin. I actually burned a small hole in those when I got too close to the exhaust of my Ducati motorcycle. I was able to fix that with blue permanent marker, so that tells you how much I liked the styling. These Levi 514 jeans are a close match but with an even lower-rise waist. The pockets are great, and I have no serious complaints.Overall: 4/5 stars, great styling, sizing is good, and the color scheme is contemporaryUPDATE: 11 JAN 2013After wearing two pairs of these jeans for a long period of time, I find that the hems could have been tighter (at the ankles). They are advertised as straight cut, but they could be "straighter" in my opinion.The front pocket openings need to be wider. I can barely fit my hand in there, let alone with a pair of winter gloves. My latest pair has a really lose fitting button that comes undone each time I unzip the fly to use a urinal.
We bought several of these moustache items and have had lots of fun times just playing around with them. The ring is adjustable which is nice.
I wear this ring most days as a thumb ring, it is holding up and looks great, I love it!
these pants are very cute and comfortable. they are true to size. these are not spandex type material they are more cotton feeling which is nice.
Received this this morning, love it and it fits well. Material is soft and very comfortable. Love the white color which will go with everything and I will get another one this week. 100% please

summary: Love my skirt(s), they are cool.
reviewText: The summers in Ne Orleans are hot. That is a fact. I can be much more comfortable in my skirts. I love them, have a number of skirts in different colors from the same style because they are so versatile and so comfortable. I can't wait for some more styles to come out.

These earings are truly beautiful and are sized nicely.However, what lets them down is the packaging and presentation.As world marketers these would probably sell in countries not too fussy about suede pouches or silk lined boxes but they would not sell in say Japan where presentation is paramount and the market is huge.A nice little lined box with a name or logo would enhance the product greatly.Of course it will cost more but I think worth paying for.Stan ChunNew Zealand
Got a pink one just like it...Im stacking them. I like the ring because its cute and girly. Fits well.

summary: I bought many wallets in each color
reviewerName: KonaGal "When I do good, I feel good.  When I...
reviewText: I really like the bright vibrant colors because they are easy to see inside my purse, the black ones I gave away as gifts.
They are cut a little large and hardly shrink, but overall serve the purpose very well. Next time I will order a size smaller, but definitely reorder again.

This arrived today, and its a beautiful bag for the price - the color is the dark blue as pictured, and it seems to be very well made. All of the stitching is good, and the zippers are good and are not sticky(hate sticky zippers!). The bag has lots of room with inside pockets and zip as well as the zip compartment on the outside.It also comes with a detachable shoulder strap. If you want a stylish bag that looks a lot more expensive than it is, then I recommend this one. Will definitely order again!

summary: Great price, but the tools break very easily!
reviewText: The most important pieces of this kit for me was the hammer, the watch band holder, and one of the 3 link punches (the largest one). The link punch broke after about 8 uses. The punch itself is pressed into the handle, so after awhile it will come loose. What I did was use heavy duty epoxy/superglue on the end of the punch and pressed it back into the handle. Otherwise the band holder and hammer worked perfectly to re-size several of my watches. Just doing a few re-sizes pays for the kit.Overall: 4/5 stars, great price but the quality is lacking. One of the roll pin punches broke but I fixed it. These should have been a single piece design like a Starrett punch.

My husband had worn the insoles out in the Oboz boots he bought two years ago.  After trying repeatedly (without any replies) to contact Oboz about getting replacement insoles, I found these Superfeet insoles here on Amazon.  They arrived in two days, with Prime shipping, and my husband put them in his boots.They fit perfectly in his size 14 boots, and he immediately loved the arch support and feel of these insoles.  We thought we might have to cut them down because they fit boots up to size 15, but they fit without any adjustments.  He likes the way they cushion his steps, and that the fabric on the top doesn't allow his sock to slip inside the boot.They aren't cheap, but they are much better than the $8 Dr. Scholl's insoles we found in stores.

summary: niceEshop Vintage glazed Lady Cat Pendant
reviewText: My bff goes by Kitten, she's a vocalist, and I bought 6,  not looking at the dimensions. They arrived and were 3 times as big as I thought. The bracelet I was making became a FLAWLESS chain belt and it ROCKED! I wish I would have bought 4 more for my nieces!

This top is loose in the right places and tapers down to a slim bottom that can be adjusted to flatter many body types. Versatile too and a great bargain! Got two for myself and one as a gift. This brand is a bargain for fun trendy styles!

I'm only 26 and I always wore bras with underwire, thinking that was the only way you could get proper lift/cleavage, but this bra does this and is COMFORTABLE! With my job I am usually hunched over all day and my underwire bras would dig into me and I couldn't wait to get home to rip it off but since switching to Bali, these are all I wear now!
Gorgeous fit!!! absolutely love this top.  The material is pretty thick and falls superbly on the hips and shoulders.  Neck line also fits perfectly.

I wouldn’t change anything about this skirt, and I’m definitely contemplating buying more in other colors. I purchased this skirt in Charcoal, size Medium (I’m 5’ 4”, 125 lbs with curvy hips) and I would wear it every day if it could. The ruching in the front is very flattering and it has a really great length. It’s made with stretchy material without looking cheap. Definitely recommend this skirt. Now I just need to decide which color to purchase next!

summary: Not a fan of the coffee material in all honesty-but its OK
reviewText: I have been buying Allegra K like it is going out of biz lately-since I discovered them.  I am loving the prices and the uniqueness.  This top is fine, just don't care for the material the coffee color is made of-it is not super soft or breathable material like most other things.  Otherwise, nice big loose fit-rocks with leggings and boots-can't beat the price.

I purchased two of these scarves; one in pink the other in camel. They are lightweight so you can wear them from early fall well into spring. The width and length are great for creating various looks and different wrap styles. They were delivered to my home promptly and in perfect condition. If you like wearing scarves as an accessory these won't disappoint. I've received many compliments on them both and wear them often.

summary: MG Collection red trendy patent leather doctor style purse
reviewText: Absolutely gorgeous bag.  I can't wait to use it with my new red shoes.  It took me 3 years to find red shoes and a nice handbag.
Comfortable great bra. I'm not one to like wearing bras but this one is nice. I will be ordering it in more colors.

summary: A remarkably nice necklace for the price
reviewText: While I was browsing on Amazon, I came across the octopus necklace for 64 with free shipping. I saw mostly favorable reviews, so I ordered it and a few other pieces of jewelry that were less than a dollar apiece, thinking that they might be nice little gifts for the young nieces in our family. When the necklace came in the mail, I was surprised that it's actually a very nice piece of costume jewelry. It has a little heft, weighing 0.5 ounce (15 grams), and the antiqued bronze finish looks great.I have no idea how anyone can manufacture something like this and ship it from Beijing, China, and make any profit selling it for 64. Honestly, I would have paid several dollars for a piece this nice.
very sloppy paint job. however it looks durable, and it is okay for the price. might be a good add on gift or stocking stuffer.
These fell apart after a month of so.Cheaply made.And the girls really need to be wearing Uggs to be stylish.

summary: I think my other shoes are getting jealous
reviewText: I bought my first pair of these shoes in the black/grey color with the intent of using them only for my daily walking exercise.  They've been great for that purpose...even more comfortable than lightweight running/walking shoes that I paid over $100 for.  Besides the light weight, my favorite part of these shoes is the fact that they are a slip-on made of soft, stretchy fabric.  The tendons on the top of my foot in front of my ankle can become very painful when I increase my mileage too much or don't take a day off from exercising often enough.  With regular walking or running shoes, this spot is directly under where the shoelaces are tied and no matter how loosely I tie the laces, they really bother the sore tendons.  These Go Walk slip-ons are very soft and fortunately fall just a bit lower on the top of my foot.  Perfect.  They are SO extremely lightweight that I am a bit worried about how long they will hold up with daily use; so I'll update my review if they have an overly short lifespan. I've already put in an order for a couple more pair in other colors.  Other than those times when I need dressier shoes, I find myself reaching for these shoes for every other outing.UPDATE:  Well, a few weeks later, and I'm still really liking the shoes.  There is one issue that I've noticed with them, though.  The soles are very soft and the tread is made up of varying size protruding circles.  Because of this, lots of small pea-sized pebbles get lodged in the tread.  I try to remember to remove my shoes immediately or at least check the bottoms when I come into the house since I've already scratched our wooden floors a number of times with the gravel.
my wife couldn't even close the front?? the 42DDD was too large, this 42DD was too small? don't know what to think about that...
Nice color. Fits true. Flows nicely and thin and comfy. Perfect for warm days or nights. Wheres more colors. I like it.

summary: Wheat is too light, but great value
reviewText: I can't find a camel colored, ponte pencil skirt to save my life.  I was so excited to find this skirt and I ordered a size down based on other reviews.High waist, knee length, fitted until just around the knees as shown (in a size smaller than I usually wear). Decent fabric, it's opaque and feels strong. For the price, it's a great skirt.But the color "Wheat" is more like light nude to ivory. I mean, I have some serious sun-free Caucasian skin and this skirt is lighter than my legs. It's so flattering I'm tempted to keep it, but I have a thing about wearing bottoms that are light enough to show dirt. Maybe in another color, it's a great deal.

It is a very loose fitting top if you order it in your regular size.  I ordered it in a large which allows me to wear something else underneath it without me feeling uncomfortable.  It is a thin top.  The colors you see is what you get.  My coworker even loves this top.
like I said before they look so good with the matching necklace love it you do a great job  thank you
This is a very different kind of piece and looks great. It is not dark red, but more a dark orangish red. Has an antique look and looks very elegant, especially for what I paid, I am loving it.

as I said before about the earrings they look good together but you can wear just the necklace alone I love it thank you
Great top! Light color, light weight and yet not SO shear that the world can see your bra. The neck line is great ~ and it does not cling to the body. Perfect little summer top. LOVE IT!

I love these they are so soft and very warm. The perfect winter pajamas. I ordered a medium and they are a little big but I like them like this. The only thing that I regret is that I had originally ordered the red/pink leopard and apparently they'd ran out because I ended up getting the wrong color/style and so I had to order the white leopard print but I still love them and think they are super cute!
These are my second pair of these Wranglers. I wear these daily to work and they are very comfortable. I like the loose fitting feel to keep me comfortable during the long work day.

reviewerName: Dianne E. Socci-Tetro "Never Judge a Book by ...
reviewText: Although these are a good value,held up to the first washing  and fit better than expected,  they are of poor quality and made with very thin material.  This is no problem for me as I wanted them for the summer to wear with tunic tops and baby-doll dresses.However, what really got me angry and made this to be a less than perfect purchase, is the fact that I bought white and I got *white* (sort of) - but not white as we all know it to be.  It is more of a blue or extremely pale grey white  and doesn't go with anything that I own that has true white in it.  This makes it a very poor deal indeed since most of my summer wardrobe has true white in it.It's back to searching for 'true' white leggings for me.Oh and these *do* have seams - just a little FYI heads up.

summary: Very comfy interior linging, solid sole, short heel - UPDATED Oct 2011
reviewText: I bought these for working in the barn - cleaning horse stalls, sloshing big water buckets and the like. It's just too hot in the summer to wear traditional boots (at least for me). The Sloggers garden shoes are very comfortable around the house and they are indeed waterproof - that alone makes them a worthwhile purchase. They have a really cushy lining inside. I also like the tread on the bottom of the sole - solid enough to walk in mud and slippery ground without sliding around at all.The ONLY complaint I have and the reason I am leaving a four star rather than five star review is the heel & overall fit. I wear an 8 1/2 normally in sneakers and boots and 9 in high heels, so I ordered the size 9. I figured even if they were a tad wider than needed, socks would make up for the difference. They fit fine with regard to actual measurements. However, with every step the heel is very loose and feels like it's going to slide off my foot. They feel like those backless clogs instead of a solid fitting shoe. The height of the back of the shoe is lower than a traditional shoe and higher than a traditional clog. DROVE ME CRAZY for the first few days and now I've gotten used to it & it's fine. Just a warning though if you need the support of a regular back or heel, then these probably aren't for you.************************UPDATE Oct 2011*********************************************After wearing these Sloggers every single day since I bought them I am still very happy with them. They are indeed waterproof - I stepped in what turned out to be a deep puddle, immersing the shoes to the very top edge. No damage whatsoever inside or out. My foot was dry inside the shoe. I was concerned that every day use would stretch them at the ankle area or it would weaken etc - so far it's just like new. I will buy these Sloggers again in the future for sure!

I bought this shirt for what it is. A plain black shirt to go with many of my long skirts that have beautiful patterns on them. I wanted it to be plain in order to not take too much away from my skirts.Product was as described. I'm very happy with my purchase.

I bought this for a friend of mine as a Birthday Gift. She thought it was AWESOME!!! She loves skulls and were we live you would never find something like this so she was beyond excited!! I ordered a LARGE.. She has a huge chest so I wanted to make sure it fit. The shirt looks much bigger on the model than what it actually is.. It is still long and big it just is't that huge unless you are that little. My friend is probably about 5'4 -5'5 and is super curvy with a DD chest and booty to boot. This fits her awesome!! I also tried it on before I wrapped it just to see how it fit and I am 5'8 and wear a large normally in a shirt and 12 -14 pant and I have a long torso. This shirt fit great.. I am not as busty as my friend but I am curvy as well and the top covered my booty and didn't feel at all tight in the shoulders. It is light weight so that is nice and would go great with leggings! She told me everyone keeps asking her where she got it and she loves that no one else has one! Would for sure recommend!

I love this top. It may look simple, but I think this top is as fashionable asJess & Jane Tops for Women-3/4 Sleeve Poly/Span Ruffle Sublimation Tops"Paloma"(Style#74-281), which is saying a lot. Plus, this top fits just right, and you can never go wrong with that. All in all, I think this is a terrific shirt to have around.

Very nice colour, and the fabric is soft and comfortable. However, the neck line and button hole areas are made of a material that is way too stretchy, so it creates a poor look in those areas... as though its been stretched out by use and poor washing.

summary: Bouncy Comfort for Men, Women, and Kids of All Ages!
reviewText: Love 'em! Fun to take off the ol' Keens and get these puppies on my feet after a long, serious day. I can't wait to try the camo-version. You just can't go wrong with a pair of these CROCS to help support your tired feet when kinking around the garage or your den. Enjoy!
Its nice in black-runs LARGE! Love that though-tie the side up and the way I go-off the shoulder and sexy-nice top!

reviewerName: E. S. Noyes "liza lives to read"
reviewText: This 6-pack is a good value, and the socks are more substantial and comfortable than most inexpensive packs. They feel cushy and like they will last. I'll be back for more.

My husband had his last pair of Tamarac slippers for over 4 years and the exterior is still in good shape, unfortunately the interior is pretty much shot.  I ordered these as a replacement, purchasing the same size as his last pair (which were more a moccassin style).  The new pair look to be of the same great quality but were too uncomfortable.  My husband stated that where the elastic gusset was sewen (check out the photos-you can see an elastic gusset between the side and the tongue of the slipper) rubbed on his foot.Thanks to free return shipping, I'm going to send this pair back.  I just can't decide if I want to try these in the next bigger size (my husband liked the way they hugged his foot which would add warmth and prevent the dreaded slipper slap) or purchase another pair of the moccassin style.  So many slippers, so little time.

I think that these relaxed pants have a flattering fit and are casual enough for everyday wear but also more dressy than jeans. They are a midweight fabric and warm enough for winter wear for my long walks if I wear long underwear on colder days and my warm high boots. I live in the piedmont of NC, so the winter days are not usually below the 30's, but have occasionally dipped lower lately. I wear a 6 short, but am 5' 2" and still have to hem them a few inches, but this material is easy to hem on the sewing machine. Some more flimsy materials are hard to hem on a sewing machine, but this fabric is easy to sew on the sewing machine.

my shoe size is perfect 7. i thought 7/8 would work, considering it should fit size 8 as well, but... this is more like size 6.5, felt very snug plus it was too short in the back too. victoria's secret is doing a promo for free slippers for all pj purchase, so i'm getting those instead since i need some pjs as well. i think the sole is quite comfortable, however i think all the color options are ugly, so is the design. the clog part is the only good part. i'd think about purchasing it if they had leopard or zebra print, or tan color, something more flattering. also i dont like the fabric. but maybe i feel that way because of the odd color...

The belt feels heavy and durable and should last quite a while. That being said, I haven't had it that long, but so far it's holding up just fine. reviewText: Same problem, different type of stone wash! The main problem is hip and thigh room.
