Dunno
LOVE THEM!! They feel soft on my feet. I definitely recommend these toesocks and I will definitely order more. Peace.

This is a two-fer, which means it looks like you're wearing layers when they're all sewn together so you're only wearing one layer. The quality is as expected for the price, similar to Forever 21 or Charlotte Russe quality. The size is more like junior size, so I would order up if you want it to hang loose like shown on the model. I do love the longer sleeves and overall length. I feel like the neckline could have been a little lower, but it's as shown. It arrived weeks before the estimated arrival date.

This might look better on someone with longer hair, but for one with a pixie cut, it looks a little silly. The material is soft and stretchy, but looks a little like something like Jack Skellington (at least on me). Still cute, but I'm not wearing this to a job interview.

summary: Awesome look, run a little small.
reviewText: My teenage son wanted skinny jeans. I never really liked the super big hanging-down look, but was unsure how he would look in skinny jeans. I got him both the Levi's 510 and these 511, both in his "normal" size. (29W)When they arrived, he tried on the 510s first, and they looked great! Definitely form fitting, but not too skin tight. He is more or less average build, with maybe slightly thicker thighs, not an overly thin or heavy kid. When he tried on these 511s however, he couldn't button them. Close...but just too small. (I was going to return them but of course he ripped all the tags off and threw them on the floor for 3 days...so I didn't.) I took away one star just for the inconsistency of the sizes between very similar items (both Levi's, both "skinny"). It just makes it harder for customers when they are not trying them on in a store.I am here ordering the next size up, hopefully they will fit him. (I am watching this time so he doesn't rip all the tags off!) If you are unsure, please keep your tags and packaging so you can return easily. If you buy from amazon.com as the seller, they are currently listed eligible for free returns.I am not sure why there are two different pages listing these. There is this page:Levi's Men's 511 Skinny Jeanand there is also this page:Levi's Men's 511 Skinny Jean. They appear to have the same items, prices and reviews. Maybe it is just a mistake and amazon will merge the pages. However one page may list different sellers than the other, so if you are looking for a size/color combination on one page and it isn't available, it couldn't hurt to check the other one, just in case another seller might have it. :)
I was surprise at the quality of this purse because of the price. I normally send $100.00-$300.00 on purses. I using it right ow and I love it.

Just received and comfy out of the box.  I live in Ohio so I won't get to wear them for a while but very happy with th feel and fit.  I wear an 8 1/2 to 9 and followed Crocs suggestion of half size up.  The 9 is a perfect fit.  My feet are not narrow or wide and I have plenty of room but not too much.  Can't wait to wear them!
The pendant looks cheap. Maybe an ok product for kids to play with, but on a grownup it just looks sad

These are very similar to a pair I bought before (but couldn't find this time around).  They fit just a bit shorter than I expected.  Still wearable, but barely.  If you need a half size, I would suggest ordering up rather than down.  Otherwise, these are great.  Slip on easily, very comfortable.  Easy to clean.  Have worn these for day long walking tours and stayed comfy.

This is my 3rd pair of these inserts and I can't run without them since being fitted with these at my local running store.  What's interesting is that I had developed a plantar fascitis problem after wearing a new and different brand of shoes (w/o these inserts), and these inserts are the answer for me on that too!  I do recommend that you consult with your local running store before just trying these, they will help you determine which insert you need.  Happy running!

The pendant is very light weight and feels like plastic and not metal. From a distance you cannot tell. In fact, you cannot feel the plastic side of it unless you touch it. The flower is cute and doesn't look cheap as you may expect for the price. The chain is too long and I tie it behind my neck to make it short.

The shirt is nice but it also looks like a pajama top and it is too tight in the chest area to be size (1X). The material does not breathe as well as I thought it would too and in Florida the last thing you want is a shirt that makes you feel hot... instead of looking hot (meaning nice). On the positive side it has an inner facing on the front so you can't see thru the front due to this top being so shear, but you can definitely see thru the backside so I would wear a camisole underneath for modesty.
Nothing wrong with the glasses, they are definitely pointy!  But they are dark, which I like and is sometimes hard to find.  Seem pretty sturdy which is also a plus.
Bought two pairs for twin sons and they love it. I love it too because of the quality of the make.

I ordered this hoping it would look good and knowing it might not.  It arrived and as with other Allegra K products, the material was super soft and really comfy.  I don't know if it's my body type or that I'm too tall, but it just doesn't look that good on me and isn't long enough.  I'm holding on to it in hopes loosing weight will help.  It's worth trying to fit into.
This is a great top for yoga or just working out. I wear it all the time simply because it's so comfortable and flattering.  Great color, too!

summary: The Iconic 501 at a Superb Price You Just Can't Beat.
reviewText: Of course it's nice when things change for the better and just as sweet when the small close to perfect things in life remain unchanged by time. This is the case with these Levi's 501 jeans.For decades my favorite jeans of all time. Countless designers and brands have tried to tap into the 501's iconic popularity but at the end of the day have always failed to do so.These are exactly how I remember them:* Heavy Denim* Re-enforced flawless stitching on all pockets, hems, waist line and inner leg.* Solid brass rivets on pockets* The classic brass rivet button flyOrdered in white these arrived quickly, wrapped in plastic with tags of authenticity. The fit and feel is marvelous and the price is sensational. Macy's and other stores sell 501's for twice this amount. The slim fit isn't constrictive nor are they pre-washed so expect a few washings before they feel like a second skin.Highest Recommendation!

This is a great scarf. I never thought of myself as much of a scarf kind of girl, but I saw this and wanted to try it out. I like how it looks on me, especially when I'm wearing one of my peacoats. I may buy another in a different color.
It's perfect with leggings or jeggings.  Fits fairly long and is flattering, I really like it and would buy more colors next fall.
This set is super cute! I received the blue pair of earrings and was very happy with it. It is such a cheap price, and good quality jewelry for the cost. Don't hesitate to buy, you can't beat it!

My all time favorite sport bra, Champion Powerback, needed a break so I shopped all the bras, bought, tried and returned most of them. The Maia is a sort of ugly bra, it's thick and full in front and back, shoulder straps are wide. It's an underwire and compression bra and should feel snug. If you do any kind of bounce actions, like jumping jacks or running, this is a good choice. I have a full, heavier body type with a DD or E bra size. I look for clothes that actually work for me. Good compression, quick dry, comfortable. I don't wear work out clothes as regular day wear, I expect workout stuff to work in the gym or on the streets/trails during runs. This bra controls boob bounce very well. Be sure to stay very close to your regular bra size size, perhaps one size smaller for high impact but no more than an inch or two. The bra doesn't stretch which is a good thing.  Moving comfort is new to me this year, I now own the flow pant and capris and two of their bras. They make quality athletic clothing and trust me, I seriously hunted for less expensive stuff and received just that: less expensive stuff that didn't work. I will continue to select this bra and rotate between the Powerback and Calli. Jockey has come out with a new sport bra that is similar to the MC Calli.
and love it. Suggest buying big if ordering for US. Sizing is Asian and therefore trends towards smaller size. Order big and you will be happy
This is a kind of throw away dress, to be used for only a season or two.  I took mine on a vacation to a warm clime and wore it often . Very comfortable.

I really like these earrings! Yes,they are smaller than they look in the picture, but if you go on to the description they state the measurements there, so I knew what I was getting. They are pretty, they look classy, and they will go with anything - will recommend, and am going to get more in other colors myself!

summary: Made in the USA! Very Versatile and Stylish
reviewerName: Dianne E. Socci-Tetro "Never Judge a Book by ...
reviewText: I received this top for my b'day this year and I'm thrilled.  I  had it on my Amazon Wish List forever, it seems!The first thing---it is NOT crocheted, it is made out of lace and the lace is just beautiful.I am built  with a smallish bust, 38 C (If I wear a well padded bra),a well rounded abdomen and a smallish hips and butt.  Since I have a large abdomen, I am always worried about tops like these making me look pregnant.  This top is made of such a well draping material, that I will never have to worry about that.I have gotten more compliments on this top than anything else I have worn in the last few years.This top will looked wonderful with denim leggings and it will look great with jeans and dress slacks - even a skirt!The top it VERY see-thru, you really need to wear a cammie under it for the summer, (mine looked great with a camisole the same color as the lace itself )and in the winter you may want to use a turtle-neck of a complimentary color.You really need to wash this on the delicate cycle and line dry.  You CAN tumble dry this on low, but I am not going to take the chance.  It is delicate so I will need to be be careful about snags.  However, looks can be deceiving, and it *can* take more abuse than I give it credit for, I just want to have this top for a long time to come.
They are underwear. Nothing exciting to write about. They fit, they are comfortable, and they last. Nothing else to say.

When I bought these leggings in red, I thought there was 50/50 chance of me fitting in them, but I took the chance. I'm 5'7", 185 pounds, so I hoped they'd fit me, but I was apprehensive about it.Lo and behold...they fit!! They stretch a LOT and I also love the high-waist that keeps my abdomen flat.The color is great and they're not too shiny- just as i wanted!I'd totally recommend, even for girls like me who are around size 12.

I wasn't sure how this was going to fit. I've bought so much from allegra k and everything always fits different. Buy I like this dress. I'm  5'6 and thought it might be short but its a good length and not super tight.

The bag just arrived today and I already love it!  This bag is so adorable, very soft and plenty of room. Absolutely love the colors, texture and the size.  The price are great !  Would highly recommend it ! :)
I am 5'7", the length is very nice down to the foot or I could roll the top down and make the skirt shorter.  All of the colors are nice and look nice on me. Thanks

When it has came down to Casio, they've continued to know how to make great watches not just in price, but also in style and simple convience. That has shown constantly with their line of G-Shock Watches for nearly 30 years. That has came the case with this classic G-Shock Watch. It is definitely a great buy for nostalgia fans of the original Casio watches, but also brings out a nice contemporary look for all shapes and sizes. It is a delightful gift for anyone who wants a simple and fun watch, but also handles very well. I like how simple it is not just to setup, but the sleekness it brings out in its bold, black design. It is also a great buy for teenagers, because they love G-shocks. I absolutely recommend this as a great buy from Casio, not just in price but in the proof of the watch.Price: BConvience & setup: BOverall: B

I enjoy these leggings as much as enjoy the Lysse leggings for women-Ponte Knit Seam Detail Wide Leg Legging (Style#1410), which is a good thing. I find that these are not only easy to wear, but they do look great. You will not be disappointed with these leggings.
IT was a cheap watch so I can't comment on it.You get what you pay for.Stan ChunWellingtonNew Zealand

Levi's jeans remain a reliable and consistent staple. This Levi's Men's 505 Straight (regular) fit jean retains quality fabric and classic styling. The legs are not too narrow or too wide. The design is comfortable, classy, and no-nonsense. These jeans are versatile, and can be dressed up or down. We personally can not abide passing fashion trends, with guys wearing girlfriend-style jeans, or rolled-up cuffs. In contrast, Levi's jeans are cool and timeless, like the Rolling Stones and ZZ Top. They work for men whether urban or country. Enjoy!

I'm sorry, did you say this was cheap? Perhaps you meant inexpensive. I mean what were you expecting for less than 2 bucks delivered? It's actually pretty nice. The workmanship on the metal is intricate and well done, the stone is centered and shiny, and the clasp works. If you like the way it looks in the picture, get it, because that is what mine looks like. I mean, don't go thinking you can get away with giving this to your wife for Valentines or her B-day or anything but for a surprise gift it's worth the loose change that's probably in your sofa. Why are you still reading this review? Get it already!!!

These capri leggings give great support and are very comfortable.  I tore my hamstring and have been going to physical therapy and I think I can definately feel more support and also more shape enhancing with these capris than others I have tried i the past.  I ordered four more, that is how much I love them!

I got these in Rose Cream and they are slightly metallic, which isn't really evident from the photo. This is a beautiful shoe and very comfortable. The elastic back takes a bit to get used to and it seems that one of my feet is slightly longer than the other so I get a crease on my heel every time I wear these. If you've got longer feet and are sometimes between sizes you might consider ordering up. These do not cut into my toes as most flats do. Probably the best pair of ballet flats I've owned!
I hate trying on bras in stores.  I took a chance with this, and like the way it fits.  Very comfortable.  Adds a cup size if that it what you want.
Great price!  Size is accurate.  If you have a high arch, they might not be as comfortable as they are on my flat feet.  I could use a narrower boot, but still like these.

These boots are fantastic considering the price.  Yes it's weird that the heel is a light color and the boot is dark, but what can you expect for $30 boots.  DEFINITELY order a size up from your normal size or they will be too tight.  I am normally an 8 to 8 1/2.  I ordered a 9 and they fit perfect with thick socks.

I had to add a hole in this belt, I ordered my size which was tight.  It's a  good leather belt, however, and I really liked that it was well made and thick, not cheap or cheesy, but now I know if I want to order another to order the next size up.  Other than that, I think it's a great belt.

I have these in blue; they were given to me as a gift. I'm shocked at how much I love them!They fit the foot well and run true to size. The patterns are pretty and versatile, and they offer good support and traction. They also keep out moisture quite well, although in a true rainstorm, you'd almost certainly prefer the coverage of a boot.Probably what impresses me the most about these shoes, however, is how well they support my posture and my back. I had a broken tailbone that never healed properly, and as a consequence, when I stand still for any length of time, my tailbone and lower back throb and the muscles seize up. I didn't experience this at all in these shoes; in fact they allowed me to stand still in comfort for a much longer amount of time than any other shoes I have! I've tried Shape-Ups and MBTs that claim to offer back pain relief, and these simple shoes beat both of them.I'd definitely recommend Sloggers! They work well inside, too ... I don't do much gardening work, so I'm using mine as indoor/outdoor slippers.

summary: Long Bat Wing Sleeve Pullover Loose Scoop Neck Shirt
reviewText: I ordered one for myself and one for my sister. We both like them. The item fits true to size and the material seems to be of good quality, although I have not washed it yet. The shirt can be worn with leggings, jeans and casual dress pants. I am considering ordering another color.

summary: Great buy,.. but they sag alot.
reviewText: I got the thick winter fleece ones, and they are very warm and comfortable.  The quality of these leggings is amazing and you cannot beat the price.  They have a very high waistline, they pull up all the way over my stomach, which I like because it sucks everything in.  Some others do not like the high waistline.  However, I am CONSTANTLY pulling them up.  They sag at the crotch every time I get up.  So that kind of sucks having to hike them up in front of people all the time.  Other than that, I love them.

I got a large - and this is not a dress...it's a top (the model must be like 4'7").  But, I really like it.  It looks great with a camisole underneath and it's very comfortable too.  For some reason, mine had absolutely no tags in it (no washing instructions, what it's made of, nada).  So, I washed it in cold on gentle and hung it dry - came out fine!

These arrived in beautiful condition and i love that they came with a bag to put them in. The reason i have it 4 stars instead of five is because i read AFTER i ordered these shoes that they were fakes. I compared them and they look identical to the TOMS website.  These are great,  don't get me wrong, but it's only a few $ more or less to get them off the original site. At least you'll know for sure and free shipping.

I ordered a size 7/28 on this pair of jeans but I was very surprised that bottom area got so baggy after wearing it.  I even dried it in high heat on a full cycle and yielded same result. A smaller size (5/27) would have fit better. It has definitely something to do with the stretchy fabric Levi's used to make this pair of jeans. The material is stretchy and slighty thicker too.  Not my most favorite pair of Levi's jeans but I'm not giving up on the brand.
Very, very comfortable and will never buy another brand ever! True to size & fit but I wish they would come up with more feminine sandals in the future.
I am so tired of black workout pants.  Who cares if the waist is colorful?  No one sees it if you wear a tee shirt over it.  Unusual waist, but comfortable.  Don't like that it is so long.

I did not expect to like this item very much - I just don't really like body-shapers, I find them very hot and uncomfortable, and I do not like underwires in bras at all. But I needed an all in one shaper in a light weight  and in a skin tone for under a dress. The rosewood color is really a light nude. I chose this one, with a built in bra since it  came in the 36DD I need, where most just have a one size fits all top that smashes my top into a huge uni-boob. I am average size, but large busted and have a few recently acquired mid-section rolls. I hoped to smooth out the rolls, even that unsightly though small one just under my breast line that looks like I am growing a second set, it is hard to find a bra that comes down low enough to cover that one, or underwear/hosiery high enough to meet a bra to cover it up. I also hope to maybe minimize the "girls" a bit in the process. Also, I did not want any padding in the bra portion, as my dress has a touch of padding there for modesty, and I already have enough padding naturally! This briefer met ALL of my requirements perfectly and made me look two sizes smaller! I chose this lace briefer due to it being lightweight and breathable for the upcoming summer.  I was very pleasantly surprised with this great piece and good price! The stretch lace feels light and airy, and is soft, not itchy. The bra portion has adjustable straps of good sizes that did not dig into the shoulders, and I could not even feel the underwires at all - although they were obviously working since I was well supported and perky. The stretch lace of the bra portion also smoothed, separated, and did not smash my breasts though did seem to minimize a bit. Also, the briefer shaped me smoothly without digging in or strangling any part of my body - and the one piece construction did not allow for any bulges to pop out anywhere keeping all "rolls" in check for the hour I tried it on under my dress and also tried it on under other wardrobe items.  I now understand why the ladies of the mid-century in old photos always looked "smooth", even matronly women did not have bulges and rolls showing. It is because they used to wear girdles with attached bras - all in one piece. The idea is back, with more comfortable options like this one. I think I could get used to this being a regular addition to my wardrobe! I look smaller wearing this underneath everything!  Hopefully the briefer will retain it's shape, as well as mine, and I will be back in June to give an updated review!Update after one month: I have started wearing this as a day to day item under clothes to work and am very happy with it, in fact I ordered more so I have a supply for regular wear. It holds up well all day and the underwires in the bra portion are very comfortable!
This T-Shirt is well made and it looks good. The price was very nice at the time of purchase. Definitely 4 Stars!

These are the most comfy leisure/slippers on the market.  I wear them all the time at home and wash them when needed.  I only wish there was more choice in colors, as I bought 2 pairs of beige from another merchant.
These are too large for me! I'm 5'7'' and 120 lbs, these leggings keep sleeping off me.They look baggy on me in most places.

summary: They look a lot cuter in the photo.
reviewText: They definitely are the typical cat-eye look. Others I have seen don't go up as high to a point on each side, which is more of a modern cat-eye look.  These are more vintage inspired, and I think that gives you a bit of an "alien eye" effect.  I have many sunglasses, and I would say these are right in the middle, size-wise.  They are not nearly as over-the-top big as the popular over-sized glasses you see everywhere, but they aren't small either. I do have a small face, so if you like super big glasses, this probably won't do. They do require a large glasses case, because the points go up so high.  Like most reasonably-priced Amazon sunglasses, they don't come with a case, only the soft sleeve.  While this prevents scratches, it won't protect them from being smashed in your purse.

summary: Not what I expected....less is sometimes less...
reviewText: After reading the description and the glowing reviews I really expected something special for the price. What I got was a foam pad with a thin plastic cage for the heal "cup". Literally the heal cup is actually strips of plastic forming a cage with air gaps.  The heal cage is not pictured in the Ad but represents the only "technology" in these inserts. For me the cage heal  dug into the sides of my foot and actually aggravated the my plantar faciitus.I returned the product without a hitch and received a full refund. For the price I expected a fairly sophisticated layering of materials building up a stable platform, moulded heal cup --what you get is surprisingly less. Of course with foot pain the best advice is try it --it may work for you. It doesn't take much to make a difference. You can always return it.
Very nice and well made shirts! I bought several for my husband and he loves them! They wash nice and don't fade fast!

As expected, Levi's quality is outstanding. I feel really good in these jeans and feel I can go anywhere in them. Look great with a t-shirt, sweater or button shirt. Put a nice leather belt around them and nice pair of shoes/boots and you're good to go.Excellent.

I love the beige color. I love the style how it goes the neck (perfect for church) And I like the little lace design on the front. Since I have a larger chest (DD cup) I feel that the shirt is a lot shorter on me than it shows on the model. I have to wear a skirt that comes up high and I tuck it into my skirt. I wouldn't wear it any other way. I like this shirt regardless of it being a little short. It has a quality material also. I've worn it a lot and hasn't started ripping yet lol.

Usually with Allegra K I'm never sure what to expect from the sizing, but I ordered a large (which is my standard size) and this fits perfect.  I'm about 5'10 so this is definitely a little short on me, but it does cover my bum...sort of.  I love the material and am very happy with the purchase.
cheap....affordable...nice...did i ay cheap??anyway xpect to wear these a few times b4 they art trashhave not yet broken, but..ya know...
I have these shoes in both available colors and I love, love, love them. They're true to size, pretty comfortable considering, and the price was right.

When I received these and tried them on I was pleasantly surprised by the feeling that I was walking on clouds.  I have a gimpy lower back, stand more than I sit and need support and cushioning in my shoes. This product certainly delivers. The straps provide stability. I wasn't sure from other reviews if the straps would bug me but tightening the over the foot straps and slightly loosening the ankle straps works well for me.I have another pair of Teva sandals that are leather and more petite looking but needed these for getting my feet wet in the rain or in the garden.No cons so far.

Soft. Silky. Moisture wicking. UPF 50. Of these statements I only expect one from my running shirts, (that would be the moisture wicking). But, now I expect them all because this shirt has changed my running routine forever. It's got the UPF that I need, and the amazing fabric texture. It's not as thin and satiny as traditional tech ts, (thankfully, because I don't like how they ride and slide when I run), and aren't heavy and sticky as a traditional cotton T, (which I prefer because there is minimal shifting.) This bamboo performance T has bridged the divide giving me exactly what I have always wanted in my workout t.The price is really good, not as cheap as say Target, but less than a standard Nike, and is worth every penny!!!!

summary: not for those with narrow heels
reviewText: I really liked this pump.  It wasn't over the top for a trendy woman over 40 but just didn't fit my annoying feet properly.  Finding pumps for my narrower than average feet is very difficult.  Unfortunately, these slipped right off my heel when walking and since I have made this mistake before and the heel pads are always an epic fail for me, back they went.

I was looking for a large bag and my budget was a mere 20 dollars. After going to several sites I still couldnt find the right bag with my specifications. It was like " you want a large 20 dollar bag??? forget it!". Soon I was searching Amazon and just stumbled on this bag by accident. Ordered it and have it now and LOVE IT. It looks like quality leather, and has cute lining. Its a satchel more than a cross body and it DOESNT have the extra strap to make it longer. The strap drop is 7" but I can still squeeze it onto my shoulder. I dont know about the other colors but the light blue is heavenly!! The other colors look awesome as well. I noticed the brown goes for $10.39. Anyway, I got the bag and to my surprise it fit EVERYTHING from my huge tote. The lining was a nice light yellowish liningwhich is cool. Ladies, I cant say enough about this bag! Im ordering more colors!

summary: lifts and separates super nice and comfy
reviewerName: KonaGal "When I do good, I feel good.  When I...
reviewText: Yeah, I've finally found a comfortable bra that is not restrictive, doesn't cut into the skin and feels nice enough to sleep in for ever.  perfect bra for low impact activity.  I ordered a size XL, normally wear loose clothing size large (14)

summary: steampunk nautical style antiqued bronze octopus necklace
reviewText: i bought this for my fiance's sister for Christmas. She is currently living in Japan as a marine. She's been eating a lot of squid and octopus while over there and I thought it would be cute and funny to get her this octopus to remind her about her years spent in Japan and her wacky memories shes made. she ended up loving it and thinking it was really cute! I was glad. it took about 2 weeks to get to me! great purchase

This is made with soft jersey type of material, the straps are a little wider than other bras.  The fit is spot on.  The greatest part is that I don't have to go to the store.  Very comfortable and without underwires it stays put when active.  Being a 36D on a very thin frame, I am comfortable all day long, no pulling or tugging needed.  I bought both colors.  I hope they expand to more colors.
These r totally ugly, i feel like grandma in these but they are crazy comfy and I love them. Just wish they came in cuter designs!

It can be a very sexy piece for the ear the only thing I do not like is that it seemed to be hard to stay up on the ears/ easy to slip off and I would like to think I have normal human ears! Also it is easy to break if u try to adjust it to custom your ear

I like the Wigman Men's At Work 3-Pack Socks, Black, Large. You can tell right away they are made with durability in mind. Like many reviewers before me, I think these socks are above average, perhaps the price a little high, but in the end you get what you pay for with very rare exceptions, and these socks look and feel like they will not disappoint with the passage of time. 4 Stars.

Very comfy shoe right out of the box which is a must.  Length was true to size.  As with nearly all Clarks products, I had to purchase a narrow from a different vendor even though my feet aren't officially a narrow width when measured professionally.  Quality leather, stitching and construction.

I got one pair with scratches but amazon quickly sent me a replacement and didnt make me wait on getting the damaged pair back.I have 13 pair of Steve Madden and Madden Girl shoes and I find them to be the most consistent fit of any others I get and I have a collection (apx 150+ pair).  I am a true size 7 with slightly narrow feet (narrow width is too small but med is fine in most shoes except flats which run wide all the time).I got these heels in 5 colors and they are fabulous.The fit is perfect. The colors and look are exactly as pictured. The quality is really great. They look nice and classy and still fun and trendy. They are very very comfortable for a heel. Heel isnt super tall but for me being very over-weight, they are still comfy when other heels arent. Love the squared toe box (more room than the pointy). It does show a tiny bit of toe cleavage but not much.Highly recommend these!  They go with everything - dressy or casual!!

I bought these shirts for me (a woman) to wear to the gym.  I like my work out clothes to be made of cotton and loose fitting and these shirts fill the bill.  I have washed them several times in hot water and dried them in the dryer and they have maintained their size and shape even tho they are cotton.  The price was right, also.
It ran a little large. It was not worth the hassle it would take to return it tho so its still sitting in my closet months later with the tags still on it.

summary: They're all different! Inconsistent quality and length
reviewText: I ordered two pairs of these shorts for my husband, in Black and Navy.The inseam on the Navy shorts is more than an inch shorter than the Black shorts.The Black shorts are made from a completely different fabric. It's a thick and uncomfortable fabric, almost like canvas.Both pairs of shorts have the same label, but they are very different from each other. I don't understand how the quality control can be this inconsistent--buyers beware.We decided to return the Black shorts, and keep the Navy ones because at least the Navy had a decent fabric.
I wanted a slipper that wasn't too bulky and this fit the bill. It's comfortable to wear around the house and has a nice cushioned foot bed.  I am pleased.

Finally, a brief that covers my toosh and doesn't ride up. These briefs come all the way up to the navel so can't wear with low-rise pants. I like the neutral colors and that they are breathable cotton.

summary: BEWARE OF TUSK COLOR!!! But other than tusk color, fleece is 5 star
reviewText: First of the low stars are for the color tusk, and not the actual fleece. The fleece is a 5 star and I will comment on that later.BAD REVIEW ON TUSK: I previously ordered the Charcoal Heather Columbia fleece and LOVED IT, so I decided to order the tusk fleece, considering the picture on Amazon showed it was WHITE. I received the fleece in one business day which was a nice benefit of prime. I was very excited to have a white one, but was I disappointed when I opened up the box. The tusk color, is more like an elephant grey mixed with khaki (or an elephant that rulled in mud and it dried) color, which does make sense of why they would call it Tusk. I then looked on Columbia's website, and their tusk really is greyish/tan and not white. I have no idea why they would put a white picture up when it really isn't. It isn't a bad color, just not what I wanted. If you want to know what the tusk color looks like google it first, or look at the amazon picture of the tusk/grill fleece.GOOD REVIEW ON COLUMBIA FLEECE: The previous Charcoal Heather fleece and the Black fleece I ordered are both absolutely amazing. The fleeces are soft, comfy and true to size. Definitely very happy with it, and will be ordering probably different colors. Wish they did have it in white. But other than the wrong picture labeling, I am very pleased with the fleece itself and the other colors.
love bearpaw boots.. great price, great quality, comfy and super cute. If youre a half size, id recommend going a half size up.

summary: Allegra K Womens Dots Print Elastic Waist Mini Dress Black Beige L w Brown
reviewText: I wont be wearing this until Spring and summer there were mixed reviews about this dress however I ordered it anyway.I couldn't believe how nice this was looks great in picture and even better in person I didn't find any flaws the craftsman ship seemed good no lose stitching .I ordered a large to be on the safe side and glad I did fits great don't think a medium would have fit.the belt is nice its stretchy the only thing is I will wear a black short slip under it it is a little see through. The price was very reasonable and shipping was super fast.

Not a bad shirt for the price. I am a small/medium and ended up giving this shirt to a person that is an extra small. The pockets stuck out a bit for me and made me feel "bulky". Fine for the very skinny/straight person.Cute on her!

These leggings are the definition of fitting. They fit as well asLysse leggings for women - Basic Caprias they fit in all the right places. I am also quite impressed in how durable these leggings are. I like using these for exercise and they manage to stay in tact. I think you can use these leggings for a number of things, but one thing is clear: they are very fitting.
I really love these jeans. I am a somewhat new mom and these jeans help slim my stomach and they make the legs appear longer. I love them and I will order more in different colors.

This is a top that screams fashion. It not only looks great, but it feels just right for a top. Like theJess & Jane Tops for Women-3/4 Sleeve Poly/Span Ruffle Sublimation Tops"Paloma"(Style#74-281), this top proves that being one of kind is always a great look.

I love the cut of this shirt. I am a much bustier woman than the model shown here, but the shirt hangs pretty much the same way on me. The fabric is soft, and the pebble brown color is really pretty. The only limitation of the shirt, in my view, is that the fabric is rather thin, which in t-shirts usually means they wear out quickly. However, that remains to be seen. I noticed other reviews had posted complaints about this vendor, but i received my order within the 48-hour window promised by Amazon Prime. So i am grateful for that.

summary: stylish and classy without paying too much
reviewText: Kenneth Cole makes a wonderful "Reaction Men's Waldorf 1 3/8" Reversible Leather Belt;" and once you buy this and wear it you'll be amazed that you ever did without it! The leather belt is very well made; you can tell just by the feel of it. It has an attractive buckle that nevertheless doesn't detract from what you're wearing. Great!The belt has several different holes so that you can adjust it if you gain or lose a few pounds; this is very good and of course it's a standard feature on most belts for both men. However, this belt has one huge advantage--it's reversible! You can just easily turn it around at the base of the buckle and switch from a black belt to a brown belt or vice versa. That's excellent and it makes this belt a good value for your money.Taking care of the belt is easy. I recommend hanging it by its buckle on top of a suit hanger or any hanger that has clothing on it that is long enough not to reach the floor. If it hangs high enough so as not to reach the floor, the belt will stay relatively "straight" without any slight bending which the leather may do over time if you just leave the end of it curled up on the floor on a hanger that hangs just too low.In addition, this is a leather belt; if you want to clean or make the leather look its best in any way just carefully follow the directions on the label of any leather cleaner. I would, however, apply a bit of the substance to a part of the belt that's not going to be noticeable just in case the cleanser or buffer backfires and makes a small stain that you don't want people to see.If you do choose to buy the belt through this website, you may want to use the charts above to help you pick your size.Overall, Kenneth Cole gets two thumbs up from me for this excellent belt! It will last you a good long time with the proper care and worth every penny you'll pay for it.
These leggins went pilly after the first wash. However, they are warm and I use them under my jeans in the winter. Even though they not look good, they keep me warm, so I'm relatively happy.

These sandals fit perfectly. The buckle can be adjusted for the 'thickness' of the feet as required. I found that it takes some times for the sandals to get used to the feet. Used with socks initially to prevent blisters from happening. Good compact and recommend!
But again, runs small. I wanted it bulky and ordered 2 sizes up. It fits but not exactly how I intended it to fit. The see though parts on the sleeves are very nice.
These are awesome one of the best pair I bought easy to put on very soft fit perfectly and easy to take off as well.i really love these.
I bought this handbag for the color.  It's very stylish and compliments my outfit.  It's very roomy inside -- holds everything you need

summary: Fits well hook and eye fails
reviewText: This is relatively cute for the price.  The only problem is that as you're doing one hook, the other hooks come undone.  It ends up almost impossible to hook it all of the ya up the front.  It also kind of flattens the boobs rather than lifting and accentuating,  it is cute, at best.
very comfortable (yet not loose), does very good at minimizing at wicking sweat, looks durable for sure too, i'm very satisfied

The way this sweater just hangs. There's no form or fashion to it. Not even like the picture. It's so thin that the sleeves won't stay up. You can't really hike the bottom up like the model has it because it won't stay. The only nice  thing is that it's long. But too long for a person of 5' 2". It looked more ridiculous than stylish. So again, I ordered like three of these hoping it was a hit. And I'd have a couple to switch off with incase they didn't sell later on.

Like someone else said - this is a 5-star watch at a 1-star price. I'm very pleased with it. Everything I need and nothing I don't need. Hey, it even has instructions that are understandable!!On a side note - after many years, we still can't figure out my wife's digital watch - incomprehensible instructions. That's what I wanted to avoid with this purchase. I also wanted to avoid the larger G-shock models - they have a lot that are too bulbous for my wrist. This design is one of the smaller ones - I wouldn't purchase anything bigger.Alarms? I only need one. Readability - I need good contrast so it's easy to read. And, Indestructible! For $40? I love this watch and highly recommend.
They fit nicely and no breakin blisters. I have the same ones in red and am thinking purple next. Good buy!

summary: Very Pretty! Fabric Does NOT Hold Up
reviewText: The size fit nicely and I'm a chesty girl so that is saying alot. I love the colors and it is very comfortable and light/breezy feeling. I got a few compliments, not sure if it was because of the color choices on the shirt or the style but it's always nice to get compliments no matter what! Great purchase.REVISED: After 2 washes (do NOT machine dry because this fabric shrinks alot!) and I did a hang drying after both, the shirt still has shrunk up! So much so that it is tight under the arms and now real short in the front and tight across the chest. It no longer fits nicely, so if you wear a small, medium or large the shrinking might be ok. But if you're like me, who wears XL tops, these "Sakkas" one size fits all tops are not a good beat. The fabric maintains its color (so far) but the stitching will not last, the hem is already falling apart. Pretty shirt but won't last.

The metal on this is very thin and I am not sure how long it will stay together. I purchased this as part of a collection of jewelry I made up for my grand daughter to use with her "dress up" clothes. She loves putting on her princess dresses and having tea....and loves to wear jewelry.....I probably would not purchase this for a adult to wear....But for my use, it was great.....
Very nice and comfy. Sizing is perfect. Reefs are by far my favorite flip flops because they are the best quality!
Very pretty! Loved the vintage, bronze look to it. It was a little bigger than I thought, but not to big! I've worn it sweaters and tanks and it looks great with both!

From the photo I had no idea that the Owl was going to be that long and large and the chain was going to be a long chain.I prefer smaller chains.  The earrings are long and stylish.  I love them.  Maybe if I change the chain to make it a bit shorter it may look different.  Still I like it.
Great Uggs!!!! I wear them with everything, they are the best and most comfortable boots you will ever put on your feet!!!!! I am a size 6 and the 6 works perfect...
This watch is so cute! I really love wearing it! I was a little apprehensive since it was so cheap but I lucked out! It's a great watch!

Jeans ARE really cute but come on Levis?  When did your sizing become so ridiculously off?  I ordered an 11 as I can wear some 9s and many 10s, but an 11 to play it safe.  These pants would not even pull up past my calves!  I have strong, muscular calves but still!  I have other slim jeans/leggings that fit fine.So I say this in all honesty, Levis really does change their sizes quite dramatically between juniors/misses and it also depends on country of manufacturer.  I now know which 2 Levis fit the best and I will be sticking with them.  Unfortunately these are going back.  Summing it up: Sizing runs quite, quite small!

I like the quality of the dress; the detailed beading is so intricate it had to be done by hand, there is no way a machine could do this kind of work. there are ties at the back to cinch the waist and the straps adjust if you need to shorten or lengthen. The color of the green is not too bright nor too dull, the color is just the right shade. The dress is made in India and since it is cotton/rayon hand wash in cold water with wool light, hang dry. The weaving irregularities and the shade variations are the characteristic of the fabric and in no way to be taken as defects.  I got L/XL and fits perfect (12/14).I Highly recommend this seller 10%! THNX! :)P.S. I am eyeing the steel blue.
I like a relaxed but not loose fit and these fit the bill perfectly.  Very well made as is expected of a Levi's product.

so far i'm really enjoying my new tevas!  The fit is good ( 7 )the lenght and straps hold the feet and the bottom has a good walking comfort.  I wanted to try different styles of Teva and this black is very comfortable and fits the need for a shoe i can travel with.
This came a week early and I also order some owl earring's that match this necklace off of amazon. It's really cute on!
So comfy and loose enough through middle and hips (although FLOWY isn't the word I'd use to describe it) to be extra-nice. Very soft, and the red is pretty, too!
loves them. With swelling feet and back aches from teaching all day while being PREGGERS, she says they are GREAT support and allow for her feet enlarging by the end of the day!

Fair price, good on delivery time & arrived exactly as seller described. Works on about everything, from boot repair & tarp mishaps, to tears in jackets & knee enforcement on bibs. Whatever used on will this goo will stay put, dry pretty quick & works! I use the goo to keep the material over the knees on my bib from waring, also keeps the damp out., I get this goo 2" from the bottom on each pant leg- crossing little streams & through unavoidable puddles- pants stay dry. Have a tube in my camping, vehicle & b.o. bag's- I completely recommended with all confidence you to will end up giving this a 5 Star rating.

Sketchers are the most comfortable shoes I have purchased in decades.  This is my third pair this year.  However, they do run large in the width.  Length is normal.  I add odor-consuming insoles to help take up some of the slack.  I wear this pair with pants when I go out to dinner or other social events.  The uppers look enough like suede to make it work.  After an evening out, my feet don't hurt and no one knows why.
A pretty, stylish dress. I like it. It looks great on and wears well. Fits to size. Comfortable and silky; a plus.

these shoes are awesome.  they're comfortable, true to size, and very low maintenance.  I read a few negative reviews stating how ugly and horrible these shoes are...I don't see it.  ive had tons of compliments and for the price im not complaining.  there were no sore spots left by these shoes either and ive been in them all day.

This skirt is absolutely wonderful.  I was a little concerned about ordering a petite size but the length was exactly what I wanted.  After reading the other reviews and thinking about the purchase for over a week I finally decided to order it.  I am so glad I did, one of the reviews mentioned the stretch in the fabric and it gave the little bit I needed and fit perfectly.  I love the way it hugs my curves and the knee length is perfect for me.  I bought this in black; it is perfect for work or a night out.As an Amazon Prime member I received free two day shipping on my order and I was so happy when my package arrived the next day in perfect shape.  Free overnight shipping a great skirt, what more can a girl ask for.I ordered a second one of these skirts in purple and am just as excited about it as I was the black one.  The perfect fit, the look, and the feel are all fantastic.  Then there is the service I orcdered my second skirt at noon and received it at 9:30 AM the next day.  Less than 24 hours, pretty good for two day shipping.  I will be orderering more pieces from this seller.I was so happy to see that Sakkas expanded the colors offered with this skirt.  I have now added this skirt in white and blue to my wardrobe.  I have been very happy with all my selections and Sakkas has been a wonderful vendor to work with.

summary: soffe juniors fleece roll up sweat pants
reviewText: They fit well and are very comfortable ordered a pair in white too. I would recommend these sweatpants they are also well made.
I love the color, but not the fit.  It's designed for a very slender person.  It's too tight through the bust and waist and believe me I'm not that big.

The only thing bad about them is that after about 6-9 months and several washings, they tend to fade and you need to get a new pair.  I have to rotate several pairs and buy a new pair about every 6 months.  The quality is very good as far as construction.  If they could work on getting the color to last longer, they'd be awesome pants.

summary: Best bra I've ever owned, but def the itchiest.
reviewText: 2/12/13After reading all of these 'amaaaazing' reviews, I was sure this was going to be the bra for me.  I'm a 38D, and I have an issue with most bras, usually with my boobs falling out of the cup, but mostly with "uni-boobage".  Every bra I wear makes my boobs gravitate toward each other after just a few minutes.  Not cool.  I constantly find myself with my hands in my shirt adjusting myself.  Plus, I HATE underwire.  So I thought I would give this bra a try based on all the awesome reviews.Upon receiving, I couldn't wait to try it on.  But after not even 10 minutes of wearing it, I can't wait to rip it off.  It is on me as we speak.  It is the ITCHIEST bra I have EVER worn.  I don't know why either.  I have never worn a bra that made me itch SO much.  It itches EVERYWHERE... in the cups, in the front, but mostly in the back.  I also feel the material in the sides of the back of the bra stabbing me.  I'm not allergic to ANY fabric either, so that isn't it.  This really sucks, because it's doing a great job of keeping my boobs separated, like all bras SHOULD do, but don't.  The straps are NOT uncomfortable at all (for me anyway) like some of the other reviewers stated.  But damn, it is ITCHYYYYY!!  Also, you can see your nips through your t-shirt if the wind picks up, lol.  Very thin cup lining.I don't know yet if I will return it or get used to the itching because it does exactly what I have been searching for for YEARS, which is keep my boobs where they are supposed to be.  I can do backflips and cartwheels and they stay in the cups.  I just wish it was made of cotton or something softer to the skin.2/13/13******** Update!  The bra is NOT AS itchy after the 2nd day of wearing it.  I don't know if I got used to the itch or what.  It's still itchy, but not AS BAD as day 1.  Gives me great support and my chest fills the cups perfectly.2/14/13******** Update!  The bra doesn't itch me at all today, after the 3rd day.  So weird, I just can't understand it.  I just ordered 2 more because it's the most cmfortable and most supportive non-underwire bra I have ever owned.
I was hoping it would be cutter than the photo, but ended up being disappointed.  It is ok, just not as pretty as I was hoping.

I love the shirt but it smells like gasoline - not sure how im going to get that smell out and if I could wash it with other clothing - (probably not).  Colors are nice- size true to fit - fast delivery - highly recommended for delivery - price very fair -

This bra digs into the skin horribly! I like the fact that it buttons in the front, but that's about it. How could something that's supposed to be so soft and comfortable be sooooo uncomfortable???? I bought it to sleep in, but it dug in my skin so bad I had to take if off....

summary: The coolest sunglasses available right now
reviewText: I bought these for Christmas presents for a 24 year old guy, 16 year old guy and a 24 year old girl. They all had a screaming fit over them. It was their favorite gift. I got the girl red and the guys black. The girls are a little big even though I bought a smaller size than the guys, so you may want to research that problem. She wont let me send them back because she doesnt want to part with them. They look so cool and old school cool. I got them at least 40 dollars cheaper by getting them through Amazon and I even seen them 80 more dollars on some sites, so they are a bargain. They are packaged perfectly with cleaning rag and tags tucked in an awesome case. The guys case was black and the girls brown. Awesome gift for any age and you will be a hero for giving them.

I am on my feet all day and these shoes are great! They felt a little too roomy at first, but my feet swell up by the end of the day so they are just what I need. I like the toe because my toes are not scrunched up and hurting. I also have these in tan. I am a big fan of Clark shoes, and this was a great purchase.
This took a long time to arruve from China. However, for the price, it is worth it. Very pretty antiqued look.

I wore it today to work and love it. It is a wrinkle free material and of a great quality. It also doesn't require a camisole under it. It's airy and so soft as well. A perfect combination. The size is wonderful (extremely comfortable, yet flattering). What a deal on the price as well! One of my favorite purchases!
These are the ones I have been searching for. Roomy in the right places. Not tight that I can feel while sitting or standing. Price is the best I have seen anywhere. And this time got them quicker.

This is a VERY pretty dress,and a great value with fast delivery (good to know if you need it in a rush!).  What I like: the way it hangs (drapes), the flattering cut, the pretty details, gorgeous colors. I'd recommend it for curvy women because its a very flattering cut that will take pounds off your lower half.  You can even wear it if you are large busted (maybe not 40+ but certainly up to that) and the bust portion is thick enough material, plus laces that can be pulled in tightly,  to get away with out a bra (just tuck in very thin pads perhaps for shape and discretion), also would be ideal for small busted women too.  I actually ended up ordering two additional colors- I liked it that much!  One note of caution: its LONG, to low calf length, so may not be suited to someone very short (under 5'2")- but for everyone else, will provide a flattering long look.  Other: Can be dressed up ALOT  (just add some bling!) or dressed down for casual wearing with sandals.  A versatile & extremely comfortable dress (elastic gathering in the back) at an incredible price!

Normally I don't discuss underwear but these are the exception. They are totally comfortable--especially @ the waist--no tags really smooth things out! Colors are pleasing to the eyes--don't know where I'd wear the RED boxers and not sure if they are colorfast. Washed w/dark colors just to be safe! Fit is perfect--and the knit is very smooth to the skin. Price is decent also for the product. Good Deal!
I realize that it was inexpensive, but it is a major POS. It looks nothing like the picture.  It is guady, not cute.

Got this for my wife along with a couple of other C.Z. pieces so we could keep her actual jewelry locked up in the safe.  Honestly, you'd never know the difference...  and she absolutely loves the channel set stones.
My niece collect all things owl. She was so happy to get this. It's really pretty and made well. I'm not real big on writing reviews, but this is worth telling you about

Cool and comfortable throw over blouse.  Fits very well and matches picture,  the chiffon is a tiny bit rough but nothing a little fabric softener won't fix.size up if you want the sme loose fit as model though.

I got the winter fleece version of these leggings, and they're insanely comfortable.  Here's the run down.Pros:Not too long, but they have enough stretch to accommodate someone taller than my 5'3".Did not smell like burning plastic and horror.  Lots of leggings smell like burning plastic and horror, which is - I don't know - awful.  These do have a strong smell at first, but it goes away after you air them out for a few hours.Beyond comfortable.  Words don't exist for how comfortable these things are.Warm.  Not so warm than you'd want to go out in freezing weather without pants or something over them, but for places where it's only chilly - these definitely do the job.Cons:Not as resistant to pilling as I'd hoped.  I've only had them for a few days and already they're getting that "picked" look - like I spend lots of time sitting on sidewalks or sandpaper.  *In fairness* they're way better than other leggings I've had, and  I should also say that I wear these things all the time.  Seriously, just all the time.  They're too comfortable and warm to really consider wearing anything else - which is a lot of stress to put on a pair of leggings.  I don't care about that though, because frankly I feel like if you're going to make a pair of leggings so comfortable that I need to wear them every day, you should make them strong enough to withstand the damage.  At the very least, even being as affordable as they are they should come with a "buy one, get six free" deal.(I'll probably be getting about nine more pairs.)

After buying boots on Amazon, I realized I would pants that go with them.  I'm sure 501s would work for a baggier look, but the 527s are perfect if you need a skinny jean/boot jean look.  The selection of colors could be better (the Fume isn't quite black, but close enough), but if your wardrobe needs are ultra-specific then these are a great buy.

summary: Dickies Womens Relaxed Straight Stretch Twill Pant, Desert Sand/Khaki
reviewText: I love these pants, I got two of the Capri's over the summer and loved them also. I need to get a few more in different colors then I'll be set. :)

These socks by Hanes keep your feet warm; and they are very well made and last forever. I myself have worn these for years, especially at night in wintertime when it's cold and I want to sleep with socks on my feet. These athletic crew socks can be worn for athletic activities but of course they could be worn for everyday routine use as well. As another reviewer notes, these socks are rather soft to the touch, too! Moreover, with the sale going on as I write this, the price is right, too.These crew length socks have a reinforced heel and toe; this makes them last longer and they still feel very comfortable on my feet. The very well done double elastic ribbing works well to keep these socks up while at the same time not being too tight on your lower leg. The sock itself comes in white; but the toe area and the heel area are literally made from grey colored fibers to give the sock a better "look."I would not dry these socks at high temperatures. This could result in the sock becoming too loose on your foot. Eventually they could "bunch up" when you wear them and that's very uncomfortable. Dry these socks at a lower temperature. Then they will remain just as comfortable as ever. I know mine do!Overall, you can't go wrong buying these socks. They keep your feet extra warm during colder weather. They are manufactured so well that you definitely get more than your money's worth. A good deal!SMILE

The colour is really nice...the fit is perfect...but I'm not crazy about it...I will shorten to waist length and wear happily.  But it is a really good casual top...and would work out creator someone a little taller in my opinion...I'm 5'4"...better suited to 5'7" or so....at this length it makes me look shorter...But the quality is good and it is a comfortable cool shirt.

summary: These reviews don't lie: comfortable and keeps my middle-aged DDD tatas nice and high and pert! with good side smoothing
reviewText: I've gone from a 48 to a 38 band size, lost 115 pounds, and I have some serious droopage in the tata and side torso. Those of you who've also lost a lot of weight know what I mean, right? Well, I have lived in underwire to get the support I need. My faves are Wacoal and some of the Avenue and Lane Bryant ones I still wear. However, I wanted a wirefree for the days when I was all casual and wanted comfort and still look good (not squashed in sports bras that I use to workout).Well, dang. These are great. And so much less expensive than my beloved Wacoals.The babies are HIGH and PERT and in control with some dip between (I hate monoboob). They keep my looser side skin in nice. I can wear it all day without feeling like I'm being squashed by a giant squid tentacle.I just ordered 2 more (black, beige). These work fine for non-impact workouts, like Pilates and Yoga, too. Isometrics. Weight lifting, that sort of stuff.I love these. Cheap and effective. And no weird seams. I hate seams cause I live in yoga wear and t-shirts. :D My go-to casual bra now. 38DDD. And they stay up. Woohoo!

They are easy to put on and take off, keep my feet dry and protected,and a quick hosing is all it takes to keep them clean.I also have the clog style and wear them when I water the landscaping and plants.For the price, they are a good value since they have held up well.

reviewerName: Aliza M. Beer "Books & Belongings By Beverly ...
reviewText: Everywhere I've read reviews on this flat, it has said that the shoe runs small or true-to-size. I'm enjoying mine in both black and white.I say the fit is as expected after reading the reviews.  Always order up, unless noted, for most China clothing.  Pair with your favorite shabby chic jeans and heels or boots and you have a great look.  Especially for the price!
Bought 3 pairs for Thailand. My husband loved them so much on our trip that he wears them first before any other pair he owns. Great for got climates. Easy to clean, dries quick.

This is the fourth top I have ordered from Doublju, and I love all of them! These are the most comfortable tops - the material is lightweight, and very soft, making even the long sleeve ones good for warm weather. They are also very versatile, and can be worn with something under them in cooler weather. I have worn them with jeans or leggings for a casual style, and have also worn them belted over a long skirt for a more 'dressy' style. If you want great quality tops for an equally great price, Doubliju is the place to go - HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

Just got this hoodie for my guy, and he says it's extremely comfortable and true to size. Did they really make this out of recycled plastic bottles? We wouldn't know it, as it just seems like any other hoodie...

These may not be as stylish as theLysse leggings for women - Basic Capri, but these leggings succeed at being durable. These leggings are great to use for running or any kind of fitness. If you are athletic kind of person, then these leggings are a must own.

For working outside in heat & humidity where you're going to be sweating and moving a lot, this is a pretty decent bra. It's comfortable, it doesn't bind and it doesn't rub. It does lay smoothly as advertised and the straps are actually pretty comfortable as well - one thing I do like is that the straps stay in place even when shoveling out horse stalls. However....if you are like me and have a larger than average chest and you need real support for your "girls" then this is not your bra for wearing out in public. Under a sweat shirt or the like out at the barn or in the privacy of your own garden, sure. Out to dinner with your husband or under a pretty little dress? Absolutely not! (Unless you're still in your early 20s, in which case you're probably not looking at this review anyway LOL) You need a different type of bra entirely for actual support for a grown woman with a large chest.

i really liked this scrub nice fit and nice quality material also, I liked getting my scrubs at a reasonable price also, thank you,

I purchased these for a snorkeling trip and haven't taken them off yet. I am still wearing them in colder weather and they look good with socks. These are the most comfortable shoes I've owned. There is plenty of room in the toe area, the protection is great, but it still looks like a sandal (without exposing the toes). The purple matches all my favorite lavender and purple outfits. It keeps my feet dry, even after walking on the beach in the water. I felt safe navigating rocks and sandy inclines since my feet stayed secure in the shoes, they didn't slosh around and slip off like flip-flops and crocs. They can be a little slippery on smooth rocks, but I don't know many shoes that would work better. The drawstring in the center makes adjusting the snugness of the shoe easy. Once you set it to your comfort, you never have to adjust it again. I've gotten these filthy dirty in mud, yet it washes easily with water and looks like new. One poster wrote the size runs a little small, which I have to agree. I normally wear a size 8.5 to 9, but got the 8.5. It was a little snug at my little toe and I had to wear a bandaid for a few days, but the shoes adjusted and fit great now.

I love, love, love these boots! I only wish it would rain more or get colder where I live, otherwise there really is no reason to wear such boots. They're very warm and keep your feet dry. If this helps, I'm 5'2 and three quarters, I ordered a size 7, and they come up to just below my kneecaps. They fit true to size. summary: Great price and quality as always, slim around ankles but NOT skinny jeans!
reviewText: Levi 511 Slim Fit Jeans, Size 33x34It is very difficult to find 33 waist, 34 inseam jeans in stores, let alone jeans that are cut in a fashionable way and affordable. Enter the Levi 511's. I have two pairs of Levi 514s, which are slim straight fit jeans. Although nice, the 514s are too baggy around the ankles in my humble opinion. The 511s looked like they would rectify this problem, and they do. Except they can be rather tight at the ankle which makes it more snug if you have big feet like me (Size US 12) and are trying to slip them through.The Midnight Oil color was hard to discern online, but in real life they are a very very very dark blue that is almost black. I liked this color because it came with a black leather patch at the back and dark grey stitching. The sizing is spot on, I always buy 1 or 2 sizes larger than my actual waist measurement because this gives me comfort room in the butt and groin area which is important for men.Overall: 5/5 stars. Great price, more modern style but definitely not ultra-tight "skinny jeans". If you desire a bit more room at the ankles, look at the 514s but the 511s are not ultra tight.
Not for me.....OK.....would not buy again......injinji Performance Mini Crew Toesocks,Black,Small ...overpriced in my opinion and I decided against the toe shoes....just not for me!~
