What a hot shirt?  It is really sexy.  People love to look at me in this shirt.  I love the fabric
I bought these for my husband and he loves them!! He also looks great in them! A cool style and he's gotten many compliments! They shipped fast and are a great price!

i read a lot of amazon reviews for leggings and kept seeing people complain about leggings being too thin.  these are perfectly thick- good enough to wear without something covering your butt.  it does say 'spalding' on the hip, which i was unaware of when purchasing, so they're good for working out in, but i won't wear them like pants because of how the white brand stands out on the black pants.

summary: Warm and comfy, but not a fan of the butt seam
reviewText: I wanted a thicker legging that i could wear with a sweater and boots and thought these would be perfect. While they are super comfy and much warmer than normal leggings, the butt seam is odd. Instead of just a seem down the butt crack, there are 2 lines going down either cheek. It's noticeable enough that i would not wear these alone. Maybe i would wear with a long sweater or tunic to cover them, but i most likely will just wear them under jeans on really cold days. They do fit nice though. I am 5'2 and 115 lbs. I ordered the S/M and they fit perfect. The length is great and the top fit well and didn't give that dreaded "muffin top" effect. These are great leggings, but my search continues for something cute to wear with my boots.

summary: I got a lot of compliments on these!
reviewText: These shoes are so cute - you'll definitely get a lot of compliments when wearing them!  I ordered a 1/2 size larger for comfort and was glad I did.  I paired these withELEGANT MOMENT 1784 Nylon anklet with ruffle and satin bow.and they were just what my Oktoberfest bar maid outfit needed!

summary: Huge, baggy legs and not fleece!
reviewText: These are not fleece, but regular sweatpants.  They are also very large in the legs and baggy.  The waist can be tightened with the drawstring, but if you are looking for a slim, trim look, these are not it.

These pants fit a little snug (compared to other pants that haggar makes), but the have a stretch waist, so it actually results in a great look (as long as you don't have a dunlop style belly).Overall these pants look amazing and feel really good.  I'm very happy with this purchase.

Received this item today and immediately loved them.  The material is soft, thick and warm. They are perfect for winter. They fit great and look great.  Fast shipping and reasonable price! :)  I'm very happy with the purchase and will buy again !!
Bought these for a teen who hates wearing slippers, but because they slide on so easily she wears them almost every day.  Good purchase.

These leggings may be simple, but they are as comfortable asLysse leggings for women - Basic Capri. I think these leggings can look terrific with a skirt, or be used for exercise. Whatever you decide to use them for, I am sure you will be pleased with these as they are a great pair of leggings.

summary: Very nice bra, not what I had expected.  I need more lift.
reviewText: I am thin with an aging body that needs a lift.  Not much lift here.  I do wear it using pushup pads.  Works well.  I did find that a Champion Yoga bra keeps my body in place.  I will wear this bra when it is hot.  The material is breathable.  Washes well using a lingerie bag and air dry.

The shipping was great this item came over 20 days early!The quality is okay- I wish I had gotten a bigger size because it's such a right fabric that I kinda ripped it because my theighs are a little big. The elastic waist band is also not my favorite, but other than that, I really like the product!I think they look cool- but I don't like they'll be worn very often!

This is bad quality. The 9mm ball has stones that are glued on. It is very easy to see the  white glue. It look like they coated the entire ball with plaster and then stuck the stones on. The silver chain is super thin.  This  isn't worth 2 bucks and certainly not the 9.00 it cost to get it home.  I wouldn't give this as a gift to an adult. Maybe, okay for a Tween, knowing you'll find it underneath her bed anyway.  This pendant is tacky.  You can find better quality  jewelry at your local Walgreens for 2.99.I also purchased the matching  6mm ball earrings. The workmanship on those is better.  The stones are still glued on, but done much neater.  The earrings do look nice on the ears. The crystals sparkle nicely.  They don't look cheap, but they are.  Their cheap quality is evident. when touching the earrings.  They are superlight and flimsy feeling, but if pretty sparkle on the ears is desired,  the earrings will deliver; at least until the glued on stones start falling out.  The silver is not plated on either items.

summary: For the money you can't beat 'em
reviewText: These are smaller than they look in the picture, but I was expecting that based on reviews I read in advance.  I have short hair so it's not an issue.  Do they look real or expensive?  No way, but they're fun and cute and totally worth the money.

These are perfect to wear with Vibram Fivefingers. They are light wright enough to fit comfortably, launder nicely and keep their shape, and they also keep the Fivefingers clean. While I favor the grey color, I also own several pairs in black and white.They fit like a glove and work despite I have long toes. I have yet to notice any signs of wearing in certain spots such as the heel which is usually the first place to go. I am pleased with these socks and the quality. Though these are a little pricey, these seem to be worth the price because they are well made.
A nice simple sweater that looks and feel way more expensive than it was.  I ordered it in green, and it's a very nice muted green, great for fall

For this price, I expected this shoe to be fantastic. I went to the store and tried them on and they seemed great. But, after about an hour into my workout, I noticed that the ball of my foot was REALLY hurting. It may just be my feet, and I'm hoping that I'll break these in after a few more wears (I've worn them now 3 times - about 2 hours each time). They do have great heel cushion, which is nice, but I wish the front part was a little better.

summary: Lady Girl Christmas on sale! Vintage Owl Necklace Long Pattern Necklace Coat....
reviewText: I bought two of these Owl necklaces for stocking stuffers they look better in person than the photo. Looks great with sweaters their a decent length and the owl itself is not to heavy .

The Skechers Women's Go Walk 2-Rush Walking Shoe,Raspberry,7.5 M US, were intended for a very lovely lady of many, many moons. As of late she had been predominantly using crocs, which she also seemed to like, but after a couple of close calls while walking, and with a strong desire for her to start walking as a routine, I started shopping immediately for a more suitable, easier to put on, and most important, good for walking shoes. She opened the present upon arrival, and in no time she kept praising the Skechers. "Oh, they feel like air", "WoW, these are comfortable", and I knew that besides being the correct size, the Go Walk Shoes were just what was needed. So much in fact, that I immediately as well, put in an order for two more pairs. The goal is to have her use these type of shoes for the next year as much as possible, since she noticeably walks with more panache the moment these bad girls (as opposed to bad boys, popular expression, but since these are entirely for the beautiful females in the land, hence the new term..bad girls?), became part of her walking world. Happy to no end, also appreciating the lack of shoelaces, as long as they are in place, they are indeed what they claim to be: great walking shoes! 4.5 Stars!
Just for starters, 6.5 mm = 1 Carat. This is great for everyday use but not for special occasions. The stone is wonderful but it is a little small for my taste so I will use this as a nice present.

summary: I've only tried them on, never wore them.
reviewText: What can I write? They are Wranglers and that speaks for it self. I tried them on and hung them in the closit for later. They are high quality jeans and love the color. From a 1 to a 10= 10

summary: Nice thigh support; No Butt Support;  Mild tummy control; runs slightly large, I'd say.
reviewText: These work fine for my purpose (a thigh-chafe reducer under sundresses/dresses/skirts). I lost a lot of weight and have some loose inner thigh skin--even though I work out and have good thigh muscles otherwise). So, when I wear skirts and dresses, it's nice to have a thigh slimmer option.This thigh slimmer has a slightly rough texture to the fabric. Like triple thickness pantyhose fabric with some roughness. The thigh is not overly binding (but I'm not a pear-shape, I'm more avocado/appley with belly fat being an issue). The waist is comfortable. Ladies with very large posteriors may want to skip this, as I found that it rode a little low in the back and I don't have a round butt. I carry weight in the front and have hips, but not big thighs. This offers NO butt lift. None. If you like the design to lift up the backside, this is not for you. It will flatten you a bit back there.The crotch area is not "cottonized". As I said, it's like triple-thick pantyhose. Thicker than Spanx. There is seaming, so if your ladybits are sensitive to seams, be careful with this style.I have a 35-36 I got an XXL, cause no 3xl is available. Most of my shapewear at this waist size is XXL or XXXL (if I want it looser). I found these snug. Not asphyxiation snug, but snug. I'd say "comfortably snug". They have very little belly control, but some. There is some smoothing. Again, this is LIGHT CONTROL, so don't expect more than that.Their sizing guide seems to be okay if you like a comfortable fit. If you want really snug, go one size, even two sizes down. According to their guide, I should get XXXL, and the XXL fits okay. Seems to run a bit large.I got these in white, as I have some white-background floral sundresses for which I wanted a white thigh slimmer. This will work okay.

summary: Feels great and keeps feet cool!
reviewText: I bought these for a trek with the Vibram Five Fingers - and they worked out very well. In fact I've worn them frequently without the Five Finger shoes. They wick moisture very well, and after a long day (or week) of hiking they do not smell nearly as bad as they should. Also I never got any blisters, rashes, or any real discomfort when wearing them. It really was a unique experience (never wore toe socks before). I highly recommend them for outdoor activities especially! Give each of your toes more room for movement and less restrictions then a regular sock.

summary: bought because of the other reviewers....
reviewText: bought because of the other reviewers....ExOfficio Men's Give-N-Go Boxer,Charcoal,Large...wish they had an opening...I will write another update after my husband gives me his opinion!~

Very solid construction; I am not sure who could actually wear these out! Sorta' nice looking, if you like to have duck feet! Lol, I have a very narrow heel and wide toe box so I do look like I am wearing paddles! Much prettier deeper black than in pic; and very bright yellow stitching; so nice looking...comfort: wore them around the house; now please note that my R foot is an entire size larger than left; need toe fusion on R; so my right foot was hurting but it hurts in everything so not really an issue. The more I wear them; the better that seems to get. I wear an 8.5-9; but did not have to size up. Plenty of room in the toe box. My right foot has been sweating in these; not quite sure why because my feet don't ever sweat! The material inside is hard plastic?!, with grippies on bottom and I find the grippies quite comfy.Overall, I like these shoes and believe I will like them more-the more I wear them; I think they will be great for summer! And...having odd feet; not really caring how they actually look on my feet; I need to find shoes that my AAA ankles won't walk out of; and that have toe box room!  Recommend!

I was shocked when I opened these,  I have had quite a few pairs of CZ studs from cheap to expensive brand named costume jewelry lines. These gave the best wow factor! Sparkle like the real thing - great color.  And the setting is the best, like the setting on an expensive pair of diamonds.  Without a good setting, no sparkly stone can play the role.

summary: Absolutely the Most Comfy Flip Flops Ever!
reviewText: My closet houses quite a collection of flip flops of different heights and "garnish".  These are my go-to favorites if I'm doing a lot of walking.  I've walked miles in these without discomfort. The foot bed is like a tennis shoe, but even more comfortable.  The molded shape gives arch support and there's a toe grip to help keep these on your foot while adding more comfort.  The design is cute & I love the jewels.  My only complaint is that perhaps they show a little too much bare foot as the cross strap sits rather far back.  However, this may be part of the design that makes the shoe so comfy.

I like this blouse. There may not be much to it, but the likes ofLast Tango tops for women - Sleeveless Scoopneck Rusched Tank (Style#1047)has shown me that simple can be effective. The blouse has worked for a number of fashions giving it a great sense of versatility. I recommend getting it. It truly is a fantastic blouse.
The hubs didn't want me to order these, but was surprised how well they fit, we will be buying more.
Nice and comfortable, no draft. Fit really well and fabric is soft enough to be comfortable but not too soft that my husband feels hes wearing womens clothing. :)

i'm short (5 foot 4) and curvy (xl).  i was so hesitant to buy black pants online without trying them on, but i really needed a new pair, as the ones i've had i've worn to death, and the material in the thighs have started wearing out.i decided to try these, and they're great.  they feel soft and are completely opaque.  they're a little long on me, so i know the bottoms will get kind of shriveled in the back when they drag on the ground, and the top is a little snug, but not in an uncomfortable way.i'll probably order a second pair as backup for when i wear these to death.oh- the legs are less flaired looking than the picture shows.  more straight-legged and pretty tight right down to the calf.

summary: These look nice but my son said they are itchy
reviewText: I got my son a few different brands in the same general style to figure out what he liked. When I asked why he didn't wear these, he said that they are itchy.  They also seem to be a bit short.  I've since learned that he prefers the slightly longer ones.  The cut of these makes the material ride up when he wears them and he feels the need to constantly pull them down.  Waist measurement was as expected.
looks great on my 3X hubby who has amazing blue eyes.  Nice quality and no ironing necessary YAY
I'm a cardigan fan, and purchased this one in cream for my lighter-colored tops. It feels nice and looks good.

summary: Very comfortable and good for the price
reviewText: Pros:I have been on long long runs (over 15k) with these, they are certainly comfortable.They have an inner lining, which also helps keep boxers in place (in the groin area, invisible).You don't have to tie anything, I'm 5f11, 180lbs and medium stays in place just fine.Con:The key pocket could have been larger, while it holds locker keys very nicely, you may have trouble fitting in your housekeysEdit: I bought 2 of these and both shorts' key pockets got torn and unusable after just a month. (Even though all i carried inside was 2 keys on a keychain). I use an amphipod running waistpack so couldn't care less, but thought prospective buyers may wanna be informed.That being said, i would still recommend them w/o doubt, considering they're virtually as comfortable as  (several times as pricey) New Armour, Nike  and Asics shorts i owned.

Looks pretty close to the picture. The only difference is the skull isn't white, it's grey. Not a problem though. One strange thing though is I noticed a chemical smell coming from the sweater, I hope it washes out. :x
I bought two, the other is lavender.  This one was a different, thinner material.  That's why I gave it a 4.

Beautiful gold belt, and perfect for a plus size gal.  Shines beautifully, doesn't look cheap.  Exactly what it should be.  It dents where you cinch it, but I haven't had any of the gold flake off.  I may buy another.

After my wife lost real diamond studs on two different occasions (years apart) I decided the "next pair" wasn't going to be the real thing.  These are a high quality knock-off and for everyday wear they look great and she likes them.  And, if one gets lost, it's not such a huge deal to replace it!
I basically knew when I ordered these that they would be horrible, but something came over me anyway.  I should have went with my instincts.  These couldn't possibly be more fake looking.

summary: Best winter cap I've ever owned
reviewText: This cap is all around amazing. I find most of Carhart's gear to be satisfactory, however, every now and then I'm disappointed with a product of theirs. This cap is definitely not a disappointment. Its very warm, stays on my head, is comfortable, looks good, and the bill is surprisingly helpful when the sun is out. I work outside for the railroad in Wyoming, and this hat works great for me.

summary: LEOPARD PATTERN SHAWL FOR WOMEN NICE
reviewText: LOOKS LIKE POSTED PICTURE ONSITE GREAT WITH SUITS AND JACKETS CAN BE USED AS A SHAWL OR SCARF ON THE THIN SIDE BUT THAT IS FINE

summary: Great Capris At A Reasonable Price
reviewText: I found these at a sporting good store on sale. I bought two pairs in black and ended up buying two more. I am 5'3 and normally weigh between 132 and 140 lbs. I bought these in size medium.They are made of cotton and Lycra and they have superior wicking qualities and they also dry quickly. These capris provide really good coverage, aren't too clingy, comfortable, and are adequately long to cover the scars on my knees from surgery.While these are great as work out pants, I also wear them around the house and have even slept in them. I normally buy a pricier brand that is comparable but also cost almost double for what I paid for one pair of these.Good fit, quality, and price make these a no-brainer.
But fun to wear with leggings.

summary: Remarkably nice costume jewelry for the price
reviewText: At the time I ordered the owl pendant and chain, it cost less than a dollar, including free shipping. I've been ordering some of these inexpensive pieces of costume jewelry from China to give as gifts to the young nieces in our family, and my wife and I have been very pleased with them. The jeweled owl won't fool anyone into thinking that it's expensive jewelry, but it's good costume jewelry. It looks more expensive than it is, and weighing 0.5 ounces, it has the heft of more expensive metal than the zinc alloy it's actually made from.Note that the actual size of the pendant is 1.9"x1.5". The product description incorrectly shows 3.25"x2".Delivery from China took 19 days from the time I placed the order.

Decient long sleeved T. A bit on the thin side, but warm under a work shirt. I haven't run it through the washer yet, so I don't know about the wearing qualities yet. The longer length works well while stooping and stays tucked.

summary: i should have bought my normal size or only gone up one size
reviewText: I really read all the reviews before I bought two shirts a black one and a white one. Well these were looooooooooong. I am 5`6" but I have a short torso and I could wear this as a dress. It was also loose which I could have ordered my usual size and been fine. I kept it to alter them. Hopefully I can make these work with leggings.

I love these flip flops! I have two pairs now and just adore them. They are extremely comfortable and last for years! They do get slippery when you get them wet, so beware not to fall. These flops did rub my foot raw where the cloth hit it, but only because one of the egdes was raised a bit. I just got the material wet and put a barret there to mold the material flat, instead of raised. Worked like a charm and they are super comfy!

summary: Soffe Juniors Fleece Roll Up Capri
reviewText: Perfect for lounging around with a comfy tee. I wanted some roll up capri pants that were not see-through, and these did the job. They are not thin, but not that thick, medium in thickness. Glad to know that I could also exercise in these without worrying about the pants falling off. They do, however, make my butt look big, lol. I don't know if everyone will have this problem though. They run true to size.

Some of us can't bear to have scratchy labels in our clothes. To my chagrin, I've ruined shirts by carefully cutting out brand-labels that are more intensively constructed and sewn-in than the seams themselves, only to find I've left a hole. But no problem here! This is a basic, comfortable shirt, with no annoying neck-level labels to contend with. It leaves ample shoulder room, yet is well designed and flattering, even if there's a bit of a tummy involved. Holds up wash after wash. It's a surprisingly versatile and classy looking shirt, considering the modest price. Enjoy!
This looks super pretty and big on the picture, but it's actually cheaper looking in person and seems a bit smaller. It isn't a terrible buy for younger girls. Not so much for a woman.
It's a great belt.  Runs true to size, and looks great.  I wear it with a pair of cream color slacks.  It's well worth the price.

reviewerName: l.chong "Go where there is no path, and leave...
reviewText: I wear this with jeans for a relaxed look.  Its really cute and I love the pockets.  I am 5'2" and 112 pounds give or take and the xs looks the same on me as in the picture.  Very happy with the purchase.  Shipping takes a long time but the merchant is very nice and even sent me a discount card for my next purchase.

summary: Slight change, but a welcome one
reviewText: They're not exactly the same as the ones I've bought in big-box stores. There's no tag on them, just a printed label -- which is awesome! Those tags are scratchy, and I LOVE that these are tagless. I'm considering buying another seven-pack and just discarding all my old boxer briefs. The waistband is softer but still stays up okay, and the fit is just like my other FotL undies.Finding the right undies is like finding the right spouse. You didn't necessarily know just what you wanted until you've found it, and once you've found it, you never want anything (or anyone) else. For me, the right underwear is these underwear. They prevent chafing, they fit at my hips rather than at my waist, and they are comfortable all day long. They are my underwear soul mate, and I don't know what I'd do without them.

Like 1/2 of the reviewers, I bought these for my SO for xmas. He is a fairly honest person and said these slippers are pretty good as far as slippers go, but he still like his old pair better. They are a little stiff and although I bought his normal size, they fit him tightly at first but they have stretched a little with daily use over the last month. He doesn't like the stiffness of the sole either. A little more flexibility so they are more like a slipper than a shoe would have made them better. He did keep them though and he does wear them.

I have quite a few wicking/performance t-shirts. They're a necessity during warm weather when sweating a river. Most of mine are Nike's. I've never had a Tasc t-shirt before, but this one is nice. It's moisture wicking, breathable, anti-odor and SPF 50+. It's also soft and stretchy. The differences that I notice between this t-shirt and my Nike fit/dry's is that the Tasc is heavier and wrinkles more. That's probably due to it having more natural fibers. Overall, very comfortable.

summary: 2.00 Carat Cubic Zirconia Earrings set in 925 Sterling Silver Nickel Free
reviewText: Beautiful earrings much smaller than the picture appears I really like these they are very secure when I put them on not loose at all they look a lot more expensive than what I paid for them.well worth it and the seller was great arrived super fast!

summary: Good, until you wash them one time. . .
reviewText: At first, i was in love with these. They are so warm and comfy and cute! But then i washed them once. I ended up with little fuzzies and pills all over them. I took a razor and tried to shave them off so i could wear them again. That worked ok the first time, but after the second and third wash there was just no saving these. They are just way to noticeable to wear these alone. Now i will wear them under jeans when it is really cold, but never just under a tunic or sweater like i had intended them to be. I guess maybe if you just hand wash them you will get better results? But i just don't have time for that. So continues my quest for leggings that don't suck . . .Oh, also a note on size: These are "one size fits all". These will in no way fit all sizes. I am 5'2 and 120 lbs. They do fit me, but if there were options i would buy a larger size. They definitely fit a little tight around the waist and give the slight muffin top. I end up having to pull them all the way up (like up above my waist and just under my boobs) to smooth out the muffin top if i am wearing anything form fitting.
Fits perfect, and looks exactly like the image on the website. I LOVE this top! It is very soft and comfortable.
I ordered the eggplant, a deep purple. It is very pretty but the material is thinner than I expected. Still, for the price, it will make a good addition to my collection.

summary: Great for lakes with oh so gross mushy bottoms!
reviewText: Hey, you don't know what people did in that lake... did they break a beer bottle on a boat?  Mushy seaweed under my toes isn't a turn on and these solve all those problems.  NO more cringing and broken class cutsfor me at the lake!  Whew.

i was told by a woman who works for amazon that these reefs r the ones to get , she said she had to order them 1 size bigger than her normal shoe size and suggested i do the same , she said she had a wider foot and so do i , turns out she was rite , the 1 size bigger than my normal show size is a great fit ! these r very comfy , i just got them today and i'm already waring them . these r awesome , after having them for a month or so now the bed of the sandle is forming to my foot some what AWESOME ! i am so glad i got 1 size bigger as suggested to me by a Amazon employee. i will ware these till they fall apart , so comfy , and i pray that u continue to have these !so i can buy more !!

summary: Allegra K Lady Pullover Design Scoop Neck Drawstring Hoody Tunic Shirt
reviewText: Awesome shirt I first ordered the Black and grey one liked it so much I ordered this Blue one like every thing about this shirt very comfortable on and I like the hood true to size even after washing it didn't shrink looks great on.

summary: It didn't fit me like the picture
reviewText: I am usually a medium, and with a lot of the reviews for Allegra K they say that the clothes tend to run small. I didn't listen and still ordered a medium, I ran into the other problem. It is way too big, it doesn't fit (because it's too big) at all like it does in the picture. I wish I could refund it for a small size. I am really disappointed because I won't be able to wear this.
I purchased these shorts for my adult son to sleep in. He loves them. He is 6'1" and weighs 160. The large was perfect for sleeping. They wash and dry well.
I love AMAZON.  My sister in law is an AMAZOn lover too thanks to the beautiful Bali bras I purchased for her.  She loved the fit, quality, and the great value I got.

It took a some time to get here but they are from Hong Kong.She really liked them well made ,but a large runs small more like a 8.That's as biggest size they go.So had to send them back it's too bad very nice well made really nice.Thank you

Okay so I really like this, (the back is solid black, just so you know) the only reason this get four stars instead of five is as fallows: I tried the shirt on when I received to make sure that it did indeed fit. Happy with the fit I washed this shirt and all was good. I wore the shirt later that same week and even though I washed the shirt previous to wearing it still left black die on my white bra :-( That sis not make me happy and I have no choice but to wear a white bra because white takes up so much of the front! Sigh* Oh well still really like the shirt and I received lots of compliments on it.

I purchased this sports bra on a whim because it was $10 and highly rated. I wear 30DD/32D generally, and I purchased the 30DD in white. It is, hands down, the best sports bra I own. I love that the back and straps are adjustable. That means no squeezing in and out of the bra, since you can just take it on and off like a normal bra. Plus, since the straps are adjustable, petite girls like me can shrink the straps down, which is actually an issue I didn't even realize I had with sports bras.The only downsides are that if it is cold, there will be headlights. Also, it isn't the most flattering on me. Maybe I should have gone with a 32D instead of a 30DD because this sports bra flattens me out completely. It's a little bit depressing to look down and see the equivalent of a 13 year old boy. At least there is no bouncing.

I'm size 7 and this feels like size 6.5. The front tho..seemed right length but the back seems a bit short, and the straps were too tight. Not sure if the straps would be comfortable even if it wasn't tight tho... The sole padding feels just ok but the material they use should be questioned... I dont think its comfortable on the skin at all. And its true the bottom can be slippery coz it's pretty much flat. I don't think it's worth the money. If it was $13 bux I would get an exchange for a bigger size.My questions is why the hell do these companies make sandals that are uncomfortable and charge us what it's to worth??? That is plain stupid. It is OBVIOUS they didnt use a shoe model... Thank god for amazon tho I can just get a refund hassle free.
Beautiful and unique necklace for an owl lover or someone wanting a more lived in looking necklace. Lays on collar bone. Very pretty
I am a true size 6 but these 5's fit on me so they run big and they stretch with wear. I did not like the scratchy material it was made of and I was only trying it on.

summary: Carhartt Men's Cotton 3 Pack Crew Work Socks
reviewText: Very nice socks. The price is very fair, they are soft, form fitting and very comfy to weir. I will be getting more soon.

summary: Allegra K Thumb Hole Sleeve Scoop Neck Autumn Shirt  for Women
reviewText: This shirt is pretty cool ,True to size and nice thick cotton material I bought the green one looks just like the photo .Like that the sleeves are different colors and also have a thumb hole if you choose to use it .I am just gonna roll the cuff up to cover them.A great shirt for winter and lounging around my house.

Came in Broken. Cant send it back cause it would cost more than the necklace. The nose was broken off and was not even attached to the chain. the small hook on the head was busted open. Does any one even check these things before they are shipped or just grab a bag and throw it in? Ehhh you get what you pay for..Wont purchase again.
